texts.It\u0027s host to the hardest challenge: It's host to the hardest challenge of all, and only the bravest adventurers stand a chance. If you want to participate, just go east until you reach the island close to the shore!
texts.Hey! You are a Wynn soldier, aren\u0027t: Hey! You are a Wynn soldier, aren't you? Cmon, there aren't a lot of people running around with that gear.
texts.Listen, someone with your experience sho: Listen, someone with your experience should visit Legendary Island! Haven't heard of it?

texts.Some skyraiders have been sneakin\u0027: Some skyraiders have been sneakin' into this garden and causin' havoc, tryin' to snatch the treasure! One of em' almost broke into the mansion by throwin' a rock and shatterin' one of the windows! What’s with the wig?

texts.I am not actually a troll. I guess my pa: I am not actually a troll. I guess my parents were cruel.
texts.Alas, my name is Troll and I own this to: Alas, my name is Troll and I own this tower.
texts.Well, what were you expecting to find up: Well, what were you expecting to find up here?

texts.Ah, a new visitor to Nemract, what a rar: Ah, a new visitor to Nemract, what a rare sight. Did you hear what happened to Sayleros' brother?
texts.A thousand years ago, just south of here: A thousand years ago, just south of here, Ancient Nemract was once a shining Human city. Now, it is only ruins.
texts.When the corruption first broke out, zom: When the corruption first broke out, zombies swarmed the city. It was the first town to be destroyed by the undead.
texts.I\u0027ve heard that zombies tend to gat: I've heard that zombies tend to gather near a large tree in the fallen city. Why are they so attracted to it, I wonder? Maybe we should ask Ragnar to investigate.
texts.It forms a trail, known to most sailors: It forms a trail, known to most sailors as the Underwater Route. It leads to the island of Selchar, sister city to Detlas.
texts.Here\u0027s some advice for when you go: Here's some advice for when you go on your first voyage: look closely at the sand beneath the water.
texts.He died a few weeks ago. I wonder if Say: He died a few weeks ago. I wonder if Sayleros is doing okay, last I heard he was still in Detlas...I wonder if he knows.
texts.You looking to sail across the ocean? We: You looking to sail across the ocean? Well, you came to the perfect place, Nemract is the best place to buy a boat.

texts.I don\u0027t know what to do, but maybe: I don't know what to do, but maybe if you find Detective Jackson, he can tell you how you can help.
texts.Oh sweet baby bovine, my house, what am: Oh sweet baby bovine, my house, what am I going to do? Wait, who are you?
texts.Oh, a Human. Did the Llevigar authoritie: Oh, a Human. Did the Llevigar authorities send you?
texts.Have you found Detective Jackson yet? He: Have you found Detective Jackson yet? He went to scout out the camps I think, to the south east.
Detective Jackson has already been here. Not that he's doing anything.
texts.If the Orcs really got their hands on ma: If the Orcs really got their hands on magical weapons, we're all in trouble.
texts.An Orc managed to find some fire imbued: An Orc managed to find some fire imbued magical axe and burned down my house!
texts.I believe Detective Jackson is by his ca: I believe Detective Jackson is by his cart planning his next move. You can find him not far from here. I wrote the coordinates in your quest book for you.

texts.Let\u0027s get moving. We\u0027ll be tak: Let's get moving. We'll be taking no breaks, and if you fall behind on the trip consider yourself excused from this endeavour.
texts.K-keep advancing. Your things, they §r§a: K-keep advancing. Your things, they §r§aare...if§r§a everyone was as strong as §r§ayou...we§r§a may stand a §r§achance...this§r§a could end me, in time, once I am weaker.
texts....no§r§a, no, no no no NO!! DAMN IT ALL: ...no§r§a, no, no no no NO!! DAMN IT ALL!!
texts.I... C-calm yourself, §r§aTheorick...don: I... C-calm yourself, §r§aTheorick...don't...don't§r§a lose yourself to §r§ait...there's...yet§r§a a §r§asolution...one§r§a way...
texts.Stupid they might be... §r§4All worthles: Stupid they might be... §r§4All worthless... §r§aUrgh...they§r§a yet deserve §r§alife...and§r§a this spell §r§ais...it§r§a will surely claim some. Please, let them know why...
texts.Phew... You\u0027re out of danger now. I: Phew... You're out of danger now. If you hadn't left town without a guard, though, you wouldn't have been IN any danger at all!
texts.Next time you feel like picking flowers: Next time you feel like picking flowers in the forest, or whatever in blazes you were doing, weigh your life over a few blasted petals, hm?!
texts.You know what happened?! I lost!! I will: You know what happened?! I lost!! I will destroy the province if I turn completely! GET AWAY, NOW! DO YOU HEAR ME?! RUN!!
texts.The last man that entered the portal and: The last man that entered the portal and returned became Bak’al... But if there is even a fraction of a chance this could work, we must take it at this point.
texts.If I have learned anything from that §r§: If I have learned anything from that §r§4insufferable f- §r§a...from§r§a §r§aMael...deaths§r§a without reason forces spirits to linger. I §r§awould...prefer§r§a against giving him a harder time.
texts.When I enter, there is no telling what m: When I enter, there is no telling what might happen. If I had to make an assumption, corrupteds will swarm the portal after me. I'll need every advantage I can get, so your job? Slay them.
texts.If you need help, lodge a complaint with: If you need help, lodge a complaint with the guards. I'm busy and I can't exactly break away from saving this god-blessed province to chill your milk!!
texts.Well, I\u0027ll give you this. You\u0027: Well, I'll give you this. You're prompt to listen to §r§aorders...after§r§a seeing what I'm capable of, at least. We're headed to the Roots of Corruption.
texts.You §r§alive...so...eyes§r§a up. Listen: You §r§alive...so...eyes§r§a up. Listen to me. If I §r§aturn...w-when...when§r§a I turn...n-no, can'§r§at...gaaah§r§a, §r§4I'll destr-§r§a Nggh...
texts.Let it be §r§aknown...Theorick§r§a Twain: Let it be §r§aknown...Theorick§r§a Twain is not dead. §r§4He cannot be §r§4killed...all§r§4 will burn...§r§auntil future days. Here, in this accursed place. Find §r§ame...and§r§a end it all.
texts.As though I needed TWO idiots to save! N: As though I needed TWO idiots to save! Now get out of here, I have to find that woman who went missing! I'll probably find her a corpse given your stalling!!
texts.Don\u0027t bother apologizing to me, the: Don't bother apologizing to me, they're all empty in this place anymore. Just get back to town. Now.
texts.You will not be leaving your post here u: You will not be leaving your post here until I exit that portal. Understood?
texts.I won\u0027t §r§alast...you§r§a can tell: I won't §r§alast...you§r§a can tell, thick-skulled as you are... Right §r§anow...killing§r§a me is an impossibility, you §r§4idiotic weakl-§r§a SHUT UP! SHUT UP!!!
texts.As dense as you are, you look heavily ge: As dense as you are, you look heavily geared. I'm conscripting you. Meet us at our base, immediately. Follow the river south and you'll see a house on the right side.
texts.Now. You bunch will not be following me: Now. You bunch will not be following me into the portal. The sheer cold I command can stave off corruption itself. Somehow I doubt any of you can say the same.
texts.Hmph. I could\u0027ve sworn she had gone: Hmph. I could've sworn she had gone this way... Oh, what now, more imbeciles? This forest isn't safe to travel!
texts.Gaaah... §r§aTell...everyone§r§a. I will: Gaaah... §r§aTell...everyone§r§a. I will freeze this place. It...I...t-too fargone. It needs time to §r§aheal...and§r§a my powers m-must be §r§adampened...frozen..§r§a.
Every day, more corrupteds, more deaths... There is only one thing for it. I have to tackle it myself. Cut the §r§aroots...and§r§a kill this hellish weed.
texts.Whuh! That\u0027s her voice! Where is sh: Whuh! That's her voice! Where is she?! I just cleared this area, no thanks to you!
texts.Ugh, is she dragging them over from the: Ugh, is she dragging them over from the west?! Idiots, every last one of them... If you don't want to end up frozen, GET BEHIND ME, NOW!!
texts.Still here? Well, knock the wax out of y: Still here? Well, knock the wax out of your head and listen. Myself and a few others are planning something risky. Damned be it if our minds are lost, I need to go through that portal.
texts.Are your ears full of wax?! I said-: Are your ears full of wax?! I said-
texts.Urgh, the things followed you! See what: Urgh, the things followed you! See what happens?! STAND ASIDE.

texts.Chip! Donnie! We got one of them humans: Chip! Donnie! We got one of them humans here asking all sorts of funny questions!
texts.Hey, what\u0027s that rope for? What?! S: Hey, what's that rope for? What?! Stop tying me up! Chip! Donnie! Why are you just standing around?
texts.You\u0027re wasting your time, I\u0027ve: You're wasting your time, I've told you everything I can. Get out of here! Hey, wait! Aren't you going to untie me?
texts.Untie me and leave! You caught me off gu: Untie me and leave! You caught me off guard, but you won't survive the factory. From here, go east, then take the north path.
texts.Fine, I\u0027ll tell you! We work at a s: Fine, I'll tell you! We work at a secret factory that produces protective machinery. From here, go east, then take the north path.
texts.You\u0027re curious about our occupation: You're curious about our occupations? Ha! You'll find out soon enough when we captur-
texts.You won\u0027t be able to get in without: You won't be able to get in without a §r§3[Factory Helmet] §r§athough, and I don't keep any in the house!
texts.You can only get them from factory emplo: You can only get them from factory employees so I have no problem in telling you to get lost!
texts.Let me go, you dimwitted scoundrel! I wi: Let me go, you dimwitted scoundrel! I will make you disappear, untie me at once!

texts.You must be the last recruit! Finally ni: 你一定是最后一位勇士了！很高兴见到你。你刚说你的名字是什么来着？
texts.... Anyway, good luck! If you are lost,: ...总之，祝你好运！如果你迷路了，你可以使用§r§3map.wynncraft.com§r§3 §r§a来帮你找到你的位置
texts.Take this §r§3[1 Ragni Teleportation Scr: 再拿上这个§r§3[1 Ragni传送卷轴]§r§a！他可以带你回到这里。
texts.You might want to train a little more be: 你可能想在出发前再有一些训练项目，但我们时间真的不多了...每天都有许多人丧生在怪物手下
texts.Your job as a soldier of Wynn is to stop: 你的工作就是与这个世界日益强大的可怕怪物对抗，并加入拯救这个世界的一员
texts.Off you go, I\u0027ve said everything I: 好了，我已经无话可说了。你可以开始你的旅途了
texts.This is the noble fort of Ragni, one of: 这里便是Ragni最宏伟的城堡，也是Wynn省内最古老和最有影响力的城市之一。
texts.What a peculiar name. Anyway, welcome to: 好奇怪的名字...总之，欢迎来到Wynn省！
texts.I see you\u0027ve arrived safely, new re: 你终于安全来到城堡了，新勇士。现在过来我这里吧。

texts.Although we are in need of some... assis: Although we are in need of some... assistance... and you are fairly experienced, are you not?
texts.Have you made any progress? There was a: Have you made any progress? There was a smashed window in there, it might be a good place to start.
texts.I\u0027ll just grant you access to the c: I'll just grant you access to the crime scene. Head inside the house, and see if you can find anything helpful.
texts.Stand back, human! This is a crime scene: Stand back, human! This is a crime scene, under my authority. I cannot let you inside.
texts.To put it bluntly, the owner of this hou: To put it bluntly, the owner of this house, Eminar, was murdered a few days ago, and what few leads we had have all gone cold.
texts.My soldiers and I will keep watch outsid: My soldiers and I will keep watch outside the house, and make sure you're not disturbed. Be careful in there!
texts.This is acting outside protocol, of cour: This is acting outside protocol, of course... but if you manage to catch the killer, I'm sure I could pull some strings and pay you for your work!
texts.Well, straight to the point... do you th: Well, straight to the point... do you think I might be able to hire you as a private investigator?

texts.Hey kid, watch out you can\u0027t do tha: Hey kid, watch out you can't do that! This isn't a place to play!

texts.Really, nothing? You didn\u0027t even fe: Really, nothing? You didn't even feel anything?
texts.Then perhaps my second theory was correc: Then perhaps my second theory was correct. I will have to send you underground.
texts.Alright, fine. Here\u0027s your pay. Tha: Alright, fine. Here's your pay. Thank you for your help.
texts.Alright, stand back. I have actually nev: Alright, stand back. I have actually never made this before, so let's hope I don't cause a disaster.
texts.Here, take this for your help. I found t: Here, take this for your help. I found this potato in one of the houses around here, and I sure as heck don’t want it!
texts.Oh, you seem calm. What are you doing he: Oh, you seem calm. What are you doing here? Bit close to the portal for a soldier isn't it?
texts.Did you do what I asked? No? Check your: Did you do what I asked? No? Check your quest book.
texts.I need §r§3[Unstable Corrupted Ore]§r§a,: I need §r§3[Unstable Corrupted Ore]§r§a, §r§3[Incendiary Fluid]§r§a, and §r§3[Switch Fuse] §r§ato create the explosive.
texts.There are 3 main ingredients you will ne: There are 3 main ingredients you will need to get me: §r§3[Unstable Corrupted Ore]§r§a, §r§3[Incendiary Fluid]§r§a, and a §r§3[Switch Fuse] §r§ato activate it.
texts.Oh, do you feel that? It\u0027s like a b: Oh, do you feel that? It's like a buzzing in my ears I never knew about has just vanished.
texts....Wow§r§a, that did nothing. We\u0027re: ...Wow§r§a, that did nothing. We're going to need something MUCH more powerful than TNT...
texts.That was quick... did you find anything?: That was quick... did you find anything?
texts.The entrance is a little to the northeas: The entrance is a little to the northeast. In fact, you should have passed it on your way to the spike.
texts.How can it be just a spike? It must be s: How can it be just a spike? It must be spreading corruption somehow.
texts.For once, I agree. I\u0027ll do it, you: For once, I agree. I'll do it, you guys just get clear.
texts.The small mining camp a little east of t: The small mining camp a little east of this village should have what you're looking for. Now Hurry!
texts.Corruption does not affect humans like o: Corruption does not affect humans like other beings. It’s much much slower, more like an infection of the mind to us.
texts.But what is it connected to? That’s for: But what is it connected to? That’s for another day. The main thing is the village is safe.
texts.Best of luck! Oh, and also, try not to d: Best of luck! Oh, and also, try not to die please. These ingredients do indeed promote environmental hazards.
texts.There are old cave systems around here f: There are old cave systems around here from the mining days. I sent two men down to excavate the spike, can you go down and help?
texts.Anyway, come meet me back at my tent, fr: Anyway, come meet me back at my tent, friend. We will discuss what to do then.
texts.Phew, glad nothing tragic happened there: Phew, glad nothing tragic happened there. This should be it, now go take it back down to the spike and destroy it once and for all!
texts.I am Orikal, I\u0027m trying to stop eve: I am Orikal, I'm trying to stop everyone here from killing each other.
texts.I came when I heard the explosion. I tho: I came when I heard the explosion. I thought you’d hurt yourselves.
texts.There used to be a small mining camp a l: There used to be a small mining camp a little east of this town. It's abandoned now, but you should still be able to find what you need there.
I see, you were sent to aid the public. Perfect.
texts.Well, I\u0027ll be darned. The spike goe: Well, I'll be darned. The spike goes this far down? And it looks like it goes even deeper than this!
texts.It will take a while for these people to: It will take a while for these people to recover, so I'll stay here watching over them while they do.
texts.Go away! I know you\u0027re angry but th: Go away! I know you're angry but there's nothing to gain her-
texts.You got \u0027em all! Excellent, this is: You got 'em all! Excellent, this is exactly what we need.
texts.Do you see all these spikes? I believe t: Do you see all these spikes? I believe they are the thing spreading corruption.
texts.I think that worked you know. It seems t: I think that worked you know. It seems the power of the spike comes from the root...
texts.Okay. I happen to know a recipe for crea: Okay. I happen to know a recipe for creating an extremely lethal magical explosive.
texts.Could you inspect the peak of the spike: Could you inspect the peak of the spike in the village for me? It might give me valuable insight. Thanks!
texts.Well, it\u0027s sorta complicated. That\: Well, it's sorta complicated. That's why I've decided to give our new friend here the job of acquiring this explosive.
texts.It\u0027s not the big ol\u0027 abandoned: It's not the big ol' abandoned mines, mind you. It's a smaller camp, in fact you should be able to see it from this village.

texts.Now, I\u0027m not sure how that works, b: Now, I'm not sure how that works, but it's best to not ask any questions.
texts.Did you know you can stash your items in: Did you know you can stash your items in your bank? You can even get them back at any other bank, any time!

texts.They\u0027re quite elusive, hiding in pi: They're quite elusive, hiding in piles of sand, but rumour has it that great riches come to those that hunt them!
texts.Have you heard of the rare Shinesting Sc: Have you heard of the rare Shinesting Scorpion, adventurer? You might be interested in searching one out.

texts.I mean, what would the Sodetas have thou: I mean, what would the Sodetas have thought? Well, I guess they probably wouldn't come all the way over from the Guild Hall to check anymore, §r§abut...still§r§a.
texts.This building has such rich history, it: This building has such rich history, it would've been an absolute shame to have lost it over just a pair of silly old boots.

texts.The Mansion has a deep history with this: The Mansion has a deep history with this land. The Twain's used to fight the corruption before the likes of Bob were around, although people seem to forget about them.
texts.He\u0027s pretending that he knows every: He's pretending that he knows everything about the House of Twain, but the mansion has so many secrets!
texts.Nesaak was not always frozen, as we\u002: Nesaak was not always frozen, as we'll probably never forget. But apparently the guy who did it is preserved in that hideout.
texts.The famous House of Twain lies to the so: The famous House of Twain lies to the south, in the area where the snow has melted.
texts.Have you been to the frozen cave to the: Have you been to the frozen cave to the northeast? There's some sort of mysterious hideout that everyone's afraid to enter.
texts.You\u0027ll never believe the fairy tale: You'll never believe the fairy tales Twendle has been telling! He just came through town, telling everyone about a journal he found.

texts.*Sob* Oh, I can\u0027t talk right now, b: *Sob* Oh, I can't talk right now, but I could use your help at level 69.

texts.Only the bravest adventurers who succeed: Only the bravest adventurers who succeed in my quest can enter the Temple of the Legends.
texts.Only brave warriors of level 68 may atte: Only brave warriors of level 68 may attempt to join this Temple.

texts.They brought lots of luxurious goods wit: They brought lots of luxurious goods with them. Most of them got lost in the wreck.
texts.As you may know, our people came to your: As you may know, our people came to your land years ago, and this is the ship they used.
texts.Hi, my name is Omango. I am a resident o: Hi, my name is Omango. I am a resident of the Maltic village, on top of the hill.
texts.If you can get your hand on this helmet,: If you can get your hand on this helmet, and find the treasure, I'll give you a part of it!
texts.Sayrr is probably fishing close by, on h: Sayrr is probably fishing close by, on his boat. Talk to him, he can help us. He's not short of a kind heart!
texts.But recently, this hole you can see has: But recently, this hole you can see has been opened. It is believed that fortune is hidden beneath the waves.
texts.Unfortunately, nobody has been able to e: Unfortunately, nobody has been able to explore this hole. It is too deep, no creature can survive underwater that long!
texts.When you finally have the helmet, explor: When you finally have the helmet, explore the ship and bring me back §r§3[4 Ancient Treasure]§r§a. Good luck.
texts.It would be madness to explore this hole: It would be madness to explore this hole without a breathing helmet!
texts.My old friend Sayrr is a fisherman, and: My old friend Sayrr is a fisherman, and I know that he has a very special helmet...

texts.Oh sorry, am I blocking the shelf? I\u00: Oh sorry, am I blocking the shelf? I'm doing some research concerning Siegfried. He plays quite an astounding role in the current history of Gavel.
texts.I used to not believe in the stories of: I used to not believe in the stories of his heroic quests, however I can't deny the fact that he and his life are well documented.
texts.After all, he is still alive and writing: After all, he is still alive and writing new books about his adventures, such as this one about his journey to slay an entire pack of werewolves threatening the town of Gelibord.
texts.Oh would you look at that, that actually: Oh would you look at that, that actually happened a week ago. He seems so selfless and brave, I can see why we tell our children about him.

texts.You\u0027ve wasted every chance you had: You've wasted every chance you had to turn back. And you're §r§a§oreally§r§a not going to like what happens now.

texts.Corkus has to suffer... They shut down t: Corkus has to suffer... They shut down the Factory, locked us up in there. Once we have both keys we can open it and you are NOT getting this one.

texts.Hmm... This doesn\u0027t look like me on: Hmm... This doesn't look like me on the picture...
texts.Oh! My passport was in my other pocket t: Oh! My passport was in my other pocket this whole time! Silly me! I hope you enjoy your flight! I love travelling by airship!
texts.I think mine has been stolen! Or maybe I: I think mine has been stolen! Or maybe I dropped it? No.. It was definitely in my pocket!
texts.Oh no, no, no! Where is it?: Oh no, no, no! Where is it?
texts.Excuse me, sir? Have you seen a passport: Excuse me, sir? Have you seen a passport around here?
texts.Found the passport yet? I\u0027m sure so: Found the passport yet? I'm sure someone knows something around here.
texts.This isn\u0027t my passport at all. Mayb: This isn't my passport at all. Maybe I should have given you a picture of myself!
texts.Great! Where is it? How did you get it!: Great! Where is it? How did you get it!
texts.Do you think you could help me? I don\u0: Do you think you could help me? I don't know what else to do! My flight leaves any second!
texts.I must have lost it a few minutes ago, i: I must have lost it a few minutes ago, if it was stolen, it couldn't have gone far. Please, look around and ask anyone for information!
texts.Finally! I saw you running around the ai: Finally! I saw you running around the airbase and knew you were onto something. Have you found my passport?
texts.Oh, that sounds fairly illegal. But so w: Oh, that sounds fairly illegal. But so was stealing it!
texts.You could easily use this to board an ai: You could easily use this to board an airship. I didn't think humans could have an official Gavel passport, but there it is!
texts.Thank you for trying, here take this for: Thank you for trying, here take this for your troubles. Oh wait...
In fact... It looks like... you.
I am very grateful that you got it back. And you went to such lengths too!

texts.The spirit of your dead friend must stil: The spirit of your dead friend must still be somewhere in this world. This is why we are unable to get close to his body. Soul magic works in mysterious ways.
texts.Don\u0027t worry, I can do it. I\u0027ve: Don't worry, I can do it. I've heard a little bit of Bob's story before. What a tragedy.
texts.How is your quest coming along? I am sti: How is your quest coming along? I am still waiting for the items I asked of you.
texts.This is something I unfortunately cannot: This is something I unfortunately cannot do myself. There is a blacksmith close to Ternaves who does this kind of stuff.
I'm glad to see you again.
Give me a minute, I need to concentrate...
texts.It is done. You should be able to enter: It is done. You should be able to enter the tomb now. Be careful.
texts.Welcome back to our humble little town!: Welcome back to our humble little town!
texts.Ooh, it has been a long time since I\u00: Ooh, it has been a long time since I've released an undead...
texts.Bring me the soul, and I\u0027ll be able: Bring me the soul, and I'll be able to remove the spell preventing you from entering the tomb.
texts.Welcome traveler. Are you looking for so: Welcome traveler. Are you looking for something?
texts.What he thought was his infallible prote: What he thought was his infallible protection got used against him.
texts.Now, we need two items. The first is som: Now, we need two items. The first is something from Bob himself. The other is the last thing that made his blood drop.
texts.We also need a part of the soul of your: We also need a part of the soul of your dead friend.
texts.Bring me §r§3[1 Rose]§r§a and §r§3[1 Bob: Bring me §r§3[1 Rose]§r§a and §r§3[1 Bob's Tear]§r§a. I'll wait for your return.
texts.Although... I might have forgot to tell: Although... I might have forgot to tell you about something else too...
texts.I only need a part of the soul, you can: I only need a part of the soul, you can keep the rest.
texts.He can extract the soul from someone\u00: He can extract the soul from someone's weapon. Very useful in those situations. Go talk to him.

texts.Go to the barracks in the corner of the: Go to the barracks in the corner of the desert and assassinate Commander Takan. Bring me his badge!
texts.There should be a way to sneak in from a: There should be a way to sneak in from a blasted hole on the far west side of the barracks that I escaped from.
texts.Please take this small reward as a token: Please take this small reward as a token of the city's appreciation.
texts.I was just about to lead the rest of my: I was just about to lead the rest of my army to retaliate, but perhaps there is a better way.
texts.However, the bandits that have taken ove: However, the bandits that have taken over the barracks will be too strong for you! You must use stealth instead of brawns.
texts.Since it would seem that Nemract needs m: Since it would seem that Nemract needs my army, I need you to take care of Takan. Who knows what he could be up to!
texts.I have no time for you, stranger! Run al: I have no time for you, stranger! Run along.
texts.In fact, the trail of blood I left behin: In fact, the trail of blood I left behind might lead you to him! You should be able to find him in the command room.
texts.Now run along, I have to collect my hono: Now run along, I have to collect my honorary badge for taking out Ex-Commander Takan.
texts.You... You did it?! What? How... I mean: You... You did it?! What? How... I mean good job, stranger.
texts.I have no time for you, stranger! Almuj\: I have no time for you, stranger! Almuj's army is in panic!
texts.After leaving Nemract, he came to Almuj\: After leaving Nemract, he came to Almuj's barracks and lead a surprise attack of bandits! Oh the carnage!
texts.You are here for Takan? In Bob\u0027s na: You are here for Takan? In Bob's name, of course he's a traitor!
You have done this city proud I suppose. Almuj stands for atleast one more day.
texts.I need you to assassinate Commander Taka: I need you to assassinate Commander Takan! Hurry stranger!
texts.You came too late, he has already caused: You came too late, he has already caused us much trouble!

texts.You did a great deed today, soldier! We: You did a great deed today, soldier! We can now use this cave to travel easily between Ragni and Detlas! Great job!
texts.Recruit, Captain Fenor told me to meet y: Recruit, Captain Fenor told me to meet you here, said if you came out on this side of that tunnel then you completed your mission!
texts.I\u0027m sorry, recruit, but that passag: I'm sorry, recruit, but that passage is blocked. We used to use it, but not anymore...
texts.Hello again, soldier! Doing great things: Hello again, soldier! Doing great things around the province, I presume?
texts.Halt! You cannot go down this cave, it i: Halt! You cannot go down this cave, it is blocked.

texts.Oh, a visitor? Interesting. I thought I: Oh, a visitor? Interesting. I thought I only knew about this cave, considering I was called crazy by my master.
texts.I\u0027ve lived down here for a while no: I've lived down here for a while now, studying the creepers. They are mythical in this region, and I want to prove everyone wrong.
texts.Don\u0027t worry about being trapped in: Don't worry about being trapped in here, though. There's a magic doorway right outside my house that can teleport you out if you wish to leave.

texts.Perhaps you could help when you are leve: Perhaps you could help when you are level 62, but right now, my problem is far too dangerous for you to help.

texts.Oh, I made a new discovery while you wer: Oh, I made a new discovery while you were gone. Time really is slower here!
texts.Aha! You\u0027re back! Great, hand me th: Aha! You're back! Great, hand me those flowers and I'll fix them up for you.
texts.Ah, hello! I never get visitors here, so: Ah, hello! I never get visitors here, so you must be the person Lacrona notified me about!
texts.I have no idea how, but think of the pos: I have no idea how, but think of the possibilities! Maybe we could live longer by staying here!
texts.For example, I found out that everything: For example, I found out that everything seems to be slowed down.
texts.Err, sorry. Look at me, going off on one: Err, sorry. Look at me, going off on one of my rants again...
texts.Here you go, the cleaned Ani-... no, Aer: Here you go, the cleaned Ani-... no, Aerolias! You should go before you get caught in another one of my lectures.
texts.But that can\u0027t be possible, right?: But that can't be possible, right? No magic is that strong!
texts.Oh! And you should bring those flowers b: Oh! And you should bring those flowers back to me once you get them, they need to be purified and cleaned!
texts.Have you found where the flowers are yet: Have you found where the flowers are yet? They should be in a cave on the outskirts of this Valley.
texts.Azalia flowers right? No... Aerolia! Yea: Azalia flowers right? No... Aerolia! Yeah, you can find those in a large, overgrown cave just outside this Valley.
texts.It is in the side of a big cliff. In fac: It is in the side of a big cliff. In fact, you should have passed it on your way here.
texts.It\u0027s really quite odd... almost as: It's really quite odd... almost as if time itself is crawling along more slowly!
texts.You should be careful though. This area: You should be careful though. This area has many unsolved mysteries about it.

texts.I saw them myself. They were headed nort: I saw them myself. They were headed north, towards all of those geysers.
texts.But recently, I saw an old Avos house do: But recently, I saw an old Avos house down on low ground, the same level as most human housing.
texts.Granted, it\u0027s not too far from the: Granted, it's not too far from the Avos mountains, but it is still rather unusual for an Avos to live so low...
texts.They escaped before they could be dealt: They escaped before they could be dealt with, however.
texts.Stories of the Avos have told us that th: Stories of the Avos have told us that they've always lived high up on the northern mountains.
texts.Apparently some old mining mechs were sp: Apparently some old mining mechs were spotted outside of town recently.

texts.What do you think you\u0027re doing down: 你在这里做什么？！这里是我的私人领地！
texts.Ah, good to see my cows are all in tip-t: 哈，看起来我的小牛们都很听话！嗯，是时候给它们喂些美食了。

texts.I need a strong traveler to explore this: I need a strong traveler to explore this cave for me...
texts.Hello there, young traveler! I can see t: Hello there, young traveler! I can see that you are looking for a challenge.
texts.Thank you again for your help!: Thank you again for your help!
texts.Have you found the §r§3[3 Saccharum]§r§a: Have you found the §r§3[3 Saccharum]§r§a yet? It shouldn't be too hard to find in this cave.
texts.Yes, this is exactly what I wanted!: Yes, this is exactly what I wanted!
texts.Well I got one for you. You see, I am lo: Well I got one for you. You see, I am looking for a specific plant named "Saccharum".
texts.I\u0027ve heard that this cave may conta: I've heard that this cave may contain some! Unfortunately, it is infested by spiders.
texts.Unfortunately, I do not think you are po: Unfortunately, I do not think you are powerful enough yet. Talk back to me when you are level 5.
texts.Thank you for your help. Here, take thes: Thank you for your help. Here, take these emeralds, you deserve them.
texts.I am not strong enough to risk this. Cou: I am not strong enough to risk this. Could you explore this cave and bring me §r§3[3 Saccharum]§r§a as soon as you can?

texts.As you can see though, we\u0027re having: As you can see though, we're having problems getting past this wall.
texts.Don\u0027t worry, it\u0027s been dormant: Don't worry, it's been dormant for hundreds of years. Now take this bucket and get moving! That cave behind you leads right up.
texts.By far the easiest way would be with lav: By far the easiest way would be with lava. Fire or magic seems to do nothing.
texts.Seems like you\u0027ve got a real knack: Seems like you've got a real knack for spider killing, would you be willing to tackle the queen?
texts.At ease, soldier! Good timing. We need m: At ease, soldier! Good timing. We need more manpower.
texts.So I\u0027ve got a mission for you, sold: So I've got a mission for you, soldier. Head to the top of Mount Wynn, the nearby volcano, and return with lava.
texts.I\u0027m counting on you, soldier. Get s: I'm counting on you, soldier. Get some lava from the top of Mount Wynn! It's not far from here.
texts.Think you can handle the spider queen on: Think you can handle the spider queen on your own? Well, head inside and we'll find out!
texts.Nivla forest has always been plagued by: Nivla forest has always been plagued by spider vermin. Thousands of them.
Ah perfect! Now give me that bucket.
texts.I\u0027ll keep dealing with the rest of: I'll keep dealing with the rest of the spiders in the forest.
texts.Stand clear, I\u0027m about to burn down: Stand clear, I'm about to burn down the webs!
texts.However the tides are about to turn. We\: However the tides are about to turn. We've found their nest!
texts.If we can kill the queen, we can control: If we can kill the queen, we can control the population.

texts.Attention passengers. There has been a m: Attention passengers. There has been a missing person reported aboard. If there are any volunteers to help search for them please report to the control deck and speak to the captain.

texts.It seems that when you knead it least, I: It seems that when you knead it least, I have plenty of flour. Maybe next time I'll have some for you!

texts.Hmm no gears or goggles.. You are no Cor: Hmm no gears or goggles.. You are no Corkian Human.
You must be here to see him.
texts.The chief said your people are welcome h: The chief said your people are welcome here.

texts.Maybe you\u0027ll be able to solve it, a: Maybe you'll be able to solve it, and if you can, I'll make sure to pay you a good sum for your services!
texts.Lo, adventurer! Welcome to the great pro: Lo, adventurer! Welcome to the great province of Gavel, home of the villager race, and yours truly.
texts.Legend says that he lived just beyond th: Legend says that he lived just beyond those gates, in the quartz city of Llevigar, and that he hid his fortune somewhere in the city!
texts.I have a riddle, the first of a number o: I have a riddle, the first of a number of clues that are supposed to lead to where Hastor hid his fortune, but I can't for the life of me figure it out.
texts.This first riddle goes like so: “§r§e§oT: This first riddle goes like so: “§r§e§oToward the sunset, among northern flowers shaded by quartz§r§a”.
texts.But enough with the pleasantries. Tell m: But enough with the pleasantries. Tell me... have you ever heard the tale of the great pirate, Captain Hastor? Sailed the seas a long time ago.
texts.I\u0027m a retired sailor now, but I cou: I'm a retired sailor now, but I could still do with a few extra emeralds from that treasure. Perhaps, if you're up to it... we could come to an agreement?
texts.I\u0027ve heard rumours that the others: I've heard rumours that the others are engraved on blocks of black stone; it may be a good idea to look for those.
texts.I do wish you good luck, adventurer! Rem: I do wish you good luck, adventurer! Remember, everything you need to solve the clues should be found somewhere inside Llevigar.

I still need you to bring me... Um..
texts.You, again? Oh, you have the.. brown one: You, again? Oh, you have the.. brown one.
texts.G-... Hi! What a coincidence, I... I act: G-... Hi! What a coincidence, I... I actually need you, yes.
texts.Well, I-... I can\u0027t make any soup w: Well, I-... I can't make any soup without my... bowl, hehe.
I have a title to keep! Mushroom. I-... I can't be called "The Mushroom Man" if I don't have any!.. Mushrooms.
texts.To eat my soup-.. Oh wait, I already got: To eat my soup-.. Oh wait, I already got some spoons.
texts.I guess I need to pay you now. Is §r§3[2: I guess I need to pay you now. Is §r§3[2 Emeralds]§r§a fine with you?
texts.Care to fix your mis-... mistake? Mushro: Care to fix your mis-... mistake? Mushrooms. Get me §r§3[1 Brown Mushroom]§r§a. Thanks.
texts.Oho okay, ok-... okay! It was a joke, do: Oho okay, ok-... okay! It was a joke, don't get all ex-... ex-... excited. Here, just take these and go away.
texts.There\u0027s a village hidden in this fo: There's a village hidden in this forest, I-... I remember they sell these. Mushroom? No, bowls. They sell bowls.
texts.I could r-really use a new spoon to eat: I could r-really use a new spoon to eat my m-m-mushroom soup with. Maybe... yellow- no wait, black!
texts.You see, um... I am out of... red mushro: You see, um... I am out of... red mushrooms. Yes. I need them. Mushrooms.
texts.What are you looking at? G-... Get me li: What are you looking at? G-... Get me like §r§3[3 Red Mushrooms]§r§a or something..! I'll give back the money someday, if you care that much.
texts.You are good at what you do. Can you get: You are good at what you do. Can you get me §r§3[1 Bowl]§r§a?
texts.Yes I did. I remember. Mushrooms. I\u002: Yes I did. I remember. Mushrooms. I'll still take what you have as pittance for your horrible job.
texts.H-... Hey! I didn\u0027t expected you to: H-... Hey! I didn't expected you to find it... Haha... Um...
texts.Oh, it\u0027s you. What? Red mushrooms?: Oh, it's you. What? Red mushrooms? I-... I'm pretty sure I asked for the brown ones.

texts.Please do something. Bring me back proof: Please do something. Bring me back proof of her death and I'll make sure to reward you greatly!
texts.Please help us! My name is Rynend, I am: Please help us! My name is Rynend, I am a poor villager of this town.
texts.Since last week, an evil witch has found: Since last week, an evil witch has found refuge in our old well.
texts.Please do something about the witch! Bri: Please do something about the witch! Bring me proof of her death.
texts.We aren\u0027t strong enough to kill it,: We aren't strong enough to kill it, and this is our only source of water.
texts.Please take this §r§3[1 Maltic Recommend: Please take this §r§3[1 Maltic Recommendation Letter]§r§a, I am sure it will help you someday!
texts.You did it! Thank you so much! Our town: You did it! Thank you so much! Our town will be eternally grateful.
texts.Though... we aren\u0027t a very rich pla: Though... we aren't a very rich place, most of our citizens left years ago to make a fortune in Detlas.

texts.Well, shiver me timbers! Some swashbuckl: Well, shiver me timbers! Some swashbuckler has come to plunder me treasure. But ye'll have to get through me crew and I if you want me booty!
texts.So I invite you to continue. I encourage: So I invite you to continue. I encourage it, even. For if you should foray into my domain...
texts.I will allow you to return now... and I: I will allow you to return now... and I will ensure you remember what you have seen here.
texts.Oh, it seems I have a guest. You\u0027re: Oh, it seems I have a guest. You're just in time for dinner... hehe..
texts.Well, looks like you came through yet ag: Well, looks like you came through yet again Nick.
texts.The forces of the Humans could not save: The forces of the Humans could not save me when I hid here, and they can’t save you either.
texts.Across the seas, me name is feared. A la: Across the seas, me name is feared. A landlubber like you won't lay a hand on me treasure!
texts.Ah, but if you had only said so sooner!: Ah, but if you had only said so sooner! They have already left this mortal §r§acoil...oh§r§a, what a shame.
texts.Hush now. I will ensure that you and you: Hush now. I will ensure that you and your family are reunited. You will even be able to partake §r§ain...keheh..§r§a.§r§a§ofamily outings§r§a, under my watchful eye...
texts.Aha, naive girl. How cute, you believe y: Aha, naive girl. How cute, you believe you have a choice in the matter. What you want, is not what I need.
texts.My poor babies are starving. But what sh: My poor babies are starving. But what shall they feast on? How about... you?
So take the gem, my little soldier boy. I eagerly await our next meeting, keheheh...
texts.Do you see how easily this place fell? H: Do you see how easily this place fell? How quickly I became its master? And how I could simply dispose of you without a second thought?
texts.Oh, uh... Hi... Well, this is a little a: 喔，呃...嗨...好吧，这还是太尴尬了...我还是...溜了吧。
texts.HEEEELP! I can\u0027t outrun them!!! Gua: HEEEELP! I can't outrun them!!! Guards! Someone!!
texts.You dare enter these sewers, human? Thes: You dare enter these sewers, human? These pipes once hid the civilians of Ragni during raids… Now it just holds corpses.
texts.Such fragile beings, humans. So very eas: Such fragile beings, humans. So very easily influenced. Heartbroken, made hopeless. Your ties only serve to weaken you.
texts.But if yer really fixin\u0027 to get me: But if yer really fixin' to get me booty, ye'll have to face me in combat!
texts.There would be simply no chance for you: There would be simply no chance for you to survive. And then, I will be free to string you up like a lifeless little puppet.
texts.Y§r§4§ko§r§au opened my tomb... And a ne: Y§r§4§ko§r§au opened my tomb... And a new §r§4force§r§a spread §r§4§kwithin§r§a.
texts.Keheh... Come further, little human... S: Keheh... Come further, little human... Step into the shadows...

texts.Oh, finally, someone has come to this hi: Oh, finally, someone has come to this hidden village!
texts.We\u0027re running low on ravine grains,: We're running low on ravine grains, which is our main staple we use for our food.
texts.You\u0027re fine? Oh, good to hear. Did: You're fine? Oh, good to hear. Did you manage to get rid of the pigmen and their explosives?
texts.There\u0027s a Pigman Overlord that some: There's a Pigman Overlord that sometimes hangs in a cave nearby. If you can kill it, you can get a pigman hide strong enough to make the mask.
texts.I have an idea. I need to know for sure: I have an idea. I need to know for sure that they live there. A merchant can make you a mask with the skin and another material.
texts.Go get the pigman hide, and then come ba: Go get the pigman hide, and then come back to me so I can tell you what to do next.
texts.This powder is definitely not native to: This powder is definitely not native to this area. It has to have come from those creepers.
texts.There is a Mask Merchant in this village: There is a Mask Merchant in this village. He can make you a mask with the two materials I have.
texts.The last time we entered, I heard an exp: The last time we entered, I heard an explosion from the top. I fear the pigmen are blowing up our grain supply with TNT...
texts.If you continue on the western path past: If you continue on the western path past the tunnel entrance, you should find a camp where the Overlord is located.
texts.We usually get it ourselves, but recentl: We usually get it ourselves, but recently an angry group of pigmen took over the tunnel to the top of the ravine, where the grain grows.
texts.I see you have the hide. This skin will: I see you have the hide. This skin will work perfectly for my plan.
texts.Besides, if they are composed of gunpowd: Besides, if they are composed of gunpowder, they could easily blow this ravine to pieces.
texts.Feel free to come back to our village an: Feel free to come back to our village any time. By then our food supply should be stable.
texts.Also, if you somehow lose the mask, the: Also, if you somehow lose the mask, the merchant can make you another one if you bring him another piece of skin and hide.
texts.A green creature? A \"creeper\"? No such: A green creature? A "creeper"? No such thing exists in this world, especially with the pigmen all around!
texts.What\u0027s this? It smells like §r§agun: What's this? It smells like §r§agunpowder...but§r§a more earthy. And this came from the cave?
texts.You appear to be much stronger than I am: You appear to be much stronger than I am, so maybe you can get past the tunnel pigmen and eliminate the explosions at the top.
texts.There\u0027s a large cave over to the so: There's a large cave over to the south. I tried to enter it, but I got ambushed by green creatures...
texts.Thanks again for your help. Now we can t: Thanks again for your help. Now we can truly say creepers exist here in the ravines.
texts.Here are the materials. Be careful out t: Here are the materials. Be careful out there. Who knows what those green monsters could do to you...
texts.I thought I was just dreaming, but these: I thought I was just dreaming, but these "creepers" you talk §r§aabout...they§r§a might live in that cave.
texts.To get to the creeper cave, follow the w: To get to the creeper cave, follow the western path and turn left at the pigman camps.
texts.I am Thomas, and I help manage the suppl: I am Thomas, and I help manage the supplies for this ravine village. Though, I have a bit of a problem...
texts.So, what was in the cave? Were there rea: So, what was in the cave? Were there really creepers in there?
texts.Just keep to the right wall of the ravin: Just keep to the right wall of the ravine and climb up the stairs to reach the entrance. Also, be careful in the tunnel, as the pigmen throw rocks as a weapon.
texts.I see you\u0027ve come back, but you don: I see you've come back, but you don't have what I asked for. I can't do anything until you fulfill your task.
texts.Oh, you brought a piece of skin back. Ho: Oh, you brought a piece of skin back. How odd, I've seen this skin before...
texts.With the mask, you can put it on and go: With the mask, you can put it on and go undetected into the cave with these "creepers". Only then will we know the truth.
texts.Thank you for your help. I guess you des: Thank you for your help. I guess you deserve some sort of reward, considering you helped solve the ravine's big mystery.
texts.I didn\u0027t expect you to fall out of: I didn't expect you to fall out of the sky like that. Are you okay, or should I go get the potion merchant to heal you?
texts.I guess for now we\u0027ll leave them at: I guess for now we'll leave them at peace. If they do exist, they don't need to be hunted down to extinction.

texts.You\u0027re one of the new recruits from: 你一定就是从Fruma来的那些勇士中的一员！你在寻找前往Ragni的路吗？
texts.The castle is right along this path, fol: 你只要跟着这条道路一路向东就能到达城堡了，不会花掉太长时间。

REPORT... COVER HAS BEEN COMPROMISED... TWO UNAUTHORIZED INTRUDERS... OUTSIDE OF BASE.

texts.The minimum requirement is level 75 for: The minimum requirement is level 75 for this flight.
texts.I am sorry, this is a private flight for: I am sorry, this is a private flight for experienced customers only.
texts.May I see your passport please?: May I see your passport please?
texts.Well everything seems to be in order, cl: Well everything seems to be in order, climb aboard and I hope you have a pleasant journey.
texts.You may now board the airship! Enjoy you: You may now board the airship! Enjoy your flight!
texts.It\u0027s a bit dusty! It looks very old: It's a bit dusty! It looks very old, but the picture looks like you.
texts.Good day, sir! Will you be flying with u: Good day, sir! Will you be flying with us today?
texts.Can I see your passport please? Oh, with: Can I see your passport please? Oh, without a passport, I'm afraid you can not board.

texts.You may either go through this door to c: You may either go through this door to claim your reward and turn back and continue the challenge.
texts.The first 3 tiers have three challengers: The first 3 tiers have three challengers each, while the last, Diamond, has the final challenger.
texts.Mo\u0027in, and welcome to Legendary Isl: Mo'in, and welcome to Legendary Island, home of the Legendary Challenge!
texts.Between fights you\u0027ll be able to re: Between fights you'll be able to restock on resources if necessary.
texts.The Legendary Challenge consists of 10 p: The Legendary Challenge consists of 10 powerful enemies, mostly based on some familiar faces.
texts.The Challenge is divided into four tiers: The Challenge is divided into four tiers: §r§6Bronze§r§a, §r§fSilver§r§a, §r§eGold§r§a, and §r§bDiamond§r§a.
texts.Hello, are you here to forfeit? If you q: Hello, are you here to forfeit? If you quit now you will receive...
texts.Between each fight, you\u0027ll have to: Between each fight, you'll have to option to forfeit to claim a reward, or continue to risk a greater reward.
texts.Someone will let you know what rewards y: Someone will let you know what rewards you'll receive before you forfeit.
texts.If you fail during a fight, you\u0027ll: If you fail during a fight, you'll receive no reward at all and will have to try again from the beginning.

texts.There was no time to evacuate, so I told: There was no time to evacuate, so I told them to go inside and block their doors. I just hope they all listened.

texts.You can find it by following the path ou: You can find it by following the path outside of my house to the west. Just a small place with a few houses, shouldn't be too hard to find. Now get going, I don't have anything else to tell you.
texts.Ah so you are looking for some informati: Ah so you are looking for some information. Well I'm afraid I don't know anything about nothin', my memory isn't what it used to be you know!
texts.I might remember a thing or two, though,: I might remember a thing or two, though, given the right set of circumstances. I've heard of a lot of ominous ongoings in Olux, but it would take a little persuasion to part with my knowledge.
texts.And what do you think you\u0027re doing,: And what do you think you're doing, wandering into the home of the great Daxe?
texts.Risky business, dealing with the authori: Risky business, dealing with the authorities, even if it is through a foreign messenger. If you part with §r§3[64 Emeralds] §r§ait might just jog my memory.
texts.I mean it, do not go there without this: I mean it, do not go there without this rope, or you might not get anything out of them at all.
texts.Why yes, I remember. I heard there was s: Why yes, I remember. I heard there was some people in a small village that work in a... well.. less than legal facility. You ought to drill them for information about what exactly they do.
texts.Careful though, they are quick to resort: Careful though, they are quick to resort to violence. Take this rope with you to ensure you get the information you need.
texts.Take the path outside of my house to the: Take the path outside of my house to the west. There you will find the factory workers.

texts.Our warriors have been massacred! We are: Our warriors have been massacred! We are completely defenseless!
texts.His name is Takan. He\u0027s been acting: His name is Takan. He's been acting strange ever since his brother was sentenced to death by Admiral Amerigo.
texts.He is the reason our warriors are dead!: He is the reason our warriors are dead! He lead them into a trap, I'm sure of it!
texts.Sadly, I can\u0027t prove of his treache: Sadly, I can't prove of his treachery. I desperately need your help! You must investigate further!
texts.These are dark times, weary traveler! Ne: These are dark times, weary traveler! Nemract is at its weakest!
texts.Go talk to Admiral Amerigo in Almuj. Ask: Go talk to Admiral Amerigo in Almuj. Ask him about Takan, then ask him for reinforcements immediately!
texts.We once had a brave commander who lead u: We once had a brave commander who lead us to victory, but I fear he has turned!
texts.What!? You don\u0027t know how to reach: What!? You don't know how to reach Almuj? Just venture past Saint's Row and through the savannah!

texts.The colonists weren\u0027t lying, you hu: The colonists weren't lying, you humans are great at what you do!
texts.Gavel isn\u0027t like your homeland, you: Gavel isn't like your homeland, you won't find the hideous undead here. We have a much more lively problem.
texts.You can find the orcs in camps near the: You can find the orcs in camps near the city or along the paths, I'm not sure exactly where they hide these days. Come back when you have the heads of Dolg, Visbe and Elak.
texts.You should hang around here until you ge: You should hang around here until you get a little better acquainted with the creatures of our province!
texts.I wish you the best of luck in your trav: I wish you the best of luck in your travels.
texts.Oh ho ho! A new traveller, fresh from th: Oh ho ho! A new traveller, fresh from the province of Wynn I see!
texts.You can find the orcs in camps near the: You can find the orcs in camps near the city or along the paths, I'm not sure exactly where they hide these days. Come back when you have the heads of Dolg, Visbe, and Elak.
texts.When you\u0027re ready to leave you shou: When you're ready to leave you should head north towards Olux, it's the next major city. But be wary, the swamp isn't the most friendly place.
texts.We can\u0027t stop all the orcs, or we r: We can't stop all the orcs, or we risk an all out war with the “Green skins” but we can control their population.
texts.The colonials tell us you guys love to g: The colonials tell us you guys love to grab work when available!
texts.In our lands, mythical creatures threate: In our lands, mythical creatures threaten us. Orcs, in particular are causing us major problems. To control their population, we need to kill their leaders.
texts.If you can bring me the heads of the Orc: If you can bring me the heads of the Orc Chieftans Dolg, Visbe, and Elak, the city of Llevigar will reward you.

texts.In search of a pirate\u0027s gold, old c: In search of a pirate's gold, old chap! But first we'll need a treasure map.
texts.I think I know where we can nab a chart,: I think I know where we can nab a chart, but you're going to need a lion's heart!
texts.Captain Goldenclaw was the best pirate t: Captain Goldenclaw was the best pirate to date, although eventually he met his grim fate...
Welcome back, new acquaintance of mine. Seems you managed to get that map just fine!
texts.So how about it, shall we set sail? If y: So how about it, shall we set sail? If you're scared to go, this is your last chance to bail!
texts.That is my ship, the Little Wing. But I\: That is my ship, the Little Wing. But I'm afraid it's not ready for boarding.
texts.He still lies with the map we need to ge: He still lies with the map we need to get our ship in motion. To find him, follow the flowers with the color of the ocean.
texts.Captain Goldenclaw still lies with the m: Captain Goldenclaw still lies with the map we need to get our ship in motion. They say to find him, you must follow the flowers with the color of the ocean.
texts.Gateway Island? Must be where Goldenclaw: Gateway Island? Must be where Goldenclaw buried his treasure. If we can find where it's hidden, it shall bring us both great pleasure!
texts.Let\u0027s go, just you and me! On a gra: Let's go, just you and me! On a grand voyage across the sea!
texts.Hop aboard my ship so we can cross the w: Hop aboard my ship so we can cross the water, Little Wing is what I like to call her.

texts.Thank you for your help. Here, take this: Thank you for your help. Here, take this as payment for your hard work.
texts.Wonderful! That\u0027s exactly what I wa: Wonderful! That's exactly what I wanted.
texts.Thank you for your help. Our hourglass i: Thank you for your help. Our hourglass is working better than ever!
texts.Fortunately, another city was built base: Fortunately, another city was built based off of Detlas, the ocean city of Selchar.
texts.It\u0027s in the middle of the ocean. Yo: It's in the middle of the ocean. You think you could go there for us? Bring me §r§3[12 Hourglass Sand]§r§a.
texts.Our city has some work for you, but I am: Our city has some work for you, but I am afraid you are too low level. Come back to me when you are level 28.
texts.They have a very similar hourglass. I\u0: They have a very similar hourglass. I'm sure they wouldn't mind us taking a bit of their sand, it is magic afterall.
texts.I am glad to see you! Detlas needs your: I am glad to see you! Detlas needs your help!
texts.You see this giant hourglass? It\u0027s: You see this giant hourglass? It's losing its sand as we speak. Soon enough, it will be empty!

texts.I have received reports of a strange cur: I have received reports of a strange cursed sheep taking refuge in one of the more fortified ruins around there.
texts.As far as I know, it is trapped in the r: As far as I know, it is trapped in the ruins by some jungle growth, though if it was cut down it might escape...
texts.If you are heading towards the Great Bri: If you are heading towards the Great Bridge, be cautious in the plains around the jungle entrance.

texts.I can\u0027t believe what is happening t: 我简直不敢相信刚刚发生了什么！
texts.I also have these strange potions. I hav: 我这里还有一些奇怪的药水。我无法使用它们，但是我相信这对你会非常有用！
texts.The King ordered me to bake cakes for al: 我们的国王要求我给全部的新勇士烤一堆蛋糕！
texts.Unfortunately I don\u0027t have the ingr: 不幸的是，我现在没有足够的原材料来制作蛋糕，而且这座城市内也没有人出售这些材料。
texts.I still need §r§3[2 Eggs]§r§a, §r§3[1 Mi: 我还在等着§r§3[2 鸡蛋]§r§a，§r§3[1 牛奶]§r§a和§r§3[3 小麦]§r§a！
texts.I urgently need help! But you aren\u0027: 我现在急需帮助...但是你目前还没有足够的能力帮助我。
texts.Great! You got all the ingredients!: 太棒了！你拿到了全部的原料！
texts.I can\u0027t thank you enough! Here, tak: 实在太感谢你了！拿着，用这些绿宝石去买些好东西吧。
当你到达等级4时，请尽快过来找我。
texts.You should practice your cooking, maybe: You should practice your cooking, maybe one day you'll become a master chef like myself!
texts.You can get eggs in Maltic, by killing s: 你可以通过杀死一些在Maltic或农场内的鸡来获取鸡蛋。
texts.You can get milk by buying a bucket and: 你可以在Ragni北边的农场内从卖奶商那里买到牛奶。
texts.You think you could get me §r§3[2 Egg]§r: 你可以帮我找来§r§3[2 鸡蛋]§r§a，§r§3[1 牛奶]§r§a和§r§3[3 小麦]§r§a吗？越快越好！
texts.You can get wheat by buying some from th: 你可以在Ragni北出口旁的农夫那买到一些小麦。

texts.Have you visited the prestigious Temple: Have you visited the prestigious Temple of Legends, yet, adventurer?
texts.No one lives there anymore, aside from a: No one lives there anymore, aside from an old tribe and someone who thought they should live in a mansion there.
texts.It\u0027s hard to gain access, though. T: It's hard to gain access, though. There are many trials that you must go through in order to enter.
texts.Supposedly, inside this temple, there wa: Supposedly, inside this temple, there was some sort of powerful construct to test the skill of warriors.
texts.There\u0027s a village with a native tri: There's a village with a native tribe elsewhere in the jungle.
texts.Have you heard of the Dernel Jungle? It: Have you heard of the Dernel Jungle? It lies to the south. The ruins of ancient civilizations scatter the lands.
texts.I\u0027ve heard all of the greatest hero: I've heard all of the greatest heroes from across the province all go to the temple to train to become as good as Bob.
texts.I\u0027ve heard rumors that their villag: I've heard rumors that their village was once home to a great library or temple of some kind.

texts.Arghh... there\u0027s a stowaway on me s: Arghh... there's a stowaway on me ship! Do ye know what I do with stowaways, landlubber? I make them walk the plank!
texts.Hehe... I\u0027ll cut off yer head and m: Hehe... I'll cut off yer head and mount it on me ship!

texts.Not even the most remote tower of this c: Not even the most remote tower of this castle is left unguarded! Unless it's lunch time, of course...

texts.What is this taste? Mushrooms? This can\: What is this taste? Mushrooms? This can't b-
texts.Ah, you must be the one my assistant tol: Ah, you must be the one my assistant told me about.
texts.If you are trying to stop me, it\u0027s: If you are trying to stop me, it's too late. I already drank the pot-...

texts.Being so close to Troms, it’s become a m: Being so close to Troms, it’s become a major problem.
texts.This is the second cave in the jungle to: This is the second cave in the jungle to start spewing out aggressive slimes.
texts.We tried to attack it, but this barrier: We tried to attack it, but this barrier is shaman magic. No one in the Wynn province uses such dirty magic.
texts.Ah, I didn’t expect to see a Ragni soldi: Ah, I didn’t expect to see a Ragni soldier out here. Perhaps you can assist me.
The only clue we found is this riddle...
texts.We haven’t been able to work it out. Hea: We haven’t been able to work it out. Head out to the Great Bridge entrance and see if you can find anything.
texts.Stay back! I\u0027m casting a fireball a: Stay back! I'm casting a fireball at this barrier!

texts.It\u0027s really hard to miss. Just hop: It's really hard to miss. Just hop on!
texts.It\u0027s an independant island to the w: It's an independant island to the west. In fact.. If you want to go...
texts.We\u0027re looking for Wynn representati: We're looking for Wynn representatives. Head to the C.S.S Wavebreaker down at the dock if you want to experience Corkus. Enjoy Corkus if you go!
texts.I\u0027m not from around here. In fact I: I'm not from around here. In fact I am from Corkus.
The  boat is down at the dock.

texts.What can I do fer ye?: What can I do fer ye?
texts.I\u0027m sorry but everyfin is sold out,: I'm sorry but everyfin is sold out, everyone is preparing for Craftmas lad.
texts.I might have something on the attic, if: I might have something on the attic, if you find anyfin, you can 'ave it. I know how difficult it gets.

texts.If you ever need something in the future: If you ever need something in the future, you should visit me in my homeland.
texts.I would\u0027ve gone after it, but the t: I would've gone after it, but the things I have in this caravan are too important to leave by themselves. Not to mention that the cave seemed to corrupt from the inside out...
texts.You\u0027ve met a terrible fate, haven\u: You've met a terrible fate, haven't you? I was just about to run the whole way to Nemract to get help.
texts.To thank you for your help, I wanted to: To thank you for your help, I wanted to give you a special mask, but I'm out of it. Maybe next year?
texts.However, along the way, a valuable curse: However, along the way, a valuable cursed mask escaped from my caravan and somehow made its way into the dark mine over there!
texts.I would really like to hear what you enc: I would really like to hear what you encountered in that cave, but I must prepare to leave, for I have many masks to sell on a far away continent.
texts.You must help me retrieve the mask, for: You must help me retrieve the mask, for I must depart in 3 days! Could you brave the shadowy cave and bring it back?
texts.Please help me find that mask! It\u0027s: Please help me find that mask! It's very valuable.
texts.You see, I was just on my way back from: You see, I was just on my way back from that large mansion near Nesaak, where I went to acquire some antiques from an old business partner.
texts.Hmm... Let\u0027s see, wha- Ah! Oh, pard: Hmm... Let's see, wha- Ah! Oh, pardon me, I was distracted. Luckily you're here, because I require some assistance.
texts.Maybe you can visit me at some point, if: Maybe you can visit me at some point, if our paths were to ever cross again. Then we could talk about your journey.

texts.Hey! You are not allowed in there!: Hey! You are not allowed in there!
texts.Greetings, are you in need of assistance: Greetings, are you in need of assistance?

Mmh. g... uh! oh, why hello there.
texts.F-fine! I guess it wouldn\u0027t h-h-hur: F-fine! I guess it wouldn't h-h-hurt to tell...*burp*..you where it-it- he is...
texts.It\u0027s in the old c-c-cathedral, at t: It's in the old c-c-cathedral, at the end of the town. Walk east, it should be right after the b-b-bridge.
texts.Ohh mmhhhgg... g-g-good old Nemract whis: Ohh mmhhhgg... g-g-good old Nemract whiskey!
texts.Though, the p-p-priest might not let you: Though, the p-p-priest might not let you go in that easily...
texts.My brother? Oh yes, I do know where he i: My brother? Oh yes, I do know where he is "buried", but do I want to tell you? No, It's none of your business.

texts.Only the most powerful warriors are wort: Only the most powerful warriors are worthy to face me. And by the looks of it, you barely made the cut.

texts.But is it enough? I don\u0027t know if t: But is it enough? I don't know if the three of us are going to be enough to protect the town from...

texts.Do you know why the swamp is so miserabl: Do you know why the swamp is so miserable? It's because of a mysterious force known as the Decay.
It's all ridiculous, if you ask me. It's just a stupid excuse to get everyone to buy monster-protection dust.
texts.You won\u0027t believe the crazy stories: You won't believe the crazy stories people have been telling. Everyone keeps reporting sightings of supposed snake-men.
texts.It has spread across a few cities in nor: It has spread across a few cities in northern Gavel. People have begun to believe it is a curse because of our desire for money.
texts.And I suppose it is true, in a way. Afte: And I suppose it is true, in a way. After so many raids from the monsters spawned from the decay, our city of Olux has become very poor.
texts.They even go as far to say the snake-men: They even go as far to say the snake-men built a temple into the side of a hill just south-west of town.

texts.I §r§afear...that§r§a he may be §r§agoin: I §r§afear...that§r§a he may be §r§agoing...too§r§a far. It could §r§abe...too§r§a dangerous to allow. If you will help...
texts.Get me...§r§3[8 Red Mushroom]§r§a, quick: Get me...§r§3[8 Red Mushroom]§r§a, quickly. I §r§acan...alter§r§a the potion to §r§abe...less§r§a effective.
I §r§awas...in§r§a support of §r§athis...but§r§a then, he accrued essence §r§aof...the§r§a corruption to mix into §r§athe...elixir§r§a.
texts.Quickly, get me...§r§3[8 Red Mushroom]§r: Quickly, get me...§r§3[8 Red Mushroom]§r§a. I §r§acan...alter§r§a the potion to §r§abe...less§r§a effective.
texts.Enter the house here, §r§aand...confront: Enter the house here, §r§aand...confront§r§a my master in his lab...
texts.Now. §r§aI...do§r§a not want you saying: Now. §r§aI...do§r§a not want you saying anything §r§aabout...these§r§a events. Take these, §r§aand...never§r§a speak of this again.
texts.My §r§amaster...wishes§r§a to create a v: My §r§amaster...wishes§r§a to create a very dangerous potion...a transformative elixir of invincibility...
texts.You §r§amust...ensure§r§a that it has wo: You §r§amust...ensure§r§a that it has worked. §r§aYou...are§r§a much stronger than I, stranger...
texts.I only §r§ahope...that§r§a my master wil: I only §r§ahope...that§r§a my master will not §r§abe...angry§r§a with me about this. §r§aIt...was§r§a for the better.

texts.I came to see if I could help out. But i: I came to see if I could help out. But it looks like you've done it.
texts.Hope you all have a merry craftmas. Ho-h: Hope you all have a merry craftmas. Ho-ho!
texts.Well, I guess there is only one thing le: Well, I guess there is only one thing left to do to complete this scene.

texts.That story sounds amazing, Siegfried mus: That story sounds amazing, Siegfried must be as legendary as they say. I wish I could have been there to see it.
I hope someone deals with them some day. They could come in here and steal all of my money!
texts.But then salvation came, as Siegfried ro: But then salvation came, as Siegfried rode in on his mighty steed. He slew the army of beasts with ease.
texts.I heard from my friend’s mother’s hairdr: I heard from my friend’s mother’s hairdresser about how Siegfried saved Llevigar!
texts.An army of trolls marched from their cam: An army of trolls marched from their camps into the city. The guardsmen were overwhelmed.
texts.He had killed them all before they could: He had killed them all before they could even deal a blow to him. He even had time to pose for a picture.
texts.What looks like a village to the south-e: What looks like a village to the south-east is actually something more. It's a base filled with sky pirates!
texts.After the dust cleared, Siegfried stood: After the dust cleared, Siegfried stood proudly atop the pile of troll corpses.
texts.I\u0027ve heard that they were the ones: I've heard that they were the ones responsible for shooting down that airship that was on its way to Detlas.
texts.I\u0027m so glad Sky\u0027s Kitchen reop: I'm so glad Sky's Kitchen reopened recently. The food there is delicious!

texts.I heard it\u0027s a dangerous road to th: 我听说前往城堡的路上险象环生，但所幸你身上有武器。
texts.I swear I hit this same dang boulder eve: I swear I hit this same dang boulder everytime I make this trip.
texts.Yep, even seems like I got a pile of was: Yep, even seems like I got a pile of wasted wheels stacking up.
texts.This is as far as we go, right to the bo: 我最多只能带你到这了，前面就是边境了。
texts.Wait one moment, I have something to tel: 稍等片刻，我还有事要和你说！右键我来与我对话。
texts.Finally, you\u0027re awake! Everyone alr: 你终于醒了！其他人已经先走一步了。
texts.The King is waiting for you in Ragni. Th: Ragni的国王还在等着你。穿过这扇门就进入Wynn省了，所以城堡应该不会距离太远。
texts.What are you waiting for? Go ahead, the: 你还在等什么？快出发吧，国王还在等着你。
texts.Sorry we couldn\u0027t take you all the: 抱歉我无法带你到目的地了，这是退还给你的部分路费。用这些绿宝石给自己买些护甲吧。

texts.I\u0027ve recently run out of a special: I've recently run out of a special material called the Aerolia Flower.
texts.His name is Asher, and should be living: His name is Asher, and should be living in a house near one of the many ruins in the Valley.
texts.Ah, you have returned! And with the flow: Ah, you have returned! And with the flowers I see!
texts.Nice to see you again. How have the boot: Nice to see you again. How have the boots been for you?
texts.I have a student researching the area an: I have a student researching the area and it's unique effects. He should know where they are.
texts.There is a path near the western entranc: There is a path near the western entrance of Nivla Woods that leads straight into Time Valley.
texts.Bring me §r§3[4 Aerolia Flower]. §r§aTha: Bring me §r§3[4 Aerolia Flower]. §r§aThat should be enough.
texts.Thank you very much. I\u0027ll bring you: Thank you very much. I'll bring your reward right away.
texts....Here§r§a you go. These boots should s: ...Here§r§a you go. These boots should serve you well.
texts.The flower is only found around the magi: The flower is only found around the magical Time Valley, which lies south of Nivla Woods.
texts.I create and sell special armor as a hob: I create and sell special armor as a hobby called Aerolia Boots, and the Aerolias are a key component.
texts.Hello adventurer. You\u0027ve happened t: Hello adventurer. You've happened to come at the perfect time.
texts.Hmm...I have something that needs to be: Hmm...I have something that needs to be done, but you do not appear to be strong enough. Come back when you're Level 14.
texts.If you do this for me, I\u0027ll reward: If you do this for me, I'll reward you with emeralds and a pair of boots.

texts.Ah, the new recruits. I\u0027m afraid yo: Ah, the new recruits. I'm afraid you won't be able to pass through here yet.
texts.Somehow a bunch of corrupt sieged the un: Somehow a bunch of corrupt sieged the underpass. It's not safe to go in unarmed. You three need weapons first.
texts.Looks like you are all in order, I hope: Looks like you are all in order, I hope you know how to use it. You may pass, but be careful, it's still very dangerous.
texts.You should be able to use the nearby cra: You should be able to use the nearby crafting stations to forge your own.

texts.It may seem weird, a love between a vill: 或许这听上去很怪,村民与人类之间的禁断之爱。我知道,不过我们的种族并不能阻止我们相爱着对方。
texts.A letter? Oh, that. The one about Eltom?: 一封信？哦，那个啊。那一封关于Eltom的？别太担心了。我很保守的。
texts.Yes, I know about Eltom. After all, its: 是的, 我知道一些关于Eltom的事. 言而总之, 它的市长是我的前任丈夫.
texts.Huh, oh yeah, one more thing. The switch: 呃，哦对，还有一件事。有在桌子底下有个开关...来吧，按下它！
texts.Ardulf will never be accepted… A half br: Ardulf永远不会被接受...一个混血...我希望它过的好点
texts.What brings a human to my office?: 是什么让一个人类来到我的办公室？
texts.Let\u0027s keep what happened here a sec: 把这里发生的事当作一个秘密，好吗？
texts.The person who left the letter about Elt: 留下那封Eltom的信件的人是我们的儿子，Ardulf。一旦Eoric发现了关于我们儿子的事，他惊慌失措地离开了我。

texts.If you find the right one, I guess you c: If you find the right one, I guess you can find the power source. However these holes do not work in both direction, you might end up somewhere else when you step back.
texts.What did you find? What does it look lik: What did you find? What does it look like? I admit, I've never even seen it..
texts.A room with a blue beam inside it? And i: A room with a blue beam inside it? And it said >High Voltage<? Oh boy. My grandfather told me a story about overloads in the system.
texts.Let\u0027s hope that in a couple hundred: Let's hope that in a couple hundred years, the next generations know how to deal with it. Maybe I should write it down, nah I'm sure it won't happen again.
texts.Sorry, I\u0027m not used to such a big m: Sorry, I'm not used to such a big mess, just follow the instructions I gave you.
texts.It\u0027s a fault in the system. The cha: It's a fault in the system. The chances are so slim that it was approved for construction anyway, but it could lead to the destruction of Llevigar.
texts.There is an entrance up there with an aw: There is an entrance up there with an awful buzzing noise coming from it. Good luck.
texts.I have no idea how to navigate the syste: I have no idea how to navigate the system, but your best bet is to head up those stairs.
texts.No one has looked after this place in hu: No one has looked after this place in hundreds of years. My great grandfather was the last known engineer that understood this place.
texts.You should go back to Zenam, he will hav: You should go back to Zenam, he will have your contract payment. I had my doubts about a human expert on magical villager technology, but you really pulled through. The exit is through the sewers.
texts.Ah, you must be the expert. Did Zenam te: Ah, you must be the expert. Did Zenam tell you about the entrance? It took us two weeks just to find it.
texts.I had the easiest job ever, until the po: I had the easiest job ever, until the power started going haywire. Now all the blueprints are lost and no one understands this magical technology.
texts.What\u0027s that? You did it? Well, obvi: What's that? You did it? Well, obviously. The system seems to be returning to normal.
texts.I\u0027m not sure how a human like yours: I'm not sure how a human like yourself is an expert on this, but I'm not one to take away responsibility from someone else.
texts.I guess you can start with the weird hol: I guess you can start with the weird holes around the plant, they seem to lead to various parts of the system. See the one on the opposite wall? That's one of them.
texts.Of course, you already knew that, being: Of course, you already knew that, being the expert. I guess you will want to reset the system. Thank heavens there is a reset button. It's supposed to be idiot proof.

texts.If you want access, talk to him, he\u002: If you want access, talk to him, he's the recruiter of the town! His name is Ildan. He's just southwest of here.
texts.My dad said I can\u0027t let any strange: My dad said I can't let any strangers through this passage!

texts.You are free to board. Next stop, Cinfra: You are free to board. Next stop, Cinfras!
texts.And away we go to Detlas!: And away we go to Detlas!
texts.Woah, you can\u0027t just walk onto my s: Woah, you can't just walk onto my ship like that!
texts.Hey there. You must be the Human Ackbar: Hey there. You must be the Human Ackbar told me about.
texts.All you have to do is board my ship. Oh,: All you have to do is board my ship. Oh, this was also from Ackbar.
texts.And away we go to Cinfras!: And away we go to Cinfras!
texts.I heard what you did on the ship, very a: I heard what you did on the ship, very admirable. Fortunately for you, I owe Ackbar.
texts.Hello there, pleasant day isn\u0027t it?: Hello there, pleasant day isn't it?
texts.I\u0027ll take you from Detlas to Cinfra: I'll take you from Detlas to Cinfras or vice versa whenever you want.

texts.No password will be no entry!: No password will be no entry!

texts.OS Version M-37 is now online. Systems e: OS Version M-37 is now online. Systems estimate a 96.286573628% chance of success.

texts.However, such a story is very long. Perh: However, such a story is very long. Perhaps one day you'll find the time to learn all about it...
texts.However, I was forced to get back to saf: However, I was forced to get back to safety when I ran into several hellkites at the northwestern end.
texts.Have you heard about the Dwarven War? It: Have you heard about the Dwarven War? It is quite the tale.
texts.One time, I found a secret entrance to t: One time, I found a secret entrance to the top layer of the heights. It's like an entirely different world up there.

texts.I need one token from the boss in this r: I need one token from the boss in this room as evidence that you are strong enough to ascend.
texts.Well done, adventurer, you have successf: Well done, adventurer, you have successfully completed this floor! You may proceed.
texts.I need ten tokens from the enemies in th: I need ten tokens from the enemies in this room as evidence that you are strong enough to ascend.

texts.§lArakadicus §r§ais.. is a coward... it: §lArakadicus §r§ais.. is a coward... it traps you and f- feed you to its... children...
texts.Ah- Adventurer!... I b- beg you.. do not: Ah- Adventurer!... I b- beg you.. do not c- continue on your quest...
texts.You might believe you c- can fight t- th: You might believe you c- can fight t- this monster... b- but you can't...
