texts.Y-you\u0027re going to h-have to beat me: Y-you're going to h-have to beat me if you want a taste of my m-m-mushroom soup!
texts.WARNING: Defense systems critical! Power: WARNING: Defense systems critical! Power reserves low! Mushroom fuel reserves empty!

texts.Scans indicate that your form is incredi: Scans indicate that your form is incredibly powerful. I will take it from you!

Just hop aboard and make yerself comfy.
texts.Welcam aboard me ship, I\u0027ll bring y: Welcam aboard me ship, I'll bring ye directly to Corkus.
texts.Trust me, it is fa\u0027 more amazin tha: Trust me, it is fa' more amazin than Gavel and Wynn. We even 'ave machines!
texts.We\u0027re here! Just let me know if ya: We're here! Just let me know if ya ev'r wanna head back to Corkus, which will be pretty soon, I betcha.
texts.And don\u0027t get me sterted on our arc: And don't get me sterted on our architectur'!
Trust me, you will enjoy yer stay.
texts.All righty, we\u0027re headin\u0027 back: All righty, we're headin' back to Selchar!
texts.And here we are! Just hop back on me shi: 好嘞我们抵达了！如果你需要返回Selchar，你只需要随时蹦上我的船就好啦！
texts.The only boat that will take ye directly: 能带你直接去Corkus市唯一的一艘船

texts.It\u0027s you again! Remember the Craftm: It's you again! Remember the Craftmas miracle I asked for?
texts.It really happened, we got food!: It really happened, we got food!

I am glad everything is back to normal.

texts.Welcome to Ragni! The King is waiting fo: 欢迎来到Ragni！国王正在城堡里恭候您的到来。

texts.This gate leads to Nemract, a port city: This gate leads to Nemract, a port city that has always struggled.
texts.There isn\u0027t much in the desert asid: There isn't much in the desert aside from some old ruins, but it's also the best way to get to the canyon.
texts.Hello, and welcome to Detlas, the centra: Hello, and welcome to Detlas, the central city of the Province of Wynn!
texts.Here, you will find merchants from all a: Here, you will find merchants from all around the province. You can shop to your heart's content. It is the hub of cooperation between Villagers and Humans!
texts.Detlas also contains a bank, which you c: Detlas also contains a bank, which you can use to store your emeralds more efficiently, and store any other items you have.
texts.You can follow the path here south-west: You can follow the path here south-west to reach the frozen land of Nesaak, a transformed and dangerous place.
texts.Along the way to Nesaak, you\u0027ll als: Along the way to Nesaak, you'll also find the Roots of Corruption, where the undead first broke out. I'd stay away from there if I were you.
texts.It has a serious problem with the undead: It has a serious problem with the undead. When the portal opened 1000 years ago, the area was the first place to be hit, and it’s never quite recovered.
texts.Through this gate lies a path known as t: Through this gate lies a path known as the Black Road. You can take this path down to the small town of Ternaves.
texts.Since Nemract contains a port, boats are: Since Nemract contains a port, boats are easy to acquire. If you ever want to explore the ocean, stop by Nemract first.
texts.The only way to get to Troms without bei: The only way to get to Troms without being a member of the city is through the Great Bridge, which lies beyond the frozen plains.
texts.Welcome back to Detlas. I heard the news: Welcome back to Detlas. I heard the news from Maltic, apparently you saved the town.
texts.Usually we would ask Ragnar to tackle so: Usually we would ask Ragnar to tackle something like that, but you did just fine!
texts.You can also follow the path north-east: You can also follow the path north-east through the savannah to the city of Almuj, positioned at the start of the desert.

texts.Hey there! Still doing well after all th: Hey there! Still doing well after all this time?
texts.My name is Enzan, and I am now a retired: My name is Enzan, and I am now a retired knight. I've spent most of my life fighting for Ragni's army, just like you.
texts.Tell him I sent you! He can be such a je: Tell him I sent you! He can be such a jerk to strangers sometimes...
texts.I know how hard it must be to be a recru: I know how hard it must be to be a recruit at this time, so I've got something that could help you! Well, I don't have it, but my brother does!
texts.Follow this road, he\u0027s at the entra: Follow this road, he's at the entrance of the Nivla Forest, you can't miss him. Just head to the end of the trail, past the §r§bitem identifier§r§a.
texts.I see you want to venture into the wilde: I see you want to venture into the wilderness!

texts.Hey! Looking for banned exotics or clean: Hey! Looking for banned exotics or clean documents? Just head to the bird.

texts.We\u0027ve been fighting the corruption: We've been fighting the corruption for years, it seems like it might finally engulf Nesaak.
texts.You can just follow the road west and yo: You can just follow the road west and you'll find him.
texts.He went west. There was some kind of eme: He went west. There was some kind of emergency.
texts.Woah, your weaponry and armour is so adv: Woah, your weaponry and armour is so advanced!
texts.He\u0027s busy fighting in the war, shou: He's busy fighting in the war, shouldn't you be doing the same?
texts.If you need to speak to Theorick, he\u00: If you need to speak to Theorick, he's on a mission in the western part of the forest.
texts.Are you another Twain? Only the Twains k: Are you another Twain? Only the Twains know magic like that.

texts.For years we let them share the lake wit: For years we let them share the lake with us, the actual inhabitants of it, we were modest and took what we needed, we let them catch the rest. But then they went too far, they caught too much.
texts.You found the pufferfish! Who would have: You found the pufferfish! Who would have thought such a small thing could solve our problem. I will start bringing back the fish immediately, but first we will have a nice hot soup. Please take this as payback for your services.
texts.We didn\u0027t have enough to eat, we we: We didn't have enough to eat, we were forced to steal their fish, we would have starved otherwise. And now they want their fish, §r§a§lour §r§afish back? We can't do that, I hope you understand.
texts.However we don\u0027t have to fight over: However we don't have to fight over the fish in the lake, we just need a §r§3[Mythic Everlasting Pufferfish]§r§a, that would be enough, nothing else. We never wanted to steal the fish.
texts.Who are you? You don\u0027t look like on: Who are you? You don't look like one of those villagers we stole the fi... Wait, they didn't send you to retrieve "their" fish, did they?
texts.I wish we could have avoided this whole: I wish we could have avoided this whole scenario.
texts.You can trade it in at the shop right ov: You can trade it in at the shop right over there, it's hard to miss. I will give you a last advise, you don't want to eat that slimy fish.
texts.If you want to help us and the villagers: If you want to help us and the villagers, just follow the stream that flows into this lake to the south, you will find the best fishing ground there. The pufferfish should be around there too.

texts.Hey! Don\u0027t just enter like that!: Hey! Don't just enter like that!

texts.Another batch of crops ruined… Things ju: Another batch of crops ruined… Things just spoil so easy here. I should just move away.

texts.Well, that\u0027s all then. I hope we wo: Well, that's all then. I hope we won't need you in the future.
texts.He was clearly here just to take the con: He was clearly here just to take the contract money. Anyway, here you are. You may have saved Llevigar from implosion, we really should have paid you more, but that's all we can afford.
texts.The system was so perfect, no one has ha: The system was so perfect, no one has had to touch it in centuries, until now.
texts.Well, I wasn\u0027t expecting a human. T: Well, I wasn't expecting a human. This system is top-tier villager engineering from years ago.
texts.The system is going crazy! We don\u0027t: The system is going crazy! We don't even know how it works, we've never had a problem! There is a secret entrance to the heart of the system opposite the bank, hurry!
texts.Uh, no. Oh this doesn\u0027t make any se: Uh, no. Oh this doesn't make any sense! What idiot designed this?!
texts.Ah, welcome back. The power is back and: Ah, welcome back. The power is back and levels are returning to normal. Someone came in earlier claiming to be the power expert, but I told them you were already here.
texts.Oh, hello there. Sorry, the power plant: Oh, hello there. Sorry, the power plant is closed for maintenance.
texts.Hear that? We don\u0027t have much time: Hear that? We don't have much time until full meltdown! There is an entrance to the power plant opposite the bank. Tell the §r§3Head Engineer §r§aI sent you!
texts.The system is self-repairing itself. Thi: The system is self-repairing itself. This magical technology is remarkable, whoever designed this was amazing. I just wish they had left the blueprints somewhere where we could find them.
texts.Or are you the expert we\u0027re paying: Or are you the expert we're paying a fortune to fix our issue? You are?

Yer got the lot! Looks and talent.
texts.Yer wantin\u0027 to be pirate queen, ye?: Yer wantin' to be pirate queen, ye? Don' worry, I can help ye.
texts.Y\u0027see, the other pirates aren\u0027: Y'see, the other pirates aren't fit for the role. They're dumb 'n weak. All they've got is looks.
texts.Y\u0027know, the guard, she\u0027s dumb: Y'know, the guard, she's dumb too. A simple disguise will fool 'er. I heard there's a wig shop over at Ahmsord and they're sellin' a female pirate wig.
texts.Congratulations, my queen! May yer rule: Congratulations, my queen! May yer rule be the best one!
texts.Get one for yerself. It ain\u0027t free: Get one for yerself. It ain't free but it oughta fool em.
texts.Don\u0027 waste your time \u0027round me: Don' waste your time 'round me! You've got trials to attend.

texts.Yes, it probably is the tomb! But it see: Yes, it probably is the tomb! But it seems like we are unable to enter it...
texts.I believe he died in this area, and I ha: I believe he died in this area, and I have been looking for his body for quite a while now.
texts.I\u0027d be eternally grateful if you co: I'd be eternally grateful if you could help me find my old friend...
texts.Do you think you could help me? Report b: Do you think you could help me? Report back if you see anything.
texts.Hi. Have you found anything interesting?: Hi. Have you found anything interesting?
texts.One night, he decided to explore this ar: One night, he decided to explore this area. He was looking for something specific, but he didn't tell anyone.
texts.He lives in Bremminglar, a small village: He lives in Bremminglar, a small village close to Almuj. Go meet him, I'll wait for your return.
texts.Brr... It\u0027s a little bit cold out t: Brr... It's a little bit cold out there, don't you think?
texts.His name is Wedyf. He is a powerful sorc: His name is Wedyf. He is a powerful sorcerer that could remove the spell blocking the entrance!
texts.His soul is probably still on earth, we: His soul is probably still on earth, we have to free him so he can finally rest.
texts.He never came back. He has been walking: He never came back. He has been walking through the province as a zombie, unable to free his soul.
texts.You see, a few years ago I met a very po: You see, a few years ago I met a very powerful warrior, named Bob.
texts.My name is Tarod, and I really need your: My name is Tarod, and I really need your help.
texts.He was a celebrity, everybody loved him!: He was a celebrity, everybody loved him! After a while, we became close friends.
texts.I know someone who could help us in this: I know someone who could help us in this situation...
texts.Some people said they saw a tomb not so: Some people said they saw a tomb not so far from here, but I never found it.

texts.I heard about some shady figures moving: I heard about some shady figures moving around the bar and acting strangely... I am afraid of going there...

texts.I want to take care of him, but my wife: I want to take care of him, but my wife says it's too dangerous. Where's my wife you say? Oh, I think she's around here eating some grain.
texts.Have you taken care of Cluckles yet? If: Have you taken care of Cluckles yet? If you can't find him, I hid him in my basement.
texts.You monster! Leave this place now, and k: You monster! Leave this place now, and keep that feather to remind you of your hideous crime!
Sometimes I wish animals could respawn... hey! What are you doing here? Go away!
texts.I really love my chickens, but there is: I really love my chickens, but there is one that I just cannot control...
Anyway, I need you to go down there and... take care of him for me. I would really appreciate it.
texts.Hey, you aren\u0027t a chicken! Wait, yo: Hey, you aren't a chicken! Wait, you're a human! You can help me! Maybe you are the guy who helped my brother Yahya, but who knows, you humans all look the same to me.
texts.He\u0027s really dangerous to keep on my: He's really dangerous to keep on my lovely island, so I keep him in my basement...
texts.What is this?! His feather? What did you: What is this?! His feather? What did you do to Cluckles?! I wanted you to take care of him, not kill him!
texts.His name is Cluckles, he was given to me: His name is Cluckles, he was given to me by a man named Bob before he went to war, but when Bob never came back, Cluckles got angry...

texts.Same as you. That the war\u0027s been ge: Same as you. That the war's been getting worse, so the King of Ragni's been recruiting Fruma soldiers.
texts.It looks nice. The war clearly hasn\u002: It looks nice. The war clearly hasn't made it this far.
texts.The old man said something about a bridg: The old man said something about a bridge being broken. Let's check it out.
texts.Fine. I know what to do. nbcss, Tasim, f: Fine. I know what to do. nbcss, Tasim, follow me.
texts.Well, what are you waiting for?: Well, what are you waiting for?
texts.Use §r§b2 oil§r§a and §r§b1 wood§r§a to: Use §r§b2 oil§r§a and §r§b1 wood§r§a to craft §r§3[1 Relik]§r§a and then show it to the guard.
texts.Come to think of it, I don\u0027t rememb: Come to think of it, I don't remember. I know this sounds crazy, but I honestly can't remember anything I did back home.
texts.It\u0027s not the strongest weapon, but: It's not the strongest weapon, but it's enough. Let's go and see if this is good enough for the guard, nbcss.
texts.Yeah, now we can see what Wynn is really: Yeah, now we can see what Wynn is really like, and find out if the stories are true.
I think we're about to find out.
texts.For now, nbcss, let\u0027s look for a wa: For now, nbcss, let's look for a way across. There's gotta be something we can use to get to the other side...
texts.All we need to do is use this workbench: All we need to do is use this workbench to forge your weapon.
texts.It\u0027s not that far, it\u0027s just a: It's not that far, it's just a straight path from here. nbcss, if you're ready, let's get moving.
texts.Just ahead is the entrance to the underp: Just ahead is the entrance to the underpass. Once we get through there, we'll be at the castle!
texts.We can use this tree as a bridge to get: We can use this tree as a bridge to get across to the other side.
texts.Show your weapon to the guard so he\u002: Show your weapon to the guard so he'll let us through.
texts.Thanks for the warning. I guess we bette: Thanks for the warning. I guess we better get going then. nbcss, lead the way.
texts.What are you doing? Don\u0027t go wander: What are you doing? Don't go wandering off!
texts.It\u0027s a mystery for another day, I s: It's a mystery for another day, I suppose.

texts.A while ago, before Ancient Nemract was: A while ago, before Ancient Nemract was destroyed, my family used to own quite an interesting book, that held knowledge of places and beings of great power.
texts.Unfortunately, a creature stole it from: Unfortunately, a creature stole it from them during the attack that led to the destruction of Ancient Nemract, and no one has seen it since.
texts.Hey, adventurer! Would you mind helping: Hey, adventurer! Would you mind helping me for a second? I have a bit of a problem on my hands.
texts.See if you can find this tower, one of t: See if you can find this tower, one of the skeletons probably has the book somewhere in there.
texts.If you are willing to help, bring me §r§: If you are willing to help, bring me §r§3[1 Book of the Bones]§r§a, I believe this book is now between the hands of skeletons, in an old tower in Ancient Nemract.
texts.Great! This will be very interesting to: Great! This will be very interesting to read, thank you!

texts.Oh are you from the province of Wynn? Oh: Oh are you from the province of Wynn? Oh boy, have you heard of Bob? Of course you have! Gee, I would do anything to own something that belonged to him.

texts.Welcome to my home! Don\u0027t worry abo: 欢迎来到我的家！不必担心突然闯进别人家很粗鲁，这在Wynn省是非常常见的问候方式。
texts.Wow, you walked all the way up here? You: Wow, you walked all the way up here? You are quite the explorer! There is always plenty to find around this province.
texts.Maybe if you train hard enough, you can: Maybe if you train hard enough, you can be as powerful as he is!
texts.I lost my dog today. That poor creature: I lost my dog today. That poor creature will follow anyone.
texts.I heard there is a man in Wynn called Ra: I heard there is a man in Wynn called Ragnar. He's a true hero.

This path leads into the Dernel Jungle. I am a gatherer of the village, but my job has recently become much harder.
texts.The cave is to the left, near a large tr: The cave is to the left, near a large tree and an old shaman of the other jungle tribe. I do hope they have not disturbed him...
texts.A horde of fetishes has overtaken the ca: A horde of fetishes has overtaken the cavern that a potent medicinal herb, the Aseado Leaf, grows in. We cannot enter anymore.

texts.Oh, hello there! I had hoped not to both: Oh, hello there! I had hoped not to bother you, adventurer, but this is urgent.
texts.Please don\u0027t bother me right now, I: Please don't bother me right now, I'm very busy with matters of my own. Perhaps I could use your help when you're level 65.
texts.You see, the king\u0027s son has gone mi: You see, the king's son has gone missing, and with him worrying so much, the problems of the kingdom have festered unsolved.
texts.We believe he was kidnapped by the splin: We believe he was kidnapped by the splinter cell mercenaries in the jungle... Unfortunate, too. They used to be quite honourable.
texts.You see, the king is §r§avery...erm§r§a,: You see, the king is §r§avery...erm§r§a, distracted, and you are just the kind of willing, able-bodied person I need.
texts.Well, anyway, they\u0027re usually spott: Well, anyway, they're usually spotted outside the run-down farm outside of town. Go there and see what they want in return for the young prince.

texts.Today is the dawn of a new era... GAAHHH: Today is the dawn of a new era... GAAHHH!
texts.Now that we have taken over their barrac: Now that we have taken over their barracks, we can take over all of Wynn and make them suffer!
texts.The commanding officers are aristocrats,: The commanding officers are aristocrats, all of them! They deserve to suffer for their selfishness!

texts.Hey pal, want to use these elevators? Ta: Hey pal, want to use these elevators? Talk to Svin in Rymek, he is a friend of mine. He could give you access.
texts.Although recently a strange hermit has b: Although recently a strange hermit has been trying to control them and prevent access... I'm sure you can reason with him, though.
texts.Sorry pal, but only friends of Svin can: Sorry pal, but only friends of Svin can use these elevators. He lives in Rymek if you want to talk to him.

texts.I haven\u0027t forgotten you. You may ac: I haven't forgotten you. You may access the tower if you wish.
texts.Prove to me that you are worthy of enter: Prove to me that you are worthy of entering by bringing me a teleportation scroll of every major town in the province.
What do they want to forget? Who knows. Past errors that they wish to erase from their memory, most likely.
texts.The Tower of Amnesia is the place where: The Tower of Amnesia is the place where powerful adventurers go to forget.
texts.Finish my quest and you will be worthy o: Finish my quest and you will be worthy of entering the tower.
texts.I am still waiting for the scroll I aske: I am still waiting for the scroll I asked you. Have you forgotten?
texts.Congratulations. You can now access the: Congratulations. You can now access the tower to purify your mind from your past mistakes.
texts.Good. Now, bring me §r§3[1 Detlas Telepo: Good. Now, bring me §r§3[1 Detlas Teleportation Scroll]§r§a.
texts.Impressive. Now let\u0027s see if your s: Impressive. Now let's see if your skin can endure the hot climate of the desert. Bring me §r§3[1 Almuj Teleportation Scroll]§r§a.
texts.This will be a long quest, and it might: This will be a long quest, and it might take you multiple years to finish it. You might not even be strong enough to visit all of those towns.
texts.Maybe you are one of them? Maybe you wis: Maybe you are one of them? Maybe you wish to forget some of your past mistakes?
texts.Unfortunately, we cannot let everyone in: Unfortunately, we cannot let everyone in the tower...
texts.Let\u0027s start with Ragni. Hopefully t: Let's start with Ragni. Hopefully this shouldn't be too hard for you. Bring me back §r§3[1 Ragni Teleportation Scroll]§r§a.
texts.Not bad. Let\u0027s make this a little b: Not bad. Let's make this a little bit harder now. Bring me §r§3[1 Nemract Teleportation Scroll]§r§a.
texts.Great. We\u0027ll see how far you can go: Great. We'll see how far you can go. Bring me §r§3[1 Selchar Teleportation Scroll]§r§a.
texts.Very Good! But can you travel through th: Very Good! But can you travel through the cold and harsh climate of Nesaak? Bring me §r§3[1 Nesaak Teleportation Scroll]§r§a.

texts.But their brutish stature belies a vicio: But their brutish stature belies a vicious cunning! None of us can find where the raiders are all coming from, they must be hiding their base astoundingly!
texts.I wonder if me and my wife should\u0027v: I wonder if me and my wife should've come here. I thought this secluded little hamlet would be peaceful, but the pigmen have been getting quite rowdy lately!
texts.I keep seeing the guards out by the gate: I keep seeing the guards out by the gate fighting the blasted hamhocks. If we could just figure out where they're all coming from, we could put an end to it...

texts.Just north of \u0027ere is a mysterious: Just north of 'ere is a mysterious island. It's a big ol' cave, filled with the remains of old pirates.
texts.I think there be somethin\u0027 sinister: I think there be somethin' sinister about that place...
texts.But then, their bones began attacking me: But then, their bones began attacking me! I was forced to retreat.

texts.I will tell the mayor of Thesead all abo: 我会告诉Thesead的市长所有关于这里的事，然后获取我的奖赏。我将会变得富有而且如果你想阻止我的话你只能一个人来了！
texts.What are you doing here? Why are you pro: 你在这里做什么？为什么你在保护这座非法的城市？
texts.The Villagers will not be happy about El: 这些村民一定不会对Eltom的事感到高兴。如果再接着发展的话，很可能会破坏Gavel和Wynn两省之间的关系。
texts.You can’t stop me. You wouldn’t murder o: 你无法阻止我。你不会想要一个人谋杀，对吧？

texts.Oh yeah? And just what would you have in: Oh yeah? And just what would you have in mind?
texts.Well if you don\u0027t need us anymore t: Well if you don't need us anymore then we'll just be on our way... WITH our money! So hand it over please.
texts.This is insane, why are we here?! We\u00: This is insane, why are we here?! We're looking for corruption you know that right?
texts.Well, you know what? We did our job, so: Well, you know what? We did our job, so honestly I don't care. Let's get out of he-
texts.Forget it, I don\u0027t care anymore, ju: Forget it, I don't care anymore, just prime the explosive and get clear of the blast!
Orikal? We’re done! Pay up! I want out. This place is getting to me.

texts.Come on, open up! Let me in!: Come on, open up! Let me in!
texts.It\u0027s a dead end! What do we d-?: It's a dead end! What do we d-?
texts.Please, let me in! I don\u0027t want to: Please, let me in! I don't want to die!

他要求来使用一艘船...我拒绝了...
他痛殴了我一顿...然后离开了...

texts.And try as we might, the thing won\u0027: And try as we might, the thing won't give! Blades, pickaxes, explosives, our burliest soldiers, all done bugger all!
texts.Oh, sod it, I knew I was forgetting some: Oh, sod it, I knew I was forgetting something! Steady there, chum! I'm on my way!
texts.I am General Graken, leader of the Nemra: I am General Graken, leader of the Nemract militia. Charmed to meet you!
texts.I found the other in the house just up t: I found the other in the house just up the road here, impossible to miss since it's the only one that bloody-well still has a solid floor!
texts.I found the first gem in one of the hous: I found the first gem in one of the houses nearby, so I'd like you to check that house again.
texts.Well, there\u0027s some good news, I sup: Well, there's some good news, I suppose. Still though, seems I sent you a ticket to a bit of a sticky wicket! Do you see a way out anywhere down there?
texts.Come on, pip pip! Let\u0027s see a bit m: Come on, pip pip! Let's see a bit more colour in your eyes- There we are! Back now, chap?
texts.It used to be fitted with a dark one lik: It used to be fitted with a dark one like the left.
texts.Drat! Too late, it seems. Yes, I forgot: Drat! Too late, it seems. Yes, I forgot to mention the floor was in poor condition. Up here! You took quite the tumble, are you alright?
texts.You\u0027ve seen all the bloody zombies: You've seen all the bloody zombies faffing about everywhere, yes? They're all seeming to come from this massive skull
texts.If we could figure a way in, then we mig: If we could figure a way in, then we might be able to curb the flow of these undead gits, but it won't budge.
texts.There\u0027s a tunnel? Aha, spiffing! I: There's a tunnel? Aha, spiffing! I suggest you take it immediately. I'll have to return to my post now, post-haste!
texts.Oi! Hallo?! Chum? Why\u0027re you wander: Oi! Hallo?! Chum? Why're you wandering round all bog-eyed? Come back to me now!
texts.I\u0027m supposing he was the one who to: I'm supposing he was the one who took you for a spin there? Well, you certainly haven't carked it, so I might call this operation a jolly good success!
texts.Ah, quite a nasty look there, chum! Don\: Ah, quite a nasty look there, chum! Don't you worry a bit, I'll be carrying the can on that one. I'll also take care of putting in this gem, too!
texts.However! I found something quite interes: However! I found something quite interesting recently. Look at the eyesockets. Notice how the right one has a bright ruby?
texts.I\u0027ve a hunch, chap! And that hunch: I've a hunch, chap! And that hunch is, if we can find another matching ruby, this thing might open up its gob!
texts.And while that was quite the impressive: And while that was quite the impressive feat, just rushing straight on in the state you're in right §r§anow...wouldn't§r§a end happily.
texts.Ah, hello there chap! I must say, I didn: Ah, hello there chap! I must say, I didn't expect to see a part of the old Ragni regiment over 'ere.
texts.It\u0027s just south of here. The house: It's just south of here. The house still had solid wood boarding in it, despite the age, so look lively, chum!
texts.Ah, hello chap! Might I inquire as to wh: Ah, hello chap! Might I inquire as to whether you've found that blasted little ruby yet?
texts.But, you were stumbling about like a sen: But, you were stumbling about like a senile biddy, eyes blank as cream, and you kept muttering something about a Charon.
texts.Still though. Once you\u0027ve all heale: Still though. Once you've all healed up, I'd be chuffed to have you along again in the expedition down into the depths, old bean!
texts.I\u0027ll do a spot of scouting ahead, a: I'll do a spot of scouting ahead, and then meet you in there! I must admit this place does give me the habdabs though, wot wot?
texts.Now, might be good to go back to town, c: Now, might be good to go back to town, cop some zeds after all that codswallop. I'm certain you can't be feeling quite ace right now.
texts.Hey! Come on, come over here! Quit milli: Hey! Come on, come over here! Quit milling about with the zombies, chap!
texts.Good luck, chum! Now, back, you cads! Ba: Good luck, chum! Now, back, you cads! Back I say!
texts.Capital! You had me quite worried for a: Capital! You had me quite worried for a spot, there. Do bubble about just what went on down there, mm? I see you've managed to uncover the gem, at least!
texts.Perhaps I simply overlooked the other on: Perhaps I simply overlooked the other one in there. If not, then we'll start searching elsewhere.
texts.I already took out the one up there, so: I already took out the one up there, so how'd you like to take it, chuck? I can feel the magic potential in it, and I'll be buggered if you go without reward.

texts.If your name isn\u0027t Eluzterp and you: If your name isn't Eluzterp and you haven't got me my special drinks, get out of here! I'm not open for business!

texts.But challenging him is nearly impossible: But challenging him is nearly impossible. He can only be defeated with his own enchanted cannons...
texts.Be careful, stranger! Captain §r§a§lRedb: Be careful, stranger! Captain §r§a§lRedbeard §r§ahas imprisoned us. Long ago, he was a greedy pirate who gained immense wealth through theft.
texts.But then one fateful day, his ship.. §r§: But then one fateful day, his ship.. §r§a§othis §r§aship, was caught in a storm. He died in the crash. Though he is now merely bones, he still guards his riches from the afterlife...

texts.Only citizen of Troms can enter the pass: Only citizen of Troms can enter the passage! §r§7[Quest Req: The Passage]

texts.You have prevented me from entering pove: You have prevented me from entering poverty and helped keep down the waves of corrupt monsters roaming this province.
texts.Ah, looks like a fresh recruit!: Ah, looks like a fresh recruit!
texts.Have you at least attempted to get rid o: Have you at least attempted to get rid of that pest yet? Remember, the water reservoir is on the other end of this here field.
texts.I could really use some help right now,: I could really use some help right now, but you are too weak. Come back when you are level 2.
texts.Great job getting rid of that corrupt va: Great job getting rid of that corrupt varmint, I can't thank you enough!
texts.If you poison the water reservoir on the: If you poison the water reservoir on the other side of the farm field after you enter, you can watch as the pest makes his way back to the grave!
texts.Hurry and enable the sprinklers with the: Hurry and enable the sprinklers with the button near the farm's entrance before it can do any more damage!
texts.Good to see the army growing again! Abou: Good to see the army growing again! About time someone in the army had time for us citizens.
texts.Recently, my dear father passed away and: Recently, my dear father passed away and I buried him out back. Well, he's not there anymore, the corruption has got to his body.
texts.If you\u0027re able to safely make it in: If you're able to safely make it inside my farm, my father's animated corpse may use fireballs to kill you... Yes, fireballs. Who knew my father had that in him?
texts.You\u0027ve must have done something to: You've must have done something to irritate the pest, beacuse it's furious and more aggressive!
texts.Take this well-deserved reward for the r: Take this well-deserved reward for the risky actions you took today.
texts.We have to fight the corruption too you: We have to fight the corruption too you know! Speaking of which...
texts.Corruption affects different things in o: Corruption affects different things in odd ways. It sometimes reanimates corpses and sets them against the living.
texts.We can\u0027t fight him head on - We sho: We can't fight him head on - We should use my fresh Corkian sprinklers to poison the pest! I have a spare §r§3[1 Crate of Rat Poison]§r§a aside my house...
texts.I thank you greatly for your actions. My: I thank you greatly for your actions. My crops should grow back soon!

texts.Mechs are getting increasingly more desp: Mechs are getting increasingly more desperate.
texts.Now it runs the factory with a twisted s: Now it runs the factory with a twisted sense of morality. It's easy to see why it was shut down.
texts.Follow the northwestern road and enter t: Follow the northwestern road and enter the factory from the west side. I will meet you there.
texts.Are you okay? Good. Meet me at the entra: Are you okay? Good. Meet me at the entrance where we met. We need to report to Corkus City!
texts.You storm in and find what we need. I’ll: You storm in and find what we need. I’ll cover you from out here.
texts.We saw a mech… A new mech! It looked dif: We saw a mech… A new mech! It looked different like it was made in-
texts.I\u0027ll have to use electromagic to ma: I'll have to use electromagic to make it launch, so you will have to go alone.
texts.We have tried to remove them but the fac: We have tried to remove them but the factory always makes more.
texts.What in the world is that mech on top of: What in the world is that mech on top of the pile of scrap over there?
texts.Our best bet is to ask the chief. Howeve: Our best bet is to ask the chief. However, because of tensions the border is closed.
texts.We need those keys to get in and shut do: We need those keys to get in and shut down the factory once more.
texts.I knew it! There was something here we c: I knew it! There was something here we could use.
texts.Excellent. I will hold onto that for now: Excellent. I will hold onto that for now. Let's focus on getting the Corkian's Key.
texts.We need to do something! I\u0027ll clear: We need to do something! I'll clear the path for you. That’s the only thing I can do, I... hurt my... leg.
texts.The idea was that both species had equal: The idea was that both species had equal roles in the factory's operations.
The diner is being raided by mechs..
texts.Amazing. Now we need to meet at the fact: Amazing. Now we need to meet at the factory. Now the real hard part begins.
texts.They keep it in a vault inside the castl: They keep it in a vault inside the castle. I honestly don't know how to get in there.
texts.Nice try, mech! Not convincing enough fo: Nice try, mech! Not convincing enough for me!
texts.Mo\u0027in. Are you sure you are ready?: Mo'in. Are you sure you are ready?
I have learned so much on our adventure. One day, if you ever need me, I will be there. You have an ally in this Corkian.
texts.Come to my house when you reach level 89: Come to my house when you reach level 89, here's a key so you get in. We must prepare to break into the factory.
texts.Find the Avos chief. Ask for the factory: Find the Avos chief. Ask for the factory key.
Stand back, I'll open the door.
texts.Before we do anything, I have to explain: Before we do anything, I have to explain what's happening here...
texts.Gah! I can\u0027t even do the most basic: Gah! I can't even do the most basic spell!
texts.Mo\u0027in. Sorry had a problem with the: Mo'in. Sorry had a problem with the-
texts.Our guest... just killed several desperm: Our guest... just killed several despermechs by himself.
texts.Mo\u0027in. Did you get the key?: Mo'in. Did you get the key?
texts.We need to stop the Factory, now!: We need to stop the Factory, now!
texts.Beltrude, we have a problem! The factory: Beltrude, we have a problem! The factory is running!
I can try to open the vent to sneak in.
texts.Mo\u0027in, Wynnian. Thank goodness I st: Mo'in, Wynnian. Thank goodness I stopped you.
Press the button when you're ready.
This town is usually full of life.
Even in rust, they are still powerful.
texts.That model was a S-63, meaning it has wa: That model was a S-63, meaning it has warned the others. Follow me.
texts.I think first we should just go and scou: I think first we should just go and scout out the vault itself and work it out.
Pst. You. Over here, behind the logs.
texts.I\u0027m not sure which way it is, let\u: I'm not sure which way it is, let's split up. I'll go to the right.
texts.They won\u0027t admit anything with you: They won't admit anything with you around. They want to become allies with Wynn.
texts.I think we can safely assume this is the: I think we can safely assume this is the right place.
texts.I know a shortcut, we\u0027ll be in Cork: I know a shortcut, we'll be in Corkus City in no time.
texts.That is definitely not a regular desperm: That is definitely not a regular despermech... It looks brand new!
texts.The smartest man on Corkus, Cerid spent: The smartest man on Corkus, Cerid spent years making a being smarter even than he is...
texts.Also.. I- I made you these boots using m: Also.. I- I made you these boots using my magic. It turns out I am pretty good at making stuff.
texts.I\u0027m sorry for being useless in fron: I'm sorry for being useless in front of you...
texts.Don\u0027t worry about the guards, they: Don't worry about the guards, they are disabled for now. Follow me.
texts.I just wanted to say thanks, too. I real: I just wanted to say thanks, too. I really feel like I made a difference fighting with you. When you are ready, just walk up to the factory doors.
They now raid towns for parts.
texts.Our own creations have rebelled against: Our own creations have rebelled against us.
texts.Psst! Over here, in the field!: Psst! Over here, in the field!
texts.I know you are a stranger, but talk to m: I know you are a stranger, but talk to me if you want to help.
texts.Mo\u0027in. See that guy up there? He ha: Mo'in. See that guy up there? He hasn't moved an inch since I got here.
texts.Mo\u0027in. I’ve been researching everyt: Mo'in. I’ve been researching everything I can about the factory.
texts.Alright, I\u0027ll open the door with el: Alright, I'll open the door with electromagic.
texts.You need to find and destroy that new fa: You need to find and destroy that new factory mech.
texts.It is Corkus’s greatest failure. It must: It is Corkus’s greatest failure. It must be stopped.
texts.My name is Maxie by the way. Nice to mee: My name is Maxie by the way. Nice to meet you.
texts.I\u0027ll meet you there. It\u0027s in t: I'll meet you there. It's in the castle and to the right. There's 2 guards there at all times, you can't miss it.
texts.Electromagic is different from your magi: Electromagic is different from your magic.. I'm not very good at it...
texts.You\u0027re back, and you have the key!: You're back, and you have the key!
texts.One of those hasn\u0027t been seen since: One of those hasn't been seen since the factory was running...
texts.To get in we need two keys. One from the: To get in we need two keys. One from the Avos and one from Corkians.
texts.The Corkians won\u0027t give up their ke: The Corkians won't give up their key very easily, so we should start with the Avos.
texts.Fortunately there is a catapult that can: Fortunately there is a catapult that can help us in a village north-west of here. Let's meet there.
texts.I don\u0027t think he\u0027s actually a: I don't think he's actually a farmer. Follow me.
texts.We have everything we need. Let\u0027s g: We have everything we need. Let's get to the factory! Follow the road to the northwest, it's just south of the city.
texts.This won\u0027t be your average fight. T: This won't be your average fight. The factory is cutting edge. Run by a being of pure electromagic.

His body is buried somewhere in Nemract. I own a large graveyard there, and can grant you access to it if you can bring me back his will.
texts.Brilliant! It is a little bit dusty, but: Brilliant! It is a little bit dusty, but it will do the trick! Here, take these as proof of my gratitude.
texts.I know that my brother had his will on h: I know that my brother had his will on him during the attack. Knowing he was a rich fellow, I expect to be receving a large part of his fortune.
texts.You sure look like a strong adventurer w: You sure look like a strong adventurer who could help me!
texts.One of my other brothers also survived t: One of my other brothers also survived the attack. He isn't... um... somebody I'd trust greatly, but i'm sure he has some useful informations for you.
texts.His name is Drucksh. He usually likes to: His name is Drucksh. He usually likes to talk a lot when he is drunk, see if you can do anything with that.
texts.Thank you so much for your help!: Thank you so much for your help!
texts.However, we got attacked by thieves on o: However, we got attacked by thieves on our way here, and I had to leave my family behind. Most of them died, unfortunately.
texts.You look like you desperately need an ad: You look like you desperately need an adventure, Come back when you're level 20, I might need you.
texts.My name is Sayleros. I spent most of my: My name is Sayleros. I spent most of my life in Maltic, but decided to come live in Detlas with my family a few weeks ago.
texts.I\u0027ll be waiting for your return! Fo: I'll be waiting for your return! Follow this path, it leads directly to Nemract. Good luck!

texts.In the meantime, if you ever need a ride: In the meantime, if you ever need a ride to someplace else, you can find me at the ports of most islands.
texts.In fact, he\u0027s saved so many lives t: 实际上，他救过太多人的性命了，Gavel的居民甚至开始称呼他为Gavel省的英雄Bob。
texts.Welcome to the V.S.S. Seaskipper, from S: Welcome to the V.S.S. Seaskipper, from Seasail Enterprises! There's nothin' better than Seasail if you're lookin' to travel!
texts.I\u0027ve had a lot of passengers with a: I've had a lot of passengers with a few screws loose, and today I'll tell ye the tale of the craziest of 'em all.
texts.As people first began settlin\u0027 the: 当人们刚开始在海岛上居住的时候，Redbeard就会抢夺他们的物品，他的恶名深深的在任何船员心里刻下了恐惧。
texts.Hope you weren\u0027t falling asleep, we: Hope you weren't falling asleep, we're almost at the destination. Been nice seeing ya!
texts.Can ya imagine, he\u0027s seen and fough: Can ya imagine, he's seen and fought off the big kraken by 'imself!
texts.I can see Gavel up ahead! Beautiful, ain: I can see Gavel up ahead! Beautiful, ain't it? The first city you'll enter beyond the gates will be Llevigar, the royal city.
texts.We\u0027re headed for Selchar, the heart: 我们正在前往Selchar，大海的中心！几乎所有遇难或者迷路的水手会把这里当庇护所。
texts.At least a hundred of undead aboard eyei: 至少有上百个亡灵在甲板上死死地盯着我看。而且还不止那一次。我还好几次见过它！
texts.I don\u0027t really see what you could p: I don't really see what you could possibly buy with seeds, so I guess I'll just give them to you.
texts.So here, why don\u0027t you take a littl: So here, why don't you take a little share?
texts.I\u0027ve been sailin\u0027 for years, I: I've been sailin' for years, I know every island in the sea like the back of my hand.
texts.He kept ramblin\u0027 on and on, insisti: He kept ramblin' on and on, insistin' that all of our lives were created by some sorta ''great council''.
texts.So I started takin\u0027 people on rides: So I started takin' people on rides across the ocean, and here I am!
texts.The difference is that Siegfried\u0027s: The difference is that Siegfried's still around, so you might actually be able to meet him one day.
texts.Those ghosts are sayin\u0027 some weird: Those ghosts are sayin' some weird things, though. Tryin' to buy and sell weapons, holdin' auctions.
texts.Pack up your stuff! Our trip over the se: 理好你的行李！我们的海上历程马上结束了。
texts.But when I turn my head, nobody\u0027s t: But when I turn my head, nobody's there! Startin' to think it might be ghosts or somethin'.
texts.Pirate Cove is full of mischievous peopl: Pirate Cove is full of mischievous people, shady sailors and most important: lots and lots of Nemract Whiskey!
texts.But I think my eyes must be playin\u0027: But I think my eyes must be playin' tricks on me lately. Because I swear, the western mountains moved.
texts.He\u0027s a decent fellow, though. Somet: He's a decent fellow, though. Sometimes I stop by and 'ave an exchange of sailor stories.
texts.Your adventure continues now! The sail i: Your adventure continues now! The sail is over, hope to see you around again soon!
texts.The people there are just tryin\u0027 to: The people there are just tryin' to show the world that they can be a province.
texts.You see, my brothers inherited everythin: You see, my brothers inherited everything my father had. Land, emeralds, everythin'...
texts.Here, take this for free! I hope to see: Here, take this for free! I hope to see ya soon 'gain.
texts.It\u0027s full of services and drunken s: 这儿充满着热心服务和喝醉的水手。这儿还是听水手故事其次的地方。第一是？Nemract，必须的！
texts.See that, on the horizon? That\u0027s wh: See that, on the horizon? That's where we're headed! Buckle up, we're increasing the speed!
texts.Sometimes, no matter where I am, I\u0027: Sometimes, no matter where I am, I'll hear someone shoutin' like they're right next to me.
texts.I dropped \u0027im off as soon as I coul: I dropped 'im off as soon as I could, 'cause I wasn’t interested in his newfangled religion.
texts.So, this is your first time ridin\u0027: So, this is your first time ridin' the ol' Seaskipper, eh? It's okay if you're a wee bit seasick.
texts.You\u0027ll never believe what I salvage: You'll never believe what I salvaged earlier today.
texts.Earlier today I stopped by Zhight Island: Earlier today I stopped by Zhight Island. One of the residents asked for a ride on the Seaskipper, but he paid me with seeds instead of emeralds!
texts.On the bright side, they do look a lot m: On the bright side, they do look a lot more beautiful than I remember.
texts.We\u0027re headin\u0027 for Nemract, a p: We're headin' for Nemract, a poor port town. It makes as much money as it can off of trade.
texts.And we\u0027re off to Mage Island! A tru: And we're off to Mage Island! A truly magical place, where young students gather to learn and use all sorts of spells.
texts.I\u0027m a faithful Bovemist, no matter: I'm a faithful Bovemist, no matter what.
texts.Hey, have you heard about Gavel\u0027s l: Hey, have you heard about Gavel's legendary hero, Siegfried?
texts.Maybe I\u0027m just startin\u0027 to get: Maybe I'm just startin' to get a bit old, but I could've sworn they were much closer not long ago.
texts.These journeys take a little while, thou: These journeys take a little while, though, so I usually like to tell stories to pass the time.
texts.I may\u0027ve been drunk, but I can tell: 我有可能是喝醉了，但是我还是能分辨真相和我的胡思乱想。它有个巨大的骷髅头在它船头上。
texts.I just got back from a trip to Nemract,: I just got back from a trip to Nemract, and I gotta tell ya all about this crazy story I 'eard.
texts.You can learn a lot about the ocean from: You can learn a lot about the ocean from me, maybe you'll find out where to go adventurin' next.
texts.Corkus is one of the most interestin\u00: Corkus是我航行过的最有趣的地方其中之一。在岛上的那些机械太不可思议了。
texts.Did I ever tell you the story about how: Did I ever tell you the story about how I got into the Seaskipper business in the first place?
texts.It\u0027s been pleasant journey, my frie: 这真是一个令人愉快的旅程，我的伙计，不过它将要结束了。我们抵达了你的目的地！
texts.Let me tell ya, ol\u0027 Zhight is a rea: Let me tell ya, ol' Zhight is a real lunatic, and it seems to have rubbed off onto his neighbors.
texts.They make everything out of quartz there: They make everything out of quartz there. Most of it comes from the Karoc Quarry. Hell, they have so much that they'll soon start eating it!
texts.Last time I did it was near the Dead Isl: Last time I did it was near the Dead Island. It looked like it had anchored in place. I bet ya it's still there if you go check.
texts.Y\u0027know, I rarely get a client who t: 你知道，我很难得能遇见和我这样交谈的旅客。
texts.Did you ever \u0027ear about the Bear Zo: Did you ever 'ear about the Bear Zoo on that island? Almost no one has!
texts.Despite how poor it is, everyone stops t: 不管它究竟有多么贫困，每个人停留在那儿就会去他们的酒吧。哪一名水手想在没品尝过美味的Nemract威士忌的情况下死去呢。
texts.I respect what they’re doin\u0027, becau: I respect what they’re doin', because I know a thing or two about wantin' to get a little recognition...
texts.He insisted that it was currency in his: He insisted that it was currency in his homeland.
texts.They’ve got this newfangled electromagic: They’ve got this newfangled electromagic that's way beyond my understandin'.
texts.Hope you didn\u0027t get too salty while: Hope you didn't get too salty while you were on board, we're about to reach the shore soon!
texts.But you, you listen to me. You keep me a: But you, you listen to me. You keep me a good company.
texts.Y\u0027know, there\u0027s a sailor tale: 你知道，有一个水手传言是有艘闹鬼的船在周围航海。很多人说它是假的，但是我亲眼见到过！
texts.Its owner earns money by selling bear ma: Its owner earns money by selling bear masks and showing off an old bear he caught. Says he's keepin' it safe from the corruption.
texts.We\u0027re heading straight to a pirate: We're heading straight to a pirate paradise indeed!
texts.I found great riches, there was more mon: I found great riches, there was more money than I knew what to do with!
texts.The war was getting pretty intense last: The war was getting pretty intense last I heard. But that was a while ago, maybe things have finally quieted down...
texts.I can see the shore off in the distance!: I can see the shore off in the distance! Hang tight, we're almost there!
texts.Just buy a pass from the Seasail Shop an: 你只需要从Seasail商店购买一张船票，你就几乎能去大海的所有地方！
texts.Have you heard tales about Captain Redbe: Have you heard tales about Captain Redbeard? Back when I was young, he terrorized the seas!
texts.Of course, one day even Redbeard would m: Of course, one day even Redbeard would meet his end. One day, his ship crashed, but his body was never recovered...
texts.So this one sailor, who clearly had quit: So this one sailor, who clearly had quite a few drinks, starts braggin' about how he fought a giant squid.
texts.The whole bar was \u0027bout as drunk as: The whole bar was 'bout as drunk as he was, so they all bought his ridiculous story. But I had just got there, so I knew it was fake.
texts.You see the hopper on the boat? Toss you: 你看到船上的那个漏斗的吗？把你船票投进去就能上路了！
texts.He\u0027s known all across the province: He's known all across the province as their great defender. They say he's slayed dragons and fought off armies.
texts.He was so drunk that he said the squid h: He was so drunk that he said the squid he fought had a name, but it's pretty clear to me there ain't no squid named "Squiggles".
texts.Heard that they had their idea of buildi: Heard that they had their idea of building an academy in Selchar rejected, so they decided to make their own island, with magic books and enchanted stones.
texts.I suppose the afterlife must have its ow: I suppose the afterlife must have its own economy, too.
texts.All I got was this little boat. So I had: All I got was this little boat. So I had to find some way to make money with it.
texts.I found a treasure chest inside the wate: I found a treasure chest inside the waters! Naturally I hauled it aboard and opened it up.
texts.As the legend goes, Redbeard was the fir: As the legend goes, Redbeard was the first to ever set sail upon the seas, but more notably, the first pirate.
texts.Everyone\u0027s just silent and wants to: Everyone's just silent and wants to get to their destination as soon as possible.
texts.I hope you brought your warm clothes, be: I hope you brought your warm clothes, because we're headin' for the Ice Nations. The two used to live peacefully, until some argument about a stolen treasure broke out.

texts.Hey, someone entered! Look out for them,: Hey, someone entered! Look out for them, and arrest them!

I seem to have overestimated the humans.
Let the ashes serve as a reminder that...
I sense no traces of life.
Every city will suffer the same fate.
texts.I think §r§a§omy§r§a army can take care: I think §r§a§omy§r§a army can take care of this.
texts.An army is only an army if it is coordin: An army is only an army if it is coordinated. This...

texts.Finally! Got my... Hey, that\u0027s none: Finally! Got my... Hey, that's none of your business. Get one yourself by those shady figures around the bar!

texts.Blew a hole in the wall! Yep!: Blew a hole in the wall! Yep!

texts.Please don\u0027t disturb me now, it wil: Please don't disturb me now, it will soon be fixed, hopefully...
texts.Hmm. Hello there adventurer. I\u0027m tr: Hmm. Hello there adventurer. I'm trying to fix this crane... The crane goes all the way down to the dark islands under Ahmsord.

texts.But that’s no fair! If I get a sword, I’: But that’s no fair! If I get a sword, I’ll be a hero like Siegfried!
texts.Look mom, they’re selling Siegfried’s sw: Look mom, they’re selling Siegfried’s sword! Can I buy one? Please?

texts.Now you have come to release me from my: Now you have come to release me from my tomb so that I may rule once more!

texts.No one knows where he came from, but he: No one knows where he came from, but he used to attack with the female dragon.
texts.Luckily, one time he attacked us alone a: Luckily, one time he attacked us alone and we managed to trap him and kill him. However, the other dragon has never been so easy...
texts.You know, the dragon that has been attac: You know, the dragon that has been attacking us recently isn't the only dragon to do so.

texts.Just wear that on your head, and the sec: Just wear that on your head, and the security magic surrounding the factory will allow you in.
texts.I recently bought a Guard Golem from the: I recently bought a Guard Golem from the factory I work in that produces them to protect my little village here.
texts.But when it was activated, it started ma: But when it was activated, it started making strange noises and ran away violently, destroying anything in its way...
texts.I recommend you check out the factory th: I recommend you check out the factory these are made in, it is quite the experience! You'll be needing one of these to get in!
texts.The factory is disguised for legal reaso: The factory is disguised for legal reasons, so you will have to solve a quick puzzle to gain access to the underground, shouldn't be too much trouble.
texts.Have you taken a look at the Guard Golem: Have you taken a look at the Guard Golem Factory yet? You really should, great business. Lots of money to be made!
texts.I need you to find it and bring me back: I need you to find it and bring me back §r§3[1 Mechanical piece] §r§aand §r§3[1 Power source]§r§a.
texts.It ran into a cave at the top of a small: It ran into a cave at the top of a small mountain, you can find it by following this road out of the village and up the mountain path, good luck.
texts.The machine cannot be left alone, it is: The machine cannot be left alone, it is a danger to itself and others, not to mention it's worth a fortune, please retrieve the §r§3[1 Mechanical pieces] §r§aand §r§3[1 Power source] §r§aand bring them back to me.
texts.Ah yes, you brought all the pieces back: Ah yes, you brought all the pieces back for repair, wonderful! I can't pay you back what it's worth, but here is a little reward for your troubles.
texts.You sir! Yes, you with the small nose, I: You sir! Yes, you with the small nose, I need your help. I hear you human folk are always on the look out for some dangerous work.

texts.Participate? Pirate QUEEN. Are ye a fema: Participate? Pirate QUEEN. Are ye a female? Actually, I can't see under yer helmet. Ye might be.
texts.Watcha\u0027 think you\u0027re doin\u002: Watcha' think you're doin' there, landwalker? I said, the trials are for the ladies only!
texts.Another contestant, huh? Fine, I\u0027ll: Another contestant, huh? Fine, I'll let you in. Hurry up, though, the cerimony is starting soon!
texts.Off with ya now! Before I call the gals: Off with ya now! Before I call the gals to gut you.
texts.Back off! No\u0027ne enters \u0027til th: Back off! No'ne enters 'til the pirate queen is chosen. What's a landwalker like you doin' here?

texts.He owes me some favors. So, he will exch: He owes me some favors. So, he will exchange it for a magical powder of your choice.
texts.Now, you\u0027ll need a §r§dPowder Maste: Now, you'll need a §r§dPowder Master §r§ato apply powders, but there's one at the end of this forest...
texts.Why yes, I actually have something that: Why yes, I actually have something that could help you...
texts.It\u0027s a bit dangerous, but the big c: It's a bit dangerous, but the big city of Detlas is past there, so good luck going through!
texts.Oh, my brother? Sorry, I didn\u0027t kno: Oh, my brother? Sorry, I didn't know.
texts.I don\u0027t have time to talk to you ri: I don't have time to talk to you right now, move along!
texts.They keep coming expecting free stuff! W: They keep coming expecting free stuff! What a cruel joke he is pulling on me...
texts.You can enchant your weapon and armour w: You can enchant your weapon and armour with it, making them much more powerful!
texts.Take this note. Bring it to the merchant: Take this note. Bring it to the merchant right behind you.
texts.So... eh, you can\u0027t miss him. You\u: So... eh, you can't miss him. You're probably headed through the Nivla Forest now, aren't you?
texts.Go on, I don\u0027t have time for you. M: Go on, I don't have time for you. My brother keeps sending me people all the time.

texts.Soldier! I\u0027m not sure it is wise to: Soldier! I'm not sure it is wise to be here... An icy death awaits you if you proceed. A death that I will cause..
texts.They should all have been buried in a gr: They should all have been buried in a graveyard, not a crypt! It's not a resting place, it's a prison for the undead.
texts.I have many regrets of my time spent ali: I have many regrets of my time spent alive in Wynn. I do not wish for my lingering mistakes to harm anyone else. Turn back.
The Cryptlord, Hine, Farda and Dwendle... All of them were good people once, now look at the monsters they've become!

texts.I\u0027m sure I can take it back somehow: I'm sure I can take it back somehow... if I just- Hey, get out of here! I'm trying to concentrate!

texts.Very impressive! Here\u0027s your reward: Very impressive! Here's your reward. I found it a while ago while walking around Nemract. It probably fell off a skeleton!
texts.Hey! You down there! How \u0027bout you: Hey! You down there! How 'bout you come talk to me before throwing your life away?
texts.Their spirits still haunt this grave and: Their spirits still haunt this grave and infect the minds of people who disturb them. It isn’t pretty.
texts.Those that had not already died had to b: Those that had not already died had to be executed due to the insanity brought on from the corruption.
texts.This is where they buried the corpses of: This is where they buried the corpses of the poor Miners who discovered what is now named the Nether Gate.
texts.I have great respect for those who can c: I have great respect for those who can conquer death and befriend the dead. If you succeed, I will give you something you might be interested in.
texts.However, I heard rumours of those who we: However, I heard rumours of those who were able to bathe in their waters and be accepted by them, to show no fear of the dead is to be admired.
texts.If you are too scared to go down there,: If you are too scared to go down there, I understand. Dealing with the souls of the dead isn't for everyone.
texts.Maybe this shrine that I keep hearing ab: Maybe this shrine that I keep hearing about has something to do with it? It’s apparently hidden deep into this hole.
texts.Greetings. I wasn\u0027t expecting anyon: Greetings. I wasn't expecting anyone to come here. I assume you don't know the tale of this pit...

texts.People say that the firey dragon once at: People say that the firey dragon once attacked the city of Detlas in the Wynn Province.
texts.The legend probably isn\u0027t true, how: The legend probably isn't true, however. I visited Wynn once and no one ever mentioned a dragon attacking.

texts.StAy AWaY frOM Me!!! mY GLoWy!!!§r§a§k:!: StAy AWaY frOM Me!!! mY GLoWy!!!§r§a§k:!"LO(18930

texts.This map... How did you acquire it? This: This map... How did you acquire it? This is enchanted by our people.
texts.Brilliant. That seems in order. Here you: Brilliant. That seems in order. Here you go.
texts.We hope that you will use the boots for: We hope that you will use the boots for good, despite the dark intentions. We will lift the enchantment once lain upon the charts, but it will cost you.
texts.Well? What does it say? Go to that locat: Well? What does it say? Go to that location! Find the treasure!
texts.A pair of boots, made from a black mater: A pair of boots, made from a black material fashioned from the stone of an evil place, incredibly dark magic. But we do not believe the filthy idiotic pirate knew what he'd found.
texts.Give me §r§3[20 Emerald Blocks]§r§a, tha: Give me §r§3[20 Emerald Blocks]§r§a, that should cover the cost.
texts.We only hope that the boots will never f: We only hope that the boots will never fall into the hands of that pirate again, we'd much rather they fall into yours.
texts.Who knows why he even kept the boots. If: Who knows why he even kept the boots. If he had known about their power, I'm sure he would have used it for evil. But we sense no evil in you, so as such we will aid you in your quest.
texts.You... You seek Sarnfic, don\u0027t you?: You... You seek Sarnfic, don't you?
texts.Ah, I see, you wish to explore the ocean: Ah, I see, you wish to explore the ocean depths? But for what possible reason?
texts.I must say, we, the council regret havin: I must say, we, the council regret having to lay waste an entire village over a pair of boots. There was no other way.
texts.What\u0027s this? A traveller? How might: What's this? A traveller? How might we assist you?
texts.Alas, that place has history. We, the Ma: Alas, that place has history. We, the Mage Council, banished that city long ago to hide the horrific power hidden within a treasure a pirate hid there.

texts.Bring me §r§3[14 Rotten Flesh]§r§a, that: Bring me §r§3[14 Rotten Flesh]§r§a, that should do it. Ancient Nemract is filled with zombies, it's toward the south-west.
texts.If you really want to enter it, I\u0027d: If you really want to enter it, I'd have to purify it so it doesn't corrupt you.
texts.This place is very dangerous, I suggest: This place is very dangerous, I suggest you to leave as soon as you can.
texts.You should be able to enter the crypt no: You should be able to enter the crypt now. But be careful, you are entering at your own risk.
texts.Are you trying to go down into the crypt: Are you trying to go down into the crypt? Oh, that is a very bad idea.
texts.It should be... \"safe\", now. Be very c: It should be... "safe", now. Be very careful, you are entering at your own risk.
texts.This place has been corrupted, and the d: This place has been corrupted, and the dead came back to life. We had to break the stairs to protect this cathedral.

texts.Sadly Strato is no longer alive. He used: Sadly Strato is no longer alive. He used to work and live at the woodcutting camp northwest of Nesaak. We always met here, caught fish and told each other stories. I really miss those times...
texts.You\u0027re searching a §r§3[Mythic Ever: You're searching a §r§3[Mythic Everlasting Pufferfish]§r§a? Hmm I heard that name before, my friend, Strato, told me about it years ago. If I remember correctly it is infinite, you can feed every single person in all the provinces from this single fish.
texts.Oh you look a bit lost, let me help you,: Oh you look a bit lost, let me help you, I've lived here for a long time, I know every corner and every snowflake.
texts.Can I ask you something? As you might se: Can I ask you something? As you might see I'm not the richest guy, or the youngest. If you manage to catch that fish, could you hand it over? I know we just met but you seem like somebody who would help an old man.
texts.Your best bet is to go to the woodcuttin: Your best bet is to go to the woodcutting camp northwest of Nesaak, there should be some bait there. Just catch it in the river by the dock when you get it.
texts.Don\u0027t you just love fishing? The li: Don't you just love fishing? The little waves in the river, the wind and the rewarding feeling when you catch something, those are my favorite things about it.
texts.I know you might need the pufferfish for: I know you might need the pufferfish for something else, but please think about giving it to me. It would warm my heart.
texts.Maybe you can find some sort of bait the: Maybe you can find some sort of bait there, he had some of the best bait I have ever seen. You should be able to acquire some and throw it in the water, maybe that will attract the pufferfish.

texts.Don\u0027t mind our other guest back the: Don't mind our other guest back there. He had such a bitter taste. However, my babies think you look delicious... hehehe...

texts.You\u0027re awake, good. Ha, I heard you: You're awake, good. Ha, I heard you took out quite a few of those pirates.
texts.There\u0027s a button next to the door o: There's a button next to the door on the left side, just press it to exit from here.
I have already made the base of the key. You just need to go back down the hall, and finish it.
texts.You must be here to take down the ship,: You must be here to take down the ship, and the pirate queen with it.
texts.I am a locksmith in Gavel, and they have: I am a locksmith in Gavel, and they have been using me to make their ship more secure.
I have been working on an escape though.
texts.At the back of the hall, I started a key: At the back of the hall, I started a key to the queen's quarters.
texts.I\u0027ve been a prisoner here for weeks: I've been a prisoner here for weeks. I was fly fishing when they captured me.

texts.We saw your battle with “Mech X” at the: We saw your battle with “Mech X” at the docks from above. I believe we can trust you.
texts.You can\u0027t catapult yourself into a: You can't catapult yourself into a village full of bird people and not get noticed.
texts.The key you seek is hidden deep within o: The key you seek is hidden deep within our most protected temple.
texts.Just follow the road to the north to fin: Just follow the road to the north to find my friend. Watch out, she doesn't like humans much.
texts.Follow the road north of here to reach t: Follow the road north of here to reach the temple. Speak to the grandmaster and she will allow you entry.
texts.Mo\u0027in, soldier. I have been expecti: Mo'in, soldier. I have been expecting you.
We know what you are here for, however. The Avos factory key.

texts.Hello...? Wait, I feel like I know you f: Hello...? Wait, I feel like I know you from somewhere...

texts.Are you familiar with the story of Theor: Are you familiar with the story of Theorick and Nesaak?
texts.For some reason Theorick Twain used his: For some reason Theorick Twain used his immense power to freeze the land before exiling himself here.
texts.Doing so is exhausting. I\u0027ll only b: Doing so is exhausting. I'll only be able to do so once, so if something goes wrong, you'll have to walk back there again.
texts.Well...in§r§a a way, at least. There are: Well...in§r§a a way, at least. There are laws to this sort of magic. For one, you need an item from the specific time we want to see. Second, you can witness the past, not change it.
texts.As §r§asuch...have§r§a you heard of a pl: As §r§asuch...have§r§a you heard of a place called Time Valley? We could use it to go back in time, to try to learn more about this barrier.
It unfreezes the entrance, you §r§asay...and...Th-Theorick...gave...he...what...§r§a? This raises so many more questions! Unless there was some other force at play...
texts.Wha...so§r§a many §r§arevelations...ice§: Wha...so§r§a many §r§arevelations...ice§r§a magic staves off corruption...? It is true that this place has seen less corrupted threats than other places in the province...
texts.During Theorick\u0027s time, this place: During Theorick's time, this place was like the Wynn plains, warm and arable.
texts.We need to find out why so we can revers: We need to find out why so we can reverse this spell. Assumedly, the source of that spell's magic would be within here.
Well, ruminating on that will not help. Were you able to figure out why it was Theorick froze this place, at least?
texts.Dear God... We\u0027ve had it all wrong: Dear God... We've had it all wrong this whole time... This was to protect §r§aeveryone...but§r§a surely he would have told someone his intentions if he was of that sound a mind!
texts.You can come help me when you\u0027re le: You can come help me when you're level 43
texts.Ah, a member of the Ragni army. We\u0027: Ah, a member of the Ragni army. We're trying to gain entry to this frozen barrow. We could use your aid.
texts.So, you met Theorick? He was always said: So, you met Theorick? He was always said to have fallen from heroism after the great freezing.
texts.I\u0027m trying to find a way to undo th: I'm trying to find a way to undo the curse blocking this entrance.
texts.Hm...wait§r§a, this §r§aflame...did§r§a: Hm...wait§r§a, this §r§aflame...did§r§a you receive it from the Temple of Time? How §r§adid...what§r§a §r§ais...this§r§a is impossible, given what we know!
texts.All this time, spent buried alive, wrest: All this time, spent buried alive, wrestling with the corruption. The thought horrifies you, as well, judging by your face. Killing him would be a mercy.
texts.It will be §r§adangerous...perhaps§r§a y: It will be §r§adangerous...perhaps§r§a your toughest fight §r§ayet...but§r§a it must be done. If you need time to prepare, do so. But you must end Theorick's pain.
texts.Here. Use this. It may help protect you: Here. Use this. It may help protect you within the Ice Barrows... Please, soldier. Be Theorick's guardian angel. Free him from this torment.
texts.You must have succeeded, or you would be: You must have succeeded, or you would be yet in the memory of the past. I can feel some potent magic on you.
texts.Probably not. Well, you see, Nesaak was: Probably not. Well, you see, Nesaak was not always frozen.
texts.Now, it is a long walk to Time Valley. N: Now, it is a long walk to Time Valley. Needn't take that walk, though, as I can teleport you there. Hopefully.
texts.One of Theorick\u0027s staves is on disp: One of Theorick's staves is on display in the Nesaak bank. Assumedly, it should work for what we need. Could you retrieve it somehow?
texts.Aha, quick job. I see you\u0027ve the wa: Aha, quick job. I see you've the wand. Must've needed a sharp tongue to get the bankers to give it up.
texts.Once you\u0027re there, enter the Temple: Once you're there, enter the Temple of Time. You should know what to do once you are there. Careful dealing with time travel, friend... No idea what you might find.

texts.Sorry, I have not seen the child you are: Sorry, I have not seen the child you are looking for.

texts.You are trying to reach the queen? Take: You are trying to reach the queen? Take us down? Ahaha, no chance. You have to get through us first.

texts.It\u0027s the stone castle just east of: It's the stone castle just east of here, along the separation line.
I’ll be here when you get back.
texts.Check the castle south-east of here for: Check the castle south-east of here for that treasure!
texts.Oh, a Human! We don\u0027t see many of y: Oh, a Human! We don't see many of your kind around here.
texts.Is this what you found? No map? No treas: Is this what you found? No map? No treasure?
texts.I’m not sure what the “Key” is, but be c: I’m not sure what the “Key” is, but be careful acquiring it. If it was easy, the key would have already been found.
texts.I hear you people work for cheap. Well,: I hear you people work for cheap. Well, I might have a little job for you.
texts.I\u0027d go myself, but why would I when: I'd go myself, but why would I when I can hire cheap help?
texts.There\u0027s a lot of green rock to be m: There's a lot of green rock to be made here, so listen up.
texts.Peh! What a waste of time. This isn\u002: Peh! What a waste of time. This isn't some §r§3Fable§r§a, kid! If you want to read fairy tales, go to the library.
texts.One of the oldest surviving structures o: One of the oldest surviving structures of the islands is rumoured to have the key to a fortune in it.
texts.You\u0027re back! What did you find?: You're back! What did you find?

texts.I\u0027m not a rat. I won\u0027t tell yo: I'm not a rat. I won't tell you anything.
texts.You aren\u0027t one of us. So you aren\u: You aren't one of us. So you aren't getting a word out of me.

texts.Hey, be careful! You don\u0027t want to: Hey, be careful! You don't want to get stuck in those webs!

texts.We don\u0027t know what they do there, b: We don't know what they do there, but occasionally we see some weird stuff on the horizon.
texts.You look strong enough to survive there: You look strong enough to survive there now, but I still wouldn't risk it if I were you.
texts.There is an old mining colony up north i: There is an old mining colony up north in Maro Peaks, but it’s been abandoned now and all that is left are the sheep and rams.
texts.There\u0027s a story that goes around ab: There's a story that goes around about a secret hideout for all of the most feared pirates across the seas.
texts.If you want to go you will need a climbi: If you want to go you will need a climbing helmet.
texts.Have you heard about Mage Island? It\u00: Have you heard about Mage Island? It's an island where many of the most powerful mages gather.
texts.That island to the northeast, Skien\u002: That island to the northeast, Skien's Island... don't ever go there. It's doomed desolation..
texts.General Skien moved to that island becau: General Skien moved to that island because one of his men got corrupted during a siege and attacked his forces. But I don't know the full story.
texts.The island is to the southeast, the floa: The island is to the southeast, the floating island is impossible to miss.
texts.They say their hideout is on an island t: They say their hideout is on an island to the east, but no one dares go near it.

texts.What are you doing in Thanos? We need a: What are you doing in Thanos? We need a soldier of true strength to take on a dragon.
texts.A measley weakling like you would be chi: A measley weakling like you would be chicken feed to Ozoth. Come back when you get some meat on those bones. Level 82 should do.

texts.Good luck on your quest. Bob was a great: Good luck on your quest. Bob was a great hero, anything to help him is good in my book.
texts.Think you can get those from monsters so: Think you can get those from monsters somewhere 'round Nesaak.
... Hi again. I see you got the weapons.
texts.What can I do for ya?: What can I do for ya?
texts.Here is the soul. It\u0027s a little bit: Here is the soul. It's a little bit crushed, but it can do the trick.
texts.Bring me the weapons of your friend, and: Bring me the weapons of your friend, and I'll see if I can do something with it!
texts.Oh yes! I can extract the soul from weap: Oh yes! I can extract the soul from weapons!
texts.Oh it\u0027s... those weapons. Well, if: Oh it's... those weapons. Well, if you know what you're doing...
These weapons emanate so much sadness... I'm sure you heard about Bob's story...

texts.Us guards have been trying to root out d: Us guards have been trying to root out desert bandits trying to rob the bank.
texts.Great! The store from the first witness: Great! The store from the first witness report is straight down the stairs, just past this here building, just behind me.
texts.We\u0027re using reports from witnesses: We're using reports from witnesses to try to gain information.
texts.You look like a hardy one, Ragni army is: You look like a hardy one, Ragni army is it? Would you be willing to help Almuj a bit?
texts.I could use some assistance with this ca: I could use some assistance with this case; however, I need an investigator at least level 32 to help.
texts.If I give you some of the witness report: If I give you some of the witness reports, will you help get clues from them?
texts.The store that you should read the repor: The store that you should read the report in is named “Gibbs' Mining Supply Store,” and it's the store that was robbed.
texts.I will write the coordinates to the stor: I will write the coordinates to the store so you can read the report just in case you can't find it.

texts.We\u0027re pretty far from the §r§dPorta: We're pretty far from the §r§dPortal §r§aso I don't know how they got here. They even broke the bridge!
texts.Just hit the pickaxe to pick it up. Then: Just hit the pickaxe to pick it up. Then §r§bleft-click§r§a the ore with it to mine ingots!
texts.I left my pickaxe by the ore over yonder: I left my pickaxe by the ore over yonder. Use it to mine some copper and bring it back here.
texts.I\u0027ve been waiting for you three, yo: I've been waiting for you three, you're late. There's a bit of trouble up ahead. You will need to get yourself some materials.
texts.The guards told me to send you on ahead: The guards told me to send you on ahead with that copper so you can get yourself kitted out.
texts.Well, you thought wrong. You\u0027ll nee: Well, you thought wrong. You'll need the materials to make yourself something to fight with.
texts.I left my fishing rod by the pond over y: I left my fishing rod by the pond over yonder. Punch it and pick it up. Then fish §r§3[2 Gudgeon Oil]§r§a and bring it back here.
texts.The guards told me to send you on ahead: The guards told me to send you on ahead with that oil so you can get yourself kitted out.
texts.There\u0027s a crafting station up ahead: There's a crafting station up ahead. You three can §r§a§lforge weapons§r§a there.
texts.Mine §r§3[2 Copper Ingots]§r§a and then: Mine §r§3[2 Copper Ingots]§r§a and then bring them to me.
texts.Normally, this place is pretty safe, but: Normally, this place is pretty safe, but somehow a few corrupt slipped through.
Just hit the fishing rod to pick it up. Then §r§bleft-click§r§a the fish with it to get the oil!
texts.That looks like the stuff. I was sent ah: That looks like the stuff. I was sent ahead by the guards to warn any newcomers.
texts.Hey, you three! Come over here and talk: Hey, you three! Come over here and talk to me.

texts.Mo\u0027in! You are a traveler, aren\u00: Mo'in! You are a traveler, aren't you? If only I could just leave this island and explore...
texts.Don\u0027t go in there, it\u0027s under: Don't go in there, it's under control.
texts.I could be just like §r§bSiegfried§r§a,: I could be just like §r§bSiegfried§r§a, a travelling hero who left his home, Corkus, to help those in danger.
texts.I wonder if he misses Corkus, I definite: I wonder if he misses Corkus, I definitely would. Maybe I'm not made for adventure.
Something has happened in the vault.

texts.Citizens are going missing at an alarmin: Citizens are going missing at an alarming rate. We have lost 10 people in just 3 weeks. There hasn't been a trace of them anywhere, nor a sign of a struggle.
texts.Actually, you look like someone who has: Actually, you look like someone who has done their fair share of investigating. You come here in some fairly unique armor from another land. Perhaps you can help me.
