texts.You should seek him out, he may know som: You should seek him out, he may know something about it. However, being as crooked as he is, the information won't be free.
texts.Have you found any leads since I sent yo: Have you found any leads since I sent you to my contact, Daxe?
texts.He claims he just wants to live peaceful: He claims he just wants to live peacefully in the swamp, but I'm not so sure. Nevertheless, he's handy to have as a contact. He hears about things the police don't.
texts.Bring him §r§3[64 Emeralds] §r§ato bribe: Bring him §r§3[64 Emeralds] §r§ato bribe him and hope he is in a good mood. Good luck. You can find him in his humble swamp house along the west road.
texts.Hotor, Etan, Athomo, Arperi, Etyir, Taiy: Hotor, Etan, Athomo, Arperi, Etyir, Taiyroth, On'omi, Danin, Nesys, Onton. Have you seen any of these people?
texts.You wouldn\u0027t have expected it, with: You wouldn't have expected it, with all the guard golems we've been donated recently! Excellent, together we can solve this.
texts.I have a contact, his name is Daxe. He w: I have a contact, his name is Daxe. He was outlawed from Olux after it was discovered that he was wanted in several places for organized crime.

texts.Stay away! I do not need any more troubl: Stay away! I do not need any more trouble.
texts.Alright, I might be an addict but I\u002: Alright, I might be an addict but I'm a man of me word.
texts.Eh, what do you want? The password? Well: Eh, what do you want? The password? Well, do you got any spores? Neh, you look like too much of a goodie goodie.
texts.I need it! The spores! Haven\u0027t got: I need it! The spores! Haven't got no money, no nothing! UNFAIR!
texts.I gave him so much over the years and he: I gave him so much over the years and he gives me NOTHING.
texts.Just this once he could help me out. Jus: Just this once he could help me out. Just to see me through. GARH!
texts.Bring me the ticket that fell in the wat: Bring me the ticket that fell in the water in the airbase and I'll tell you the password.
texts.Das’ it! Me ticket! I can sell it now an: Das’ it! Me ticket! I can sell it now and buy me spores.
texts.I just need some to see me through. Tell: I just need some to see me through. Tell you what, if you do something for me I'll give you the password.
texts.Someone threw me ticket in the water tha: Someone threw me ticket in the water that I was gunna sell.
texts.Okay, now just go back to the guard with: Okay, now just go back to the guard with the password, and they'll let you in.
texts.Back in the airbase, right down the midd: Back in the airbase, right down the middle! Go and look for it good and proper. It might have floated around! Hurry!

texts.Scout! Report your findings, immediately: Scout! Report your findings, immediately! How many corrupteds are coming?
texts.Wait, w-what\u0027s going on? What\u0027: Wait, w-what's going on? What's happening to you?!
texts.Thousands...? This is far worse than I e: Thousands...? This is far worse than I expected. Men! Prepare for-
texts.Help me, I\u0027m trapped in here! If yo: 救救我，我被困在这里了！如果你能救我出去，我就能帮你击退那些僵尸！

texts.I love airships, and I have never seen o: I love airships, and I have never seen one like that.
texts.I know I shouldn\u0027t be down here but: I know I shouldn't be down here but...
texts.Do you see that ship in the distance? I: Do you see that ship in the distance? I don't recognise it.
texts.Hey! Look at that ship over in the dista: Hey! Look at that ship over in the distance. It has been following the ship almost since we left off.
texts.Okay then, I will come back. Just let me: Okay then, I will come back. Just let me get one last look at it, I'll meet you on the passenger deck.

texts.Please, stop this! Whoever you are, leav: Please, stop this! Whoever you are, leave me and my family in peace! What did we ever do to deserve this?!
texts.Wha...you§r§a mean... N-no, please! I do: Wha...you§r§a mean... N-no, please! I don't want to hurt anyone! I don't want to die!!

texts.No, they’re far too expensive. And a swo: No, they’re far too expensive. And a sword is something far too dangerous for you to play with.

Oh man, I feel like a weight has lifted.
texts.The only problem is my eyebrows are stuc: The only problem is my eyebrows are stuck like this...

texts.Heh, some pesky skyraiders shattered a f: Heh, some pesky skyraiders shattered a few windows on the upper floors... Gonna take a good while to fix em', but the boss wants it done quick, he doesn't like when his treasure is at risk.

texts.I\u0027ve marked the direction to the sh: I've marked the direction to the shrine in your book. Remember, there should be hints right nearby the shrine. Good luck.
texts.I\u0027m sure you\u0027ve noticed, but t: I'm sure you've noticed, but there is a tribe camp not far from here.
texts.Second, about the shrine. Now, this is j: Second, about the shrine. Now, this is just a rumor, but apparently that tomb is not unique.
texts.There are supposed to be a bunch of thes: There are supposed to be a bunch of these altars scattered around the province, even in Gavel too!
texts.Anyway, I\u0027ve talked enough. I\u0027: Anyway, I've talked enough. I'm proud to have such a powerful fighter join our town! I wish you luck, friend!
texts.He keeps reviving his minions and it\u00: He keeps reviving his minions and it's causing quite some problems to our army.
texts.If true, you should look for them. While: If true, you should look for them. While the fights will be tough, I would imagine great rewards could be gotten from them!
texts.Oh! So you want to become a member of th: Oh! So you want to become a member of this town?
texts.They quickly realised that it was a bad: They quickly realised that it was a bad idea, so they locked him in a tomb.
texts.Have you found the shrine yet? I\u0027ve: Have you found the shrine yet? I've heard that throwing something as tribute to it could do the trick... There should be clues about what it might be near the shrine.
texts.You will have to help us first, of cours: You will have to help us first, of course!
texts.Bring me back §r§3[1 Antic Bead] §r§aas: Bring me back §r§3[1 Antic Bead] §r§aas a proof of its death, and I will let you become a citizen.
texts.They used to have a powerful chief, but: They used to have a powerful chief, but he eventually died in battle.
texts.Well, welcome to this town, adventurer!: Well, welcome to this town, adventurer! You are now officially a citizen.
texts.Oh, but before you go! I do have a few t: Oh, but before you go! I do have a few things to say. First, about the beads here.
texts.The tribe couldn\u0027t bear the fact th: The tribe couldn't bear the fact that he was dead. They performed some unethical necromancy spell on him.
texts.The tribesmen accept these as currency,: The tribesmen accept these as currency, so if you collect enough, I've heard they can offer you powerful masks.
texts.You can access the tomb from a sacrifici: You can access the tomb from a sacrificial shrine, I've heard, but I'm not sure how. There are probably hints nearby the shrine.

texts.Get to the castle, we\u0027ll handle all: 快进入城堡！我们会处理掉这些僵尸的！

texts.Ah! It seems I have a subject for my nex: Ah! It seems I have a subject for my next experiment. Don't worry, human, this will only hurt... a lot.

texts.Halt! This cave is full of monsters! I w: 这个洞穴已经被怪物占领了！除非你戴好头盔，否则我是不会让你进去的。你可以在那边的商人那买一个头盔。

texts.Welcome back, I suppose you’re a Wynn ci: 欢迎回家！我想你已经成为了Wynn的居民之一了。我听说了很多关于你为这个省份作出的功绩，干得漂亮！
texts.Ragni has three gates. The northern gate: Ragni有三座大门。北城门通往Katoa的农场与旧Ragni下水道的入口。但是那些下水道现在已经被怪物占领了，所以请小心前往。
texts.Welcome to Ragni, new recruit. How’s Fru: 欢迎来到Ragni，新兵！最近Fruma如何？好吧，让我给你指指路。
texts.The southern gate leads to the dangerous: 南边的大门则通往危险的猪人峡谷。如果我是你，在15级之前我会乖乖的离那里远点。
texts.I\u0027d recommend you head eastwards. I: 我推荐你往东边前进。你可以沿着这条小路穿过Nivla森林，一路前往这个省份的中心城市，Detlas。
texts.You\u0027ve helped a lot of people. Keep: 你已经帮助了很多人了。再接再厉，我们会赢得这场战争的。

What in the world? Catapulting humans..
texts.I better go tell the chief the Corkians: I better go tell the chief the Corkians have a catapult, though.
texts.You know, a trebuchet is the best way to: You know, a trebuchet is the best way to launch 90kg projectiles over 300 meters.

texts.Ahh, here we go. I got your passport rig: Ahh, here we go. I got your passport right here. But It's gunna cost ya, and not the monetary kind.
texts.Just go up the ladder and enter the stor: Just go up the ladder and enter the storage and get your passport.
texts.I\u0027m sure I saw some passports in th: I'm sure I saw some passports in the "lost and found" box that arrived here this mornin'.
texts.I have been trying to… acquire some secr: I have been trying to… acquire some secret documents from the administrational office for ages.
Never seen someone like you around ‘ere. You look like army folk.
texts.I can\u0027t give up an opportunity like: I can't give up an opportunity like this, a goodie goodie like you, walking in, asking for help. My associates would never pull this off. The office is just at the second floor of the airbase.
texts.I admit, it is very complicated. Anyway,: I admit, it is very complicated. Anyway, a deal is a deal.
texts.I want you to head over there, find a wa: I want you to head over there, find a way in to their secret vault, and bring me back the secret documents.
texts.If you manage to bring me back the secre: If you manage to bring me back the secret documents, you can go get your passport back, for free.
texts.Oh, and, there will be a security questi: Oh, and, there will be a security question at the door. I am sure you can figure that out easily enough, though. Heh..
texts.Back already? I guess you have a keen se: Back already? I guess you have a keen sense of direction! Most people get hideously lost in the airbase.
texts.Many documents that are “lost” often fin: Many documents that are “lost” often find their way here.
texts.Oh, you say you are looking for a stolen: Oh, you say you are looking for a stolen passport? Oh well of course, officer!
texts.Looking to buy some of my fine documents: Looking to buy some of my fine documents?

texts.Now in theory, it should be weak to §r§c: Now in theory, it should be weak to §r§c✹ Fire§r§a. These elemental attributes are not uncommon.
texts.Let me explain. That cave creature is li: Let me explain. That cave creature is living root, it contains the properties of §r§2✤ Earth§r§a.
texts.Ah! Finally! I\u0027ve been waiting for: Ah! Finally! I've been waiting for a recruit like yourself to turn up.
texts.We\u0027ve captured a cave beast in a ca: We've captured a cave beast in a cage over there. We believe certain magical weapons will harm them more than others.
texts.Let\u0027s test it out shall we? Take th: Let's test it out shall we? Take this book and exchange it for a §r§c✹ Fire§r§a infused weapon.
texts.Use it on the creature and I\u0027ll stu: Use it on the creature and I'll study whatever remains you give me.
texts.We\u0027re running experiments to improv: We're running experiments to improve our arsenal in the war effort.

texts.Welcome to Ynnos\u0027 research facility: Welcome to Ynnos' research facility! Hello, how can I help you?

texts.Man, when are we going to get more coal?: Man, when are we going to get more coal? Coal is essential to Thesead.
texts.The miners were supposed to bring coal w: The miners were supposed to bring coal weeks ago. The mines are just southwest of here, maybe I should go over there...
texts.We\u0027ve had to start cutting down tre: We've had to start cutting down trees for firewood. The people here are freezing.

texts.You do not have the permission to enter: You do not have the permission to enter this graveyard.
texts.What.. What have they done to me?: What.. What have they done to me?

texts.You cannot have the key. Prepare for des: You cannot have the key. Prepare for destruction.

texts.Truth is, we simply don\u0027t know enou: Truth is, we simply don't know enough about him to know how to deal with this.
texts.Maybe if you could help us find out more: Maybe if you could help us find out more we could figure this out.
texts.Soldier, we haven\u0027t made any progre: Soldier, we haven't made any progress getting to Garoth.
texts.This isn’t working. Great, now a Ragni s: This isn’t working. Great, now a Ragni soldier is here for a progress report.
texts.Garoth, many years ago lived and studied: Garoth, many years ago lived and studied in Elkurn. It might be a good place to start.

texts.Now, I would get it myself, but I dare n: Now, I would get it myself, but I dare not enter the swamp. Trust me, that place is filled with all kinds of evil.
texts.Bring me §r§3[1 Black Whistle Leaf] §r§a: Bring me §r§3[1 Black Whistle Leaf] §r§afrom the top of the mountain, and you can have a part of my earnings.
texts.Hello! Hmm, armour, weapon, look of grim: Hello! Hmm, armour, weapon, look of grim despair . . . . You must be from the Wynn province!
texts.My name is Voer, and I\u0027m a chemistr: My name is Voer, and I'm a chemistry merchant. I sell all kinds of, uh, legal goods to the magicians of Gavel.
texts.Lately, the need for Black Whistle leave: Lately, the need for Black Whistle leaves has grown so high, I'm running low on them.
texts.Great! Look for the highest mountain in: Great! Look for the highest mountain in the swamp south-east from here. The flower itself is on top of it, and... Good luck!
texts.Go and get me the flower; I wrote the lo: Go and get me the flower; I wrote the location in your book!
texts.It is a rather rare plant that only grow: It is a rather rare plant that only grows at a certain altitude in the swamp, and has all sorts of mystical properties, so much so that it brings inanimate objects to life!
texts.Well, I\u0027ve heard great things about: Well, I've heard great things about you people. I have a task for you, if you should take it.

texts.It\u0027s the least I can do, you saved: It's the least I can do, you saved my home afterall.
texts.Alrighty, we are almost in Corkus, hold: Alrighty, we are almost in Corkus, hold tight.
texts.Alrighty, we are almost in Gavel, hold t: Alrighty, we are almost in Gavel, hold tight.
texts.Hello, just climb aboard and I\u0027ll t: Hello, just climb aboard and I'll take you to Corkus City in Corkus!
texts.We want to open up international travel!: We want to open up international travel!
texts.Hello, just climb aboard and I\u0027ll t: Hello, just climb aboard and I'll take you to Kandon-Beda in Gavel!

texts.Do you have any eggs to trade? I know so: Do you have any eggs to trade? I know someone around here is selling one, I just don't know who.

HELLO... I AM A... HUMAN... FARMER.
texts.DO YOU... HAVE... ANY BUSINESS... WITH M: DO YOU... HAVE... ANY BUSINESS... WITH ME?

texts.Oh, I beg your forgiveness, I don’t thin: Oh, I beg your forgiveness, I don’t think you're quite ready to help me yet, or go into the cave. Come talk to me when you're level 31.

texts.Have you ever looked into a golems eyes,: Have you ever looked into a golems eyes, and seen them look back? Oh, the person they once were is still in there.
texts.So you have decided to take my bribe? Yo: So you have decided to take my bribe? You have chosen well. Here you are, now please escort yourself to the exit.
texts.Innovation is the key to great wealth. I: Innovation is the key to great wealth. I'm no criminal, just an innovator.
texts.Oh my… look at you.. all the way at the: Oh my… look at you.. all the way at the end of my factory. I must admit I'm surprised to have a visitor. I don't really have anything on hand to kill you with in my office.
texts.Without them you\u0027d be struggling un: Without them you'd be struggling under the weight of the undead, think about that for a second. Is what I'm doing really that bad, sacrifice a few to save thousands? And make a pocket full of emeralds at the same time.
texts.I will give you a substantial amount of: I will give you a substantial amount of emeralds and a piece of quality iron armor in return for your silence on my little operation here.
texts.Metal forged with flesh, an unbeatable c: Metal forged with flesh, an unbeatable combination. Of course, emotions and memories must be repressed in order to maintain obedience.
texts.I\u0027ll give you some time to consider: I'll give you some time to consider my proposition. Speak to me again if you wish to take up my offer, otherwise get out of here and don’t return.
texts.They just can\u0027t communicate with yo: They just can't communicate with you or even move under their own will. I almost feel a connection when I make eye contact with them. Strange really, I'm sure they don't feel much except cold.
texts.I advise you take my deal, the consequen: I advise you take my deal, the consequences of reporting this to the authorities will be most severe. I produce the protective machinery that guards half of your home province!
texts.You have seen it all then and you cannot: You have seen it all then and you cannot un-see it. Yes, this is where all the iron golems you've ever encountered originated from, and I'm sure you have figured out how they are made.
texts.Look at me! I\u0027m rambling! I must ha: Look at me! I'm rambling! I must have been down here alone for quite some time! Well, not alone, but not with any company that converses! I shall make you a deal.

texts.I will just ask the next one who comes a: I will just ask the next one who comes around, no need to have you run around all day. Take this, I appreciate your effort.
texts.Where is the §r§3[Breathing Helmet I] §r: Where is the §r§3[Breathing Helmet I] §r§aI asked you for?
texts.I would like to commission you to invest: I would like to commission you to investigate, but since it's freezing cold in our lake you need something to protect you. I heard the people in Maltic on the coast of Wynn have something that can help you.
texts.Would you mind heading to our local armo: Would you mind heading to our local armour merchant and buying one of our §r§3[Breathing Helmet II]§r§a? I don't want you to drown. Just come back with the helmet and I will tell you about my problem.
texts.Would you mind coming back with a §r§3[B: Would you mind coming back with a §r§3[Breathing Helmet I]§r§a? I think that should be everything you need.
texts.Oh you are done with whatever you were d: Oh you are done with whatever you were doing? I heard you ran around the whole place, I don't know if you were the right person to ask for help...
texts.Are you really trying to dive in that wi: Are you really trying to dive in that without the proper equipment?
texts.What is this thing supposed to be? You k: What is this thing supposed to be? You know, I would really appreciate your help, but this §r§3[Breathing Helmet I] §r§adoes not look like it's going to keep you protected.
texts.Have you found the issue yet? I\u0027m s: Have you found the issue yet? I'm still waiting!
texts.I’m having trouble with the fish in our: I’m having trouble with the fish in our lake recently and I am sure the problem lies within the lake itself.

texts.Strangers are not allowed to craft charm: Strangers are not allowed to craft charms here. I must ask you to leave.

texts.The only suspicious thing I\u0027ve seen: 唯一一件让我感到怀疑的是我看见过一个兜帽的男人在附近徘徊。在Eltom的人口并不是很多，所以十分诡异。

texts.Eh, It\u0027s the warrior. I have my ord: Eh, It's the warrior. I have my orders, but still say this is a bad idea.
texts.You all act the same to me. Anyway, ther: You all act the same to me. Anyway, there you go.
texts.I can\u0027t say I have high hopes for y: I can't say I have high hopes for you.
texts.Can\u0027t you humans see I\u0027m medit: Can't you humans see I'm meditating?
texts.Meet me round the back of my house and I: Meet me round the back of my house and I shall show you the way.
texts.The creatures we summoned down there are: The creatures we summoned down there are hostile to all. Even Avos.
texts.I don\u0027t see why we’re helping human: I don't see why we’re helping humans...
texts.We hid this key for the purpose that it: We hid this key for the purpose that it would never be used again.
I'll make the bridge for you.

texts.Ah, recruit! You must be the one Cap\u00: Ah, recruit! You must be the one Cap'n Fenor sent!
texts.Help me clear this debris. Just walk up: Help me clear this debris. Just walk up to it and give it a good shove for me!
texts.Got it, I made a hole! Quickly, let\u002: Got it, I made a hole! Quickly, let's go before we're overrun!
texts.This wall of debris is much too big for: This wall of debris is much too big for us to be able to move. What do we do now?
texts.This cave barely seems worth the trouble: This cave barely seems worth the trouble to me...
texts.Either way, we still don\u0027t have any: Either way, we still don't have any means to get rid of this giant pile of rubble...
texts.Wait... Do you hear that? Ah, monsters!: Wait... Do you hear that? Ah, monsters! Do your job soldier!
texts.Nice job! Let\u0027s move cautiously, We: Nice job! Let's move cautiously, We don't really know what's down here...
texts.Hey! I can\u0027t do this on my own! Com: Hey! I can't do this on my own! Come Back!
texts.Keep it up! I think I\u0027m half way th: Keep it up! I think I'm half way there!
texts.hmm... Maybe if we- wait, what\u0027s ha: hmm... Maybe if we- wait, what's happening to the wall to the right?
texts....Who§r§a in the world was that? You ca: ...Who§r§a in the world was that? You can go check that hole out if you want, but I'll stay here and try to think of a solution to this debris.
texts.Recruit, what took you so long? I\u0027v: Recruit, what took you so long? I've been waiting for an hour! What were you doing?
texts....You§r§a helped some crazy cow-obsesse: ...You§r§a helped some crazy cow-obsessed lunatic steal cows from the local farm? Recruit, that's against the law you know...
Oh, what do I care? Silly Bovemists.
texts....What§r§a just happened? Am I seeing t: ...What§r§a just happened? Am I seeing things? You know what, I don't want to know.
texts.Ah, that cave-in just blocked the path!: Ah, that cave-in just blocked the path! Defend me while I try and make a hole!
texts.Anyway, why don\u0027t you go on ahead?: Anyway, why don't you go on ahead? I'll be here guarding this passage so nothing else bad happens to it.
texts.Aha! I can see the other side! Just a li: Aha! I can see the other side! Just a little more...
texts.It was an honor to adventure with you, r: It was an honor to adventure with you, recruit!

texts.Sorry again about trying to fool you. I: Sorry again about trying to fool you. I hope my information helped you!
texts.Sorry man, if you haven\u0027t got any b: Sorry man, if you haven't got any business with me then I can't talk.

texts.A few days ago, something peculiar happe: A few days ago, something peculiar happened... a group of armed cows attacked us and stole some of our horses.
texts.They were taking orders from two of them: They were taking orders from two of them, and ended up stealing my stable key!
texts.Bring me back §r§3[1 Stable Key]§r§a, an: Bring me back §r§3[1 Stable Key]§r§a, and be careful. I'm talking about Betty of course, not you. Good luck!
texts.Those bastards probably plan to come bac: Those bastards probably plan to come back and steal even more horses! I need someone to take care of it.
texts.You can train your horses by traveling w: You can train your horses by traveling with them. The higher quality the horse is, the faster it can go.
texts.Anyway, you can talk to the horse mercha: Anyway, you can talk to the horse merchant over there to get more horses for your breeding. Good luck!
texts.Be careful if you do, you could end up w: Be careful if you do, you could end up with a much worse horse. Normally, you should have a 20% success rate.
texts.Hey, have you found my §r§3[1 Stable Key: Hey, have you found my §r§3[1 Stable Key]§r§a yet? It should be somewhere in this tunnel right there.
texts.The way down there is right here, good l: The way down there is right here, good luck! Bring Betty with you, she knows how to fight.
texts.Hey! Look who\u0027s here! So, how\u0027: Hey! Look who's here! So, how's the horse doing?
texts.Well hello there! You seem like just the: Well hello there! You seem like just the kind of adventurer who needs a trusty steed, yes? Yes!
texts.Well normally I sell my horses for a dec: Well normally I sell my horses for a decent profit, but I actually need some help. I'll make sure to give you one of our finest horses if you do.
texts.Wonderful. Here\u0027s your promised hor: Wonderful. Here's your promised horse. You know how to use them, eh?
texts.I sure am glad to see you back. And with: I sure am glad to see you back. And with the key!
texts.You can obtain better tier horses by bre: You can obtain better tier horses by breeding them! Put two horse saddles in the crafting area in your inventory to do so.
texts.Oh.. dear god. Okay, let me tell you the: Oh.. dear god. Okay, let me tell you the basics...
texts.They started digging a tunnel under my b: They started digging a tunnel under my barn! I believe they plan to use this tunnel to access the desert.
texts.In fact, during the attack, she kicked o: In fact, during the attack, she kicked one of the leaders in the face, making him blind! Classic of her.

texts.Argh, yer talented aren\u0027t you lad!: Argh, yer talented aren't you lad! Many thanks indeed, now we can see where me treasure be buried.
texts.I canne read me own darn map, lad! What\: I canne read me own darn map, lad! What'dya do with it? Scratch off the ink with yer pennies?
texts.Hrmm, well, garr, blast it all!: Hrmm, well, garr, blast it all!
texts.Go to the old Mage Island, there be a ma: Go to the old Mage Island, there be a man by the name of Dalben who can restore me map to its former glory. Get it done lad, and bring me treasure back!
texts.Me old hideout\u0027s hidden inside that: Me old hideout's hidden inside that there skull at the entrance to our mighty fine establishment. Bring me that map, lad!
texts.So, lad. Are ya willin\u0027 to make ye\: So, lad. Are ya willin' to make ye'self mighty wealthy? Good.
texts.Gnar, you did it lad! Ye brought back ol: Gnar, you did it lad! Ye brought back old Javiers gold! And as I promised, heres yer share of the loot.
texts.Don\u0027t fret though, chuck, old Javie: Don't fret though, chuck, old Javier always kept a back up plan.
texts.Fear not, lad. There be an old friend of: Fear not, lad. There be an old friend of Javier's that can help decipher this old rag.
texts.Me bones are too old for a grand adventu: Me bones are too old for a grand adventure like that, guess ye'll have to figure it out for yerself.
texts.Garh, you look like a mighty fine advent: Garh, you look like a mighty fine adventurer, lad. But perhaps your pockets are a little lighter than you want, eh?
texts.Who knows what it leads to? Maybe a trea: Who knows what it leads to? Maybe a treasure hoard, or maybe the ol' swashbuckler wanted to lead someone into a trap.
texts.Perhaps we be making a deal, lad, and it: Perhaps we be making a deal, lad, and it'll make us both rich!
texts.Argh, but lad. The village vanished out: Argh, but lad. The village vanished out of nowhere! Like some kind of dark magic! I swears to ye, I tell no lies!
texts.I left me old sea farin\u0027 map in me: I left me old sea farin' map in me old hideout, it'll tell ye where we can find me old gold.
texts.Gar, sorry lad. It be the test of time t: Gar, sorry lad. It be the test of time that failed old Javier, not you.
texts.I threw in something extra for ye. It\u0: I threw in something extra for ye. It's an old key I salvaged a few years back, from the shipwreck of a legendary pirate.
texts.Ye see, lad, me treasure has been lost f: Ye see, lad, me treasure has been lost for quite some time, I kept it in a ocean village named Sarnfic, in a secret room.
texts.So ye see, in me old age I could use a s: So ye see, in me old age I could use a spot of me lawful gold to see me through me final years.

texts.Hungry, wondering when the food will be: Hungry, wondering when the food will be available.
texts.Hundreds of men, women and children, jus: Hundreds of men, women and children, just like you, will not eat tonight, at all.
texts.Share what you have, be thankful for wha: Share what you have, be thankful for what you are given.
This one night, this one missed meal.
texts.This is how thousands of people live eve: This is how thousands of people live every day.
texts.I will return your meal tonight, but whi: I will return your meal tonight, but while you eat it... I want you to remember every empty mouth it could have fed.
texts.And while you sit there with empty stoma: And while you sit there with empty stomachs be thankful for what you have. Spare a thought for those who have not.
texts.I\u0027m here to remind you the real mea: I'm here to remind you the real meaning of this day. To think of others..
texts.There will be no Craftmas feast this yea: There will be no Craftmas feast this year!
I know you are hungry. Because I am too.
texts.All because this enormous feast was not: All because this enormous feast was not enough. Detlas bought all the food, cheap or expensive.
texts.But your dinner will not be served tonig: But your dinner will not be served tonight.

texts.The food on the table isn\u0027t enough: The food on the table isn't enough to feed everyone here!

texts.They only store stuff up there, I believ: They only store stuff up there, I believe. I think I might go to the bird for a drink later.
texts.The administrator\u0027s office is just: The administrator's office is just on the second floor of the base. It takes a while to get to through this maze, though.

Uh- No need to worry! We accidentally...

texts.A private airship owner called Calo owes: A private airship owner called Calo owes me big.
texts.Thank you so much for finding him. You w: Thank you so much for finding him. You were the only volunteer.
texts.Since we don\u0027t have any leads, it m: Since we don't have any leads, it might be best to ask some of the passengers for information.
texts.Ok well the situation is pretty bad. The: Ok well the situation is pretty bad. The engines have broken down.
texts.Wait! I know! You can have free travel b: Wait! I know! You can have free travel between Detlas and Cinfras!
texts.Oh, and you will also be rewarded kindly: Oh, and you will also be rewarded kindly monetarily. I will also personally send him the ring, so that it doesn't get damaged on the way, and you will receive it there.
texts.You can just head down now! I will tell: You can just head down now! I will tell Calo about your arrival.
texts.Feel free to return to your quarters and: Feel free to return to your quarters and enjoy the rest of your journey.
texts.Wow... You single handedly took out a pi: Wow... You single handedly took out a pirate invasion.
texts.The engineer downstairs is trying to fig: The engineer downstairs is trying to figure out a solution, but he's not the brightest villager in Gavel.
texts.His mother informed us that her son disa: His mother informed us that her son disappeared soon after boarding.
texts.Would you mind having a talk with the en: Would you mind having a talk with the engineer, and see if you can help?
texts.Hello again, did you find him?: Hello again, did you find him?
texts.Just head down to the entrance deck, and: Just head down to the entrance deck, and we are about to arrive at Detlas Airbase now.
texts.Poor parenting, if you ask me. Alas, we: Poor parenting, if you ask me. Alas, we must find the lad.
texts.I will tell him the deal. All you have t: I will tell him the deal. All you have to do is enter his ship and he'll take you back and forth!
texts.Most of them will be in the dining area: Most of them will be in the dining area or in the lounge.
texts.I have to stay here and man the brig, bu: I have to stay here and man the brig, but if you head down to the engine room, we would greatly appreciate it.
texts.And you\u0027re a passenger! It\u0027s a: And you're a passenger! It's a good job you did...
I still do not know how to thank you... We owe you so much.
texts.We have no defense on this ship. We are: We have no defense on this ship. We are a civilian carrier.
texts.Hopefully that is the only hiccup in the: Hopefully that is the only hiccup in the journey.
texts.We only just set off and there is alread: We only just set off and there is already an incident.
texts.How did he get down there?! There is sup: How did he get down there?! There is supposed to be someone on duty!
texts.I wouldn\u0027t normally bother the pass: I wouldn't normally bother the passengers, but we're so short handed. Can you find the little boy? He must be hiding somewhere...
texts.I really appreciate it. My crew seem to: I really appreciate it. My crew seem to be absolutely nowhere!
texts.What is this? A ring from the Queen?! It: What is this? A ring from the Queen?! It looks valuable. You should keep it.
texts.Oh, hey! Are you here to help again?: Oh, hey! Are you here to help again?
texts.Are you here to volunteer to search for: Are you here to volunteer to search for the missing child?
texts.The engineer is just downstairs. Sorry t: The engineer is just downstairs. Sorry to ask you for help again, but see if there is anything you can do.
texts.Thank you so much for your help; I hope: Thank you so much for your help; I hope you find the lad soon.

Oh no... This is very, very bad.
texts.But over 100 years ago, the horde found: But over 100 years ago, the horde found it and killed hundreds.
texts.Good, let\u0027s use it on this wall, it: Good, let's use it on this wall, it looks like we can break right through...
texts.Ah you’re already here. Coming up behind: Ah you’re already here. Coming up behind you soldier!
texts.Hello, I am a lieutenant in the Ragni ar: Hello, I am a lieutenant in the Ragni army. I have a job for you soldier.
texts.Anyway, I’ve found the blockage. It’s ri: Anyway, I’ve found the blockage. It’s right up ahead.
texts.It has a horrible history. People hid he: It has a horrible history. People hid here during raids.
texts.Oh no, oh no no no! Did you just open §r: Oh no, oh no no no! Did you just open §r§a§lthat? §r§aCome here immediately.
texts.Soldier! Good timing. We\u0027ve been re: Soldier! Good timing. We've been requesting help for ages.
texts.Here’s a small explosive. I placed one a: Here’s a small explosive. I placed one at the blockage already, if that alone doesn't work, use this.
texts.Ah, you’re alive. Looks like we underest: Ah, you’re alive. Looks like we underestimated the amount of sewage.
texts.Let\u0027s get out of here. Do you still: Let's get out of here. Do you still have the explosive I gave you?
texts.I forgot to mention this won’t be withou: I forgot to mention this won’t be without danger. There’s all sorts of nasty things in this sewer. Keep your wits about you. Right, let’s go!
texts.Here’s the brief. We get in, deploy smal: Here’s the brief. We get in, deploy small explosives to dislodge the blockage and get out.
texts.Meet me up the hill at the sewer entranc: Meet me up the hill at the sewer entrance, just right of this big drain here.
texts.Do you feel like there’s something lurki: Do you feel like there’s something lurking that doesn’t want us here?
texts.Looks like we have a blocked pipe in the: Looks like we have a blocked pipe in the sewers. No wonder no one wanted the job.
texts.The sewer entrance is just right of the: The sewer entrance is just right of the big gate. I'll meet you there.
texts.This was sealed for a reason. It used to: This was sealed for a reason. It used to be the old Ragni prison.
texts.Wait, you aren\u0027t level 5 yet! Come: Wait, you aren't level 5 yet! Come back to me when you get stronger.
texts.There\u0027s nothing for it. We have to: There's nothing for it. We have to act. I will inform the high command. You… You go in and defeat the leader.
texts.Rumour has it that Bob, the hero of Wynn: Rumour has it that Bob, the hero of Wynn, was born in that very prison.
texts.I fear we face a much worse enemy than a: I fear we face a much worse enemy than a blocked drain..
texts.I\u0027m going to need you to get your h: I'm going to need you to get your hands dirty. I'll need some assistance with the blockage.
Now the dead remain in there.. Corrupt. It was sealed to stop them from attacking the city.

texts.Congratulations on defeating the Corkus: Congratulations on defeating the Corkus Accipientis and completing the Bronze tier! If you win the next fight, you can start getting Silver tokens.
texts.With funding from the future province of: With funding from the future province of Corkus, I went on a journey to study the strongest fighters in the world!
texts.Impressive work against the Mummyboard,: Impressive work against the Mummyboard, but that was only the first challenger! Things have only just begun!
texts.Thanks to funding from Corkus, I managed: Thanks to funding from Corkus, I managed to find it, the Corpus Accipientis, and created a golem with similar abilities.
texts.After reading about a rare Gavel species: After reading about a rare Gavel species with the properties of transformation, I knew I had to research it.
texts.During my expedition across the world, f: During my expedition across the world, funded by the amazing future province of Corkus, I happened upon a story about a doctor in Olux.
texts.You can continue and fight him now, or f: You can continue and fight him now, or forfeit to your right, though you won't get much of a reward. The choice is yours.
Mo'in, traveler, and welcome to... LEGENDARY ISLAND! The ultimate test of strength!
texts.This means that here, at Legendary Islan: This means that here, at Legendary Island, you can fight my creations, recreations of the most powerful beings of all time!
texts.You can give it a shot now, or forfeit f: You can give it a shot now, or forfeit for a reward to your right, as usual.
texts.Seems you were able to best the Virus Do: Seems you were able to best the Virus Doctor, but this is still the Bronze tier, so don't get too cocky!
texts.You can challenge it now if you want, yo: You can challenge it now if you want, you can buy an entry ticket to the right.
texts.Though its name is rather hard to pronou: Though its name is rather hard to pronounce, I eventually managed to find and study the Matryoshka Idol.
texts.You can continue and challenge it now, o: You can continue and challenge it now, or you can forfeit to your right for a small reward. It's up to you!
texts.The first challenger you\u0027ll face is: The first challenger you'll face is based off of a Mummy that I discovered hidden in the desert: §r§6§lThe Mummyboard§r§a!
texts.My expedition, which was sponsored by Co: My expedition, which was sponsored by Corkus, by the way, eventually lead me to the jungles of Wynn, where I heard rumors of an ancient idol.
texts.There are 10 challengers for you to figh: There are 10 challengers for you to fight, and many prizes to collect!
texts.And now you can fight one of my most res: And now you can fight one of my most resilient creations, the §r§f§lMatrojan Idol§r§a!
texts.Ladies and gentlemen, performing you liv: Ladies and gentlemen, performing you live from Legendary Stadium... it^s Death Metal and the Ascendant Bosses!
texts.Using samples of his so-called medicine,: Using samples of his so-called medicine, and stories about him, I managed to recreate the Plague Doctor as...
texts.I call it the §r§6§lCorkus Accipientis§r: I call it the §r§6§lCorkus Accipientis§r§a! This will be the final battle of the Bronze tier!

texts.HEY! YOU! What are you looking at? You w: HEY! YOU! What are you looking at? You want to go do ya?!
texts.I swear if you don’t leave right now, I: I swear if you don’t leave right now, I am going to PUMMEL YOUR FACE INTO THE GROUND.

texts.Welcome to my farm! I\u0027m currently p: Welcome to my farm! I'm currently preparing a large harvest for a big feast happening in Detlas soon.

texts.This cave could prove to be very useful: This cave could prove to be very useful for future recruits who need to travel between Detlas and Ragni.
texts.There\u0027s an old cave behind me. It w: There's an old cave behind me. It was used in the Corruption Wars...
texts.Welcome back, soldier! Great job clearin: Welcome back, soldier! Great job clearing out that cave, we can finally use it for great things now!
texts.Ah! You must be a new recruit! Well, I\u: Ah! You must be a new recruit! Well, I've got a mission for you.
texts.Now, here\u0027s where you come in- I ne: Now, here's where you come in- I need you to clear out that cave route so we can use it once more! Good luck, soldier!
texts.You have your orders, recruit. Carry the: You have your orders, recruit. Carry them out!
texts.Hello, recruit! I would ask you for a ha: Hello, recruit! I would ask you for a hand with something, but you seem too weak. Maybe when you're level 5...
texts.We used it for quick and easy travel bet: We used it for quick and easy travel between Detlas and Ragni. It’s been abandoned for years.

texts.Gah! That\u0027s hardly anything! I\u002: Gah! That's hardly anything! I'm not even surprised. Let's just go.
It almost looks like a giant §r§aspike...Woah§r§a. How deep does this thing go?
texts.Calm down. All we have to do is keep dig: Calm down. All we have to do is keep digging. Besides, he did say he'd pay us a lot, so stop being mad.
texts.Oh yeah, we were so busy with this spike: Oh yeah, we were so busy with this spike, we forgot to address you! Sorry about that.
texts.Well, that did the trick. Let’s take a l: Well, that did the trick. Let’s take a look.
texts.Well, I don\u0027t know about you, but I: Well, I don't know about you, but I say we blow it to shreds! That oughta get rid of this spike!

texts.Now, we must crown ye, and give you yer: Now, we must crown ye, and give you yer reward.
texts.Grats on stealin\u0027 the treasure, you: Grats on stealin' the treasure, you can board the airship through the window.
texts.Yer Majesty. What an honour to have such: Yer Majesty. What an honour to have such a beautiful queen.
texts.Move along, ya\u0027 got clearance to bo: Move along, ya' got clearance to board the airship!
Benefits of being a queen I 'spose.

texts.Because of them, Cinfras can maintain it: Because of them, Cinfras can maintain its wealth and prosperity!
texts.They\u0027ve even got a big tower set up: They've even got a big tower set up north of Cinfras. As their name implies, the tower is set up near Lake Gylia.
texts.Is it even possible to fix? No one\u0027: Is it even possible to fix? No one's been able to find a way inside.
texts.You know about the Gylia Watch? They\u00: You know about the Gylia Watch? They've been protecting us since the Gerten War a few hundred years ago.
texts.The big clock in the Guild Hall never ac: The big clock in the Guild Hall never actually moves, I think it must be broken.
texts.I spent so much money on a Siegfried mas: I spent so much money on a Siegfried mask, but it was worth every emerald. I feel just as powerful as him when I wear it!

texts.Some people wearing goggles have been go: Some people wearing goggles have been going around calling it the fourth province.
texts.Have you heard of \"the bird island\"?: Have you heard of "the bird island"?
texts.Maybe if people see it they will become: Maybe if people see it they will become more internationally recognised.

texts.Aye\u0027, this is tha\u0027 little base: Aye', this is tha' little base that we use when we're attemptin' to raid the mansion, dig up that dirt to get to tha' courtyard!

texts.Ah, another recruit. You\u0027re a bit b: 哈，另一位勇士！你来得有些迟了，朋友。
texts.The bridge was destroyed by some horribl: 这座桥已经被可怕的怪物摧毁了！现在这里无路可走！
texts.Everyone already went on ahead. Just fol: 其他人已经在前面了，你只需要沿着小路穿过桥就能跟上他们了。
texts.That old tree to the north looks like it: 不过北边的那棵树看起来并不是很结实。或许你可以用它创建一条新路。
texts.Man, I want to buy a helmet but I don\u0: 兄弟，我想要买一顶头盔，可是我没有任何绿宝石...我得杀一些动物来获得一些。
texts.Be careful, there\u0027s a crazy village: 当心！这个山洞里住着一位发疯的村民，他会攻击任何接近他的人。

texts.You shall receive no riches from me, onl: You shall receive no riches from me, only this book. It reminds me of the days before all this tragedy.
texts.You shall receive no riches from me. Tha: You shall receive no riches from me. That book shall teach you what your whole kind needs to learn.
texts.If you have found your way here, you mus: If you have found your way here, you must know the story. I left Gavel eons ago.
texts.Well, you will be sorely disappointed. I: Well, you will be sorely disappointed. I will offer you no such riches.
texts.I know it wasn’t your people who are to: I know it wasn’t your people who are to blame. But you had your part in the cataclysm.
texts.I have watched the Doguns\u0027 fall, th: I have watched the Doguns' fall, the Guardian of the Forest sleep for a millenium, and the greed of villagers run rampant.
texts.Ah, another greedy mortal has sought me: Ah, another greedy mortal has sought me to enhance their own gains.

texts.I ran up here to check on the engines an: I ran up here to check on the engines and machinery... It just doesn't seem right...
texts.There is a colour coded restart system a: There is a colour coded restart system at the top. They made it nice and simple. But it only works if I press the same code down here.
texts.Thank ye! The \u0027ngines are back up a: Thank ye! The 'ngines are back up and running!
texts.Let\u0027s try turnin\u0027 it off and o: Let's try turnin' it off and on again. That usually works.
texts.Pro\u0027lem is I gotta stay down \u0027: Pro'lem is I gotta stay down 'ere, and the system to restart is on the top of the ship.
texts.You can get up there from the captain\u0: You can get up there from the captain's loun'.
texts.It was something like red... orange... y: It was something like red... orange... yellow.. Ah, it all on the paper anyway.
I hope the rest of yer journey is good.
texts.You must be the \u0027uman the captain d: You must be the 'uman the captain done told me about.
Hmm dun worry. We can fix it.
texts.I\u0027ll write down the code of the but: I'll write down the code of the buttons to press. Just head on up to the top of the ship.
texts.We sure are havin\u0027 quite the situat: We sure are havin' quite the situation down 'ere.
texts.I will be down here pressing buttons whe: I will be down here pressing buttons when I see you dun yer thing.
texts.I dun looked at the machine but I dun se: I dun looked at the machine but I dun see nothin' wrong.
texts.I dun gave you the instructions. Just ch: I dun gave you the instructions. Just check it if you forget the code.
I couldn't have dun it without ye.
texts.You go back to yer quarters and get some: You go back to yer quarters and get some rest. A passen'er like yerself shouldn' have to help the crew.
texts.I can\u0027t thank ye enough. You saved: I can't thank ye enough. You saved me job. Go back to your quarters, I promise we won't bother you again.

texts.Did you hear the news? Siegfried just ki: Did you hear the news? Siegfried just killed a bunch of Orc- Wait, you don’t know who Siegfried is?
texts.If they get into the city, they could st: If they get into the city, they could steal all of my money!
texts.The power plant is having problems. If t: The power plant is having problems. If that thing explodes, it'll take the whole city with it!
texts.Those blasted orcs have set up a camp in: Those blasted orcs have set up a camp inside a cave just outside of the city.
texts.He’s a legendary hero, the Bob of Gavel!: He’s a legendary hero, the Bob of Gavel! He’s all over the newspaper! I hear he's looking for apprentices.
texts.I\u0027d be dead, or even worse: poor!: I'd be dead, or even worse: poor!
texts.I wish I was good enough to become a stu: I wish I was good enough to become a student of his.

texts.At the northern side of the Nivla Forest: At the northern side of the Nivla Forest, there is a very dangerous cave.
texts.It\u0027s filled with an unnaturally lar: It's filled with an unnaturally large nest of spiders. I wouldn't dare go in there.
texts.That awful witch is causing so much trou: That awful witch is causing so much trouble for the town. I hope someone finally kills her. This is the first Villager settlement in Wynn, look at it now.

texts.Hi Human! I got a cool bandage from my d: Hi Human! I got a cool bandage from my daddy. Wanna see?

texts.Thank you for retrieving my journal from: Thank you for retrieving my journal from the mansion, I hope nobody else is tricked into buying this evil piece of property!
texts.If you step inside the mansion just for: If you step inside the mansion just for a few moments, you'll understand why the sellers had to trick someone into investing in their god forsaken real estate!
texts.Let this be a life lesson to you. Never: Let this be a life lesson to you. Never buy a house from a Corkian architect.
texts.I left a very precious journal inside of: I left a very precious journal inside of this mansion, a hell within walls. It was my great grandfather's!
texts.The journal! You outsmarted the mansion!: The journal! You outsmarted the mansion!
texts.Navigating from room to room is nearly i: Navigating from room to room is nearly impossible, the rooms move around. I've only been in the mansion for a week and I'm already packing my bags and moving to Detlas.
texts.I must thank you, that journal was price: I must thank you, that journal was priceless to my family.
texts.Hold on, what? The journal! I must have: Hold on, what? The journal! I must have forgotten inside the mansion!
texts.Let\u0027s see here... mother\u0027s old: Let's see here... mother's old vase… check!
texts.The mansion was designed by a Corkian ar: The mansion was designed by a Corkian architect, and I was scammed into buying it.
texts.Dining room table... got it here, check!: Dining room table... got it here, check!
texts.Finally, the journal. It\u0027s out here: Finally, the journal. It's out here somewhere, I assume. I'll look around.
texts.You there! Would you mind doing me a dee: You there! Would you mind doing me a deed?

texts.Stay off of the boat! It\u0027s for the: Stay off of the boat! It's for the cows! Wish I was a cow... §r§7[Right-Click the boat to push it]
texts.I\u0027m Drale, and I\u0027m on a missio: I'm Drale, and I'm on a mission to free these cows from the enslavement of Katoa Ranch.
texts.Welp, see ya! Oh, and nice to meet you,: Welp, see ya! Oh, and nice to meet you, miner! Now, let's get going my cows!
texts.Quickly, go through the hole behind me a: Quickly, go through the hole behind me and help me get these cows to safety!
texts.There\u0027s the raft! Help me push it f: There's the raft! Help me push it for the cows!
texts.Those farmers stole those cows. They are: Those farmers stole those cows. They are sacred animals. Now they're about to turn them into steak! If you were to help me, maybe I could help you...
texts.Go free those innocent cows from enslave: Go free those innocent cows from enslavement! Gosh I wish I was a cow.
texts.Hello again, friend! Did I hear you need: Hello again, friend! Did I hear you needed help? Well, have no fear! Cows, to me!
texts.Again, thank you so much for what you ha: Again, thank you so much for what you have done this day. These cows deserve a better life than being farm animals.
texts.Go free those cows from the farmers befo: Go free those cows from the farmers before they're taken to the slaughterhouse! Oh man, the slaughterhouse...
texts.Thank you so much, but we\u0027re not do: Thank you so much, but we're not done yet. We need to get these cows out the province.
There's a small opening behind me. Go through it and help me get these cows on a raft to Gavel!
texts.Oh... Didn\u0027t expect you to follow m: Oh... Didn't expect you to follow me... Well, um... Hi! This will sound mad but...
texts.And, that should do it! Be free, my frie: And, that should do it! Be free, my friends! A new life awaits!
texts.Since you helped me with my problem, I t: Since you helped me with my problem, I thought I should repay that favor by helping you!

texts.This area is off limits to passengers du: This area is off limits to passengers during take off. Climb up to the passenger decks, there will be an attendee at your cabin.

texts.Here, have these, you earned it... Heheh: Here, have these, you earned it... Hehehehe...
texts.Those who do are the ultimate warriors o: Those who do are the ultimate warriors of this land.
texts.Did you enjoy Death? I know him, very we: Did you enjoy Death? I know him, very well...
texts.Perhaps you would like to know the layou: Perhaps you would like to know the layout of the tower first? Hehehehe...
texts.I challenge you to reach the final floor: I challenge you to reach the final floor!
texts.Each floor has nine regular levels and o: Each floor has nine regular levels and one boss level.
texts.Turn left and head to the first §r§afloo: Turn left and head to the first §r§afloor...if§r§a you dare...
They deserve only the best equipment.
texts.Few have conquered such an extreme chall: Few have conquered such an extreme challenge.
You have completed my tower, I see...
So, what do you say? Hehehe...
texts.There are 7 floors in this tower, each w: There are 7 floors in this tower, each with ten levels.
texts.To pass a regular level, you must collec: To pass a regular level, you must collect ten tokens from the challenge on that level, and one token from boss levels.
texts.After you beat a whole floor, you will r: After you beat a whole floor, you will return here and you can begin the next one...
texts.Have you got what it takes to conquer it: Have you got what it takes to conquer it?

texts.What have you done to this potion, human: What have you done to this potion, human? You will pay for it!

texts.Must be the gate marking the border betw: Must be the gate marking the border between Fruma and Wynn.
texts.Does this mean we have to walk all the w: Does this mean we have to walk all the way to Ragni from here?
texts.Hey, nbcss! You alright in there? Looks: Hey, nbcss! You alright in there? Looks like we hit something.
texts.Yeah, there\u0027s no way we\u0027ll get: Yeah, there's no way we'll get across here, unless one of you happened to be a bridge repairman back in Fruma.
texts.No, you\u0027re not crazy, it\u0027s the: No, you're not crazy, it's the same for me. It looks like nbcss is suffering the same amnesia, as well.
texts.Wait, stop! Don\u0027t want you falling: Wait, stop! Don't want you falling off the edge.
texts.So, what do you guys know about Wynn exa: So, what do you guys know about Wynn exactly?
I didn't think we needed anything. Why would any materials help us?
texts.I\u0027ve never seen the Wynn Province b: I've never seen the Wynn Province before. What do you think it's like?
texts.I guess that\u0027s §r§a§oone§r§a way of: I guess that's §r§a§oone§r§a way of getting across! You guys head over the ravine, I'll be right behind you.

texts.I feel so much better now, thank you for: I feel so much better now, thank you for the cure!

texts.I was on my way to the old bird for som: I was on my way to the old bird for some lunch, but I seem to have gotten lost.

texts.A star, it fell, straight into my yard!: A star, it fell, straight into my yard!
texts.But alas! Gone, it is! A thief made away: But alas! Gone, it is! A thief made away with my precious star! Stolen right from my basement! I NEeD mY sTAR BaCk!§r§a§k!!
texts.Find the star for me! You must find the: Find the star for me! You must find the bandit who stole my star and get it back! Fail, you must not, or I will be very sad!
texts.The star changes everything around it! I: The star changes everything around it! It has powerful magic; just look how pretty it made my basement!
texts.It\u0027s gone! Gone! Oh, woe is me! Wha: It's gone! Gone! Oh, woe is me! Whatever am I to do?
My precious glowy... has returned to me.
texts.There is a trail of radiation leading to: There is a trail of radiation leading to the cave in the west! I suspect he ran there! Now...
texts.I SAID GET THE STAR BACK!!: I SAID GET THE STAR BACK!!
texts.tHE STar Is MinE ONCe AGaIn!!!!!: tHE STar Is MinE ONCe AGaIn!!!!!
texts.I heard as it crashed! I ran outside and: I heard as it crashed! I ran outside and saw it had made a hUUuuuuUuuuuUUge crater!

texts.We were hoping for a true envoy, but you: We were hoping for a true envoy, but you will do.
texts.We\u0027ve come a long way in a short ti: We've come a long way in a short time.
Mo'in! Welcome back to Corkus City.
texts.It\u0027s a difficult modern branch of m: It's a difficult modern branch of magic that allows us to create machines.
North, you can buy weapons and potions. If you continue through the gate you will find the native Avos.
texts.Moving on... The south gate leads to Rel: Moving on... The south gate leads to Relos. On your way there, you might pass by the-
texts.Oh! And speaking of the powder exchange,: Oh! And speaking of the powder exchange, I'll start you off with some of these.
texts.We first arrived on Corkus 350 years ago: We first arrived on Corkus 350 years ago.
Let me point out where the shops are.
texts.If you follow me, I\u0027ll give you a t: If you follow me, I'll give you a tour of the city.
texts.The Five Gears Diner is hosting any gues: The Five Gears Diner is hosting any guests of the island.
texts.Coming from Fruma, we of course knew no: Coming from Fruma, we of course knew no magic at all.
Stop. Maxie, was right. I'm sorry. Mech X pierced the vault like it was nothing and took the key.
texts.West, you can buy armor, and there is an: West, you can buy armor, and there is another entrance to the potion shop.
texts.Hey! What are you doing back there? Foll: Hey! What are you doing back there? Follow me so I can show you the amazing Province of Corkus!
texts.To the south is our bank, powder shop, s: To the south is our bank, powder shop, scrolls, and our exclusive powder exchange!
texts.Try following the trail outside the cast: Try following the trail outside the castle, it might lead you to the key.
texts.What a load of scrap! You shouldn\u0027t: What a load of scrap! You shouldn't talk about §r§a§lthat §r§ain front of our guest!
texts.Mo\u0027in, Wynn traveller! Come speak t: Mo'in, Wynn traveller! Come speak to me.
texts.Uhm, nevermind. In fact, we have a gift: Uhm, nevermind. In fact, we have a gift for you.
texts.Ah, here already. Welcome to Corkus City: Ah, here already. Welcome to Corkus City, Capital of our island.
texts.Go through the western gate and head to: Go through the western gate and head to the diner for your free feast. Enjoy!
texts.The Corkians, like you, are from Fruma o: The Corkians, like you, are from Fruma originally...
texts.It\u0027s such an honour to have a Wynn: It's such an honour to have a Wynn soldier visit our island.
texts.We soon developed our own. The rare powe: We soon developed our own. The rare power of Electromagic.
texts.The mechs were covered in farm produce f: The mechs were covered in farm produce for some reason and left a convenient trail. If you are serious about fighting the factory, follow it.
texts.Don\u0027t listen to Maxie. Enjoy your s: Don't listen to Maxie. Enjoy your stay.
texts.And why would we take the word of someon: And why would we take the word of someone who can't do basic electromagic?

texts.Don\u0027t stand close to me, I am curse: Don't stand close to me, I am cursed! Come back when you're level 36, you might be able to help me.

WORM-HOLES.name: Worm Holes
WORM-HOLES.lore: These massive holes have recently begupearing all around the swamp, creating a massive tunnel network underground.
WORM-HOLES.text: These massive holes have recently begupearing all around the swamp, creating a massive tunnel network underground.

BLACK-ROAD.name: 黑色大道
BLACK-ROAD.lore: This road leads to the town of Ternaves and its by mine. It is iited by strange mushroom-cow hybrids, and a mysterious scientist.
BLACK-ROAD.text: 这条碎石铺成的道路通往了城镇Ternaves。在这条道路上，栖息着许多奇异的蘑菇牛，也居住着一位神秘的科学家。

NIVLA-VILLAGE.name: Nivla村
NIVLA-VILLAGE.lore: A small village hidden within the trees in the Nivla forest. Home of the only bowl merchant in the province.
NIVLA-VILLAGE.text: 隐藏于Nivla森林中的小村庄，全省唯一一个卖碗的商人的家。

TIMELESS-RUIN.name: Timeless Ruin
TIMELESS-RUIN.lore: The people who built these mysterious structures had unusual control over time magic. Very few alive understand it or know about the people who lived here, for they were neither Human nor Villager. A species from a distant land.
TIMELESS-RUIN.text: The people who built these mysterious structures had unusual control over time magic. Very few alive understand it or know about the people who lived here, for they were neither Human nor Villager. A species from a distant land.

SAVANNAH.name: Savannah
SAVANNAH.lore: Wild ocelots inhabit this mostly-barren savannah, which leads to the Almuj desert. There is a town on the edge of the mountains, though few visit it.
SAVANNAH.text: Wild ocelots inhabit this mostly-barren savannah, which leads to the Almuj desert. There is a town on the edge of the mountains, though few visit it.

ALMUJ.name: Almuj
ALMUJ.lore: Even in the harsh desert, people have found a way to survive. The massive city of Almuj uses the by water sources to keep its city a thriving oasis.
ALMUJ.text: 即使是在严酷的沙漠之中，人们仍然学会了如何生存。这巨大，兴旺的沙漠绿洲的运转依靠着附近的珍贵的水资源。

RUINS-OF-DETLAS.name: Detlas的废墟
RUINS-OF-DETLAS.lore: The modern city of Detlas was built with the help of villagers after their arrival in Wynn. But these ruins might hold the secrets of what lied before...
RUINS-OF-DETLAS.text: The modern city of Detlas was built with the help of villagers after their arrival in Wynn. But these ruins might hold the secrets of what lied before...

SELCHAR.name: Selchar
SELCHAR.lore: Founded in 970AP after the waves calmed, this city became the bridge between Gavel and Wynn. It flourishes in trade and enjoys a safe haven from the dangers of both provinces.
SELCHAR.text: 建成于腐化后970年。在战乱平息之后，这里变成了连接Gavel和Wynn的桥梁。在这里，商业繁荣，人们安居乐业，是不受两省危险的影响的天堂。

NESAAK.name: Nesaak
NESAAK.lore: In the center of the uurally frozen forest lies the small village of Nesaak. Their main source of food is ice fishing.
NESAAK.text: In the center of the uurally frozen forest lies the small village of Nesaak. Their main source of food is ice fishing.

WYNN-PLAINS-MONUMENT.name: Wynn Plains Monument
WYNN-PLAINS-MONUMENT.lore: This ancient monument only opens to those it deems worthy. Inside is contained secrets of the Wynn Plains that few eyes have ever seen.
WYNN-PLAINS-MONUMENT.text: This ancient monument only opens to those it deems worthy. Inside is contained secrets of the Wynn Plains that few eyes have ever seen.

DARK-FOREST-GATE.name: 暗之森林大门
DARK-FOREST-GATE.lore: Once a grand stone entryway to a brilliant forest, it has since fallen into disrepair since the emergence of the Decay.
DARK-FOREST-GATE.text: 曾经是一个巨大的通向一个生机勃勃的森林的石门，但自腐化肆虐开始，它就被侵蚀得破败不堪了。

THANOS.name: Thanos
THANOS.lore: The only residence of dwarves outside of the Molten Heights, Thanos has been decimated by Ozoth, a powerful dragon feared across the entire province.
THANOS.text: 矮人族在熔岩火山之外的唯一的居住区。Thanos常年受到Ozoth，一条令整个省恐惧的恶龙的攻击。

IED-BARRACKS.name: Ied Barracks
IED-BARRACKS.lore: Once the barracks of the Almuj Army, it has been taken over by the traitorous rebel, Commander Takan.
IED-BARRACKS.text: Once the barracks of the Almuj Army, it has been taken over by the traitorous rebel, Commander Takan.

TROMS.name: Troms
TROMS.lore: This massive fortress has served as a symbol of hope to the province throughout the war. Its army has helped keep the corruptio bay for centuries.
TROMS.text: 这个坚如磐石的要塞是战争期间Wynn省希望的象征。它的军队守护着这个海湾不受腐化的侵蚀已经几个世纪了。

PRISON-OF-SOULS.name: 灵魂之囚
PRISON-OF-SOULS.lore: Oppressively dark and enigmatic, simply being inside this cave makes you feel disconnected from your body. Horrific power permeates the area...
PRISON-OF-SOULS.text: 压迫性的黑暗和神秘感向你袭来，仅仅是待在这里就会让你感到自己的灵魂从身体中撕裂出来。不祥的力量弥漫着这片区域...

AVOS-TERRITORY.name: Avos Territory
AVOS-TERRITORY.lore: Home of the bird-like Avos, the native iitants of Corkus. Though they welcomed the Corkians initially, tensions between the two have grown over the years.
AVOS-TERRITORY.text: Home of the bird-like Avos, the native iitants of Corkus. Though they welcomed the Corkians initially, tensions between the two have grown over the years.

OLUX-LUMBER-YARD.name: Olux Lumber Yard
OLUX-LUMBER-YARD.lore: Once used for repairs for Olux's massive wall, the lumber yard has become useless after the Decay began to make the trees rot and die.
OLUX-LUMBER-YARD.text: Once used for repairs for Olux's massive wall, the lumber yard has become useless after the Decay began to make the trees rot and die.

THE-HOUSE-OF-TWAIN.name: 吐温凶宅
THE-HOUSE-OF-TWAIN.lore: Once the home of the most gifted defenders of Wynn, it now lies in ruins and haunted by the spirits that could not move on.
THE-HOUSE-OF-TWAIN.text: Once the home of the most gifted defenders of Wynn, it now lies in ruins and haunted by the spirits that could not move on.

NORTH-LUSUCO.name: Lusuco北部
NORTH-LUSUCO.lore: High up in the mouns, this area serves as the site of Lusuco's an Wynnter Fair.
NORTH-LUSUCO.text: High up in the mouns, this area serves as the site of Lusuco's an Wynnter Fair.

HISTORICAL-MALTIC.name: Maltic古迹
HISTORICAL-MALTIC.lore: Maltic was the first settlement ever made by the arriving villagers. The alliance between Villagers and Humans would go on to save the province.
HISTORICAL-MALTIC.text: Maltic was the first settlement ever made by the arriving villagers. The alliance between Villagers and Humans would go on to save the province.

DELNAR-MANOR.name: Delnar Manor
DELNAR-MANOR.lore: A prestigious mansion that was once owned by the Sodeta Guild. It is said that the dangerous and powerful Abysso Galoshes were once sealed away here.
DELNAR-MANOR.text: A prestigious mansion that was once owned by the Sodeta Guild. It is said that the dangerous and powerful Abysso Galoshes were once sealed away here.

GAVEL-GATE.name: Gavel Gate
GAVEL-GATE.lore: This massive doorway serves as the main entrance to the province of Gavel. Through it lies the imperial quartz city of Llevigar.
GAVEL-GATE.text: This massive doorway serves as the main entrance to the province of Gavel. Through it lies the imperial quartz city of Llevigar.

VOLCANIC-ISLES.name: 火山岛
VOLCANIC-ISLES.lore: Mostly inhospitable, the islands are a relatively new formation. WynnExcavation has set up Excavation Site C here in hopes to find valuable new minerals.
VOLCANIC-ISLES.text: 大部分不适于居住的新生火山岛屿群。Wynn考古集团在这里设立了发掘地点C，用来寻找价值不菲的新矿物。

LLEVIGAR.name: Llevigar
LLEVIGAR.lore: The city of Llevigar is the first sight adventurers see in Gavel. It was built using quartz mined from the by Karoc Quarry. It is the most advanced city in Gavel.
LLEVIGAR.text: 所有首次来到Gavel的冒险者们，都会首先到达Llevigar。所有建筑都是用产自Karoc采石场的石英建成的，是Gavel最发达的城市。

SWAMP-DARK-FOREST-TRANSITION-LOWER.name: 沼泽与暗之森林交界处下层

FREEZING-HEIGHTS.name: Freezing Heights
FREEZING-HEIGHTS.lore: Cursed by an ice dragon's breath, this is a scar of the Dogun genocide.
FREEZING-HEIGHTS.text: Cursed by an ice dragon's breath, this is a scar of the Dogun genocide.

MOLTEN-HEIGHTS-GATE.name: 熔岩火山大门
MOLTEN-HEIGHTS-GATE.lore: The entryway to the Molten Heights, a fiery den of volcanoes. It's the home of the Dwarves, and the last remaining Doguns.
MOLTEN-HEIGHTS-GATE.text: 通往炽热的熔岩火山地域的入口。矮人一族以及所剩无几的Dogun们的家。

BANTISU-AIR-TEMPLE.name: Bantisu空气神殿
BANTISU-AIR-TEMPLE.lore: Bantisu Air Temple has served as a beacon in the Canyon of The Lost. The Air Monks help guide people who have gotten lost.
BANTISU-AIR-TEMPLE.text: Bantisu Air Temple has served as a beacon in the Canyon of The Lost. The Air Monks help guide people who have gotten lost.

EAGLE-TRIBE.name: 鹰族
EAGLE-TRIBE.lore: The Eagle Tribe is one of the two native tribes of the Rymek Canyon. They have bee war with the Owl Tribe for years.
EAGLE-TRIBE.text: The Eagle Tribe is one of the two native tribes of the Rymek Canyon. They have bee war with the Owl Tribe for years.

ELKURN.name: Elkurn
ELKURN.lore: Despite its proximity to the portal, this quaint town has somehow managed to survive. It was once the home of a researcher who investigated the phenomenon of corruption.
ELKURN.text: 即使离下界传送门十分近，这个古朴的小村庄却不知怎的奇迹般的存活了下来。这里曾经是一个研究过腐化现象的研究者的家。

IBOJU-VILLAGE.name: Iboju村
IBOJU-VILLAGE.lore: The village of the native tribe of the jungle, the people here have lived peacefully alongside the people of Troms for years.
IBOJU-VILLAGE.text: 丛林中的原始部落的村庄。这里的人们已经和Troms和平共处许多年了。

ICE-ISLANDS.name: 冰封群岛
ICE-ISLANDS.lore: Home to a nation of early seafarers, they have waged war among each other for years, oblivious to the real war happening on the maid.
ICE-ISLANDS.text: Home to a nation of early seafarers, they have waged war among each other for years, oblivious to the real war happening on the maid.

ROOTS-OF-CORRUPTION.name: 腐化之根
ROOTS-OF-CORRUPTION.lore: A thousand years ago, a group of emerald miners uthed a mysterious portal. Unknowingly, they doomed the province to centuries of war against the mysterious force know corruption.
ROOTS-OF-CORRUPTION.text: 千年以前，一队矿工挖到了一个神秘的传送门。但他们不知道的是，传送门释放出来的腐化之力将导致整个省陷入长达几个世纪的战争。

IRON-GOLEM-FACTORY.name: 铁傀儡工厂
IRON-GOLEM-FACTORY.lore: The source of the Iron Golems protecting Wynd Gavel, the methods of creating them, have remained unknown to the public eye.
IRON-GOLEM-FACTORY.text: The source of the Iron Golems protecting Wynd Gavel, the methods of creating them, have remained unknown to the public eye.

TOWER-OF-ASCENSION.name: 通天塔
TOWER-OF-ASCENSION.lore: The tallest tower in the province, the Tower of Ascension provides a challenge so daunting that it has brought down even the strongest of warriors.
TOWER-OF-ASCENSION.text: The tallest tower in the province, the Tower of Ascension provides a challenge so daunting that it has brought down even the strongest of warriors.

CRYSTAL-FALLS.name: Crystal Falls
CRYSTAL-FALLS.lore: The elegant Crystal Falls decorate the scenery around the dojo of Sensei Miyagi, a wise teacher who has trained hundreds of apprentices.
CRYSTAL-FALLS.text: The elegant Crystal Falls decorate the scenery around the dojo of Sensei Miyagi, a wise teacher who has trained hundreds of apprentices.

ABANDONED-MINES.name: 废弃矿井
ABANDONED-MINES.lore: Despite mining opening up the ious portal, it did not stop. Some speculate that these mines are hiding an even greater danger...
ABANDONED-MINES.text: Despite mining opening up the ious portal, it did not stop. Some speculate that these mines are hiding an even greater danger...

WYNNEXCAVATION-SITE-B.name: Wynn考古集团 地点B
WYNNEXCAVATION-SITE-B.lore: No one knows what WynnExcavation is searching for at Site B, but rumors are circulating that they are trying to uncover something ancient and powerful.
WYNNEXCAVATION-SITE-B.text: 没有人知道Wynn考古集团到底在地点B打什么算盘，但传言散布说他们在尝试揭开某些神秘而又古老的力量的面纱。

WYNNEXCAVATION-SITE-A.name: Wynn考古集团 地点A
WYNNEXCAVATION-SITE-A.lore: WynnExcavation is a Gavel-owned company dedicated to uncovering the history of the Wynn Province. Here, they've uncovered acient tomb from a lost empire.
WYNNEXCAVATION-SITE-A.text: Wynn考古集团来自于Gavel，致力于发掘Wynn省的历史。在这里，他们找到了属于某个上古帝国的墓穴。

WYNNEXCAVATION-SITE-D.name: Wynn考古集团 地点D
WYNNEXCAVATION-SITE-D.lore: It is said that the Leaf Crystal was buried here. Once WynnExcavation finds it, they'll have all four of the crystals scattered across Wynn, granting them uhomable power.
WYNNEXCAVATION-SITE-D.text: It is said that the Leaf Crystal was buried here. Once WynnExcavation finds it, they'll have all four of the crystals scattered across Wynn, granting them uhomable power.

RYMEK.name: Rymek
RYMEK.lore: The town of Rymek was founded by the Creden Tibus bandit group. They only deal exchanges through a special currency.
RYMEK.text: Rymek是由Creden Tibus土匪集团建立起的。在这里，他们只通行一种特殊的货币。

BUCIE.name: Bucie
BUCIE.lore: The small village of Bucie is home to many farmers, who produce the crops for the by cities of Llevigar and Olux.
BUCIE.text: 有许多农夫居住的小村庄。他们辛勤劳动，支撑着Llevigar和Olux的食物供给。

LUSUCO\u0027S-SECRET-LIBRARY.name: Lusuco的秘密图书馆
LUSUCO\u0027S-SECRET-LIBRARY.lore: This old library has been slumbering beh Lusuco for years. It tells the story of the legey Twain children.
LUSUCO\u0027S-SECRET-LIBRARY.text: 这座老旧的图书馆在Lusuco沉睡已久了。这里收藏着关于Twain和他的孩子们的故事。

ARENA-OF-THE-LEGENDS.name: 传奇竞技场
ARENA-OF-THE-LEGENDS.lore: Aena for those who wish to truly test their mettle after being admitted into the Temple of the Legends, where fierce training takes place.
ARENA-OF-THE-LEGENDS.text: 为了锻炼那些通过了传奇神殿的勇士们的毅力而建造的竞技场，是进行地狱试炼的地点。

MARO-PEAKS.name: Maro群峰
MARO-PEAKS.lore: Proposals to colonise Maro Peaks have long been brought up as it holds great defensive and industrial benefits, but the local animal population prove difficult to work with. It is said Bob was the first man to climb to the peak.
MARO-PEAKS.text: 殖民Maro峰的提议已经提交很久了, 虽然它有巨大的军事和工业优势，但是当地的生物数量使这变成了一个困难的抉择。传闻说，Bob是第一位成功爬上该峰的人。

ANCIENT-NEMRACT.name: Nemract古迹
ANCIENT-NEMRACT.lore: Hundreds of years ago, the original stone city of Nemract was ravaged by a swarm of the undead. Now it is only iited by the corpses of those who died that day.
ANCIENT-NEMRACT.text: 数百年前，原本石砌的Nemract城被一大群亡灵毁灭了。现在，它建立在那天死去的人的尸体上。

COASTAL-TRAIL.name: Coastal Trail
COASTAL-TRAIL.lore: This beachside path is used by many travellers who seek to avoid the spider-infested route of the Emerald Trail.
COASTAL-TRAIL.text: This beachside path is used by many travellers who seek to avoid the spider-infested route of the Emerald Trail.

RELOS.name: Relos
RELOS.lore: This coastal town is sprawling with gears and machinery built by the various engineers and mechanics living there. Importing and exporting take place frequently here.
RELOS.text: 该临海城市居住着许多的工程师和机械师们，他们造出的机械装置让这座城市得以迅速扩张。货物进口和出口从未停止。

LEGENDARY-ISLAND.name: 传说岛
LEGENDARY-ISLAND.lore: Home of the Legendary Challenge, a test for those who think that they are the strongest in the world. It is named for its designer, the eccentric Dr. Legendary.
LEGENDARY-ISLAND.text: Home of the Legendary Challenge, a test for those who think that they are the strongest in the world. It is named for its designer, the eccentric Dr. Legendary.

CARITAT-MANSION.name: Caritat公馆
CARITAT-MANSION.lore: Once the home of the Caritat family, the most wealthy and generous family in the forest, until one day they mysteriously vanished.
CARITAT-MANSION.text: Caritat一家曾经的住址。他们是当时森林里最有财力，同时也是最为慷慨的大户人家，直到有一天他们所有人都突然人间蒸发了。

FOUN-OF-YOUTH.name: Foun of Youth
FOUN-OF-YOUTH.lore: It is said that each province has a magical spring that grants people eternal life.
FOUN-OF-YOUTH.text: It is said that each province has a magical spring that grants people eternal life.

UPPER-MOLTEN-HEIGHTS.name: 熔岩火山上层
UPPER-MOLTEN-HEIGHTS.lore: The volcanoes stand upohollow victory and support the few survivors of the war. Some argue it was a genocide, not a war.
UPPER-MOLTEN-HEIGHTS.text: 这些火山象征着一场空有的胜利并支撑着战争后少数的幸存者。有些人说那不是一场战争，而是一场代表着种族灭绝的大屠杀。

ZHIGHT-ISLAND.name: Zhight岛
ZHIGHT-ISLAND.lore: This small community is an up-and-coming tourist attraction for its fair weather and tropically-themed luxuries, requiring constant shipping to the island to main business.
ZHIGHT-ISLAND.text: 该岛有着前程似锦的旅游业。四季如春的天气以及在热带才能找到的奢侈品吸引了无数的游客。然而他们需要不间断的海上运输去维持这些。

ROTTEN-PASSAGE.name: 腐朽之路
ROTTEN-PASSAGE.lore: This tunnel seems to have been dug out uurally. The groans of the undead echo and clash in the fetid caverr.
ROTTEN-PASSAGE.text: This tunnel seems to have been dug out uurally. The groans of the undead echo and clash in the fetid caverr.

QUARTZ-MANSION.name: 石英公馆
QUARTZ-MANSION.lore: A group of bandits who have been stealing quartz shipments hide out in this mansion. However, no one knows what they're using it for.
QUARTZ-MANSION.text: 一帮偷窃石英的土匪的藏身处，然而无人知晓他们需要石英的原因。

ELTOM.name: Eltom
ELTOM.lore: The city of Eltom is the only human residence in Gavel. Since humans aren't permitted to settle in the province, it has remained hidden to outsiders.
ELTOM.text: Eltom是Gavel唯一的人类定居区。自从人类不被允许在Gavel定居以来，这里一直是人类秘密的世外桃源。

ROOSTER-ISLAND.name: 公鸡岛
ROOSTER-ISLAND.lore: This egg-shaped island is home to a single resident, a featherbrained villager hermit obsessed over chickens. Rumor has it that Bob has visited the island for some reason.
ROOSTER-ISLAND.text: 这座蛋形的岛屿上仅居住着一位沉迷于养鸡的隐居者。传闻Bob曾经由于某种理由参观过这座岛屿。

KATOA-RANCH.name: Katoa农场
KATOA-RANCH.lore: This farm is most famous for its milk, though recently the cows that produce it have been going missing.
KATOA-RANCH.text: 该农场因其产出的牛奶而得名，但是最近奶牛们却诡异的接连失踪。

BEH-THE-ROOTS.name: Beh the Roots
BEH-THE-ROOTS.lore: This cavern is evidence that corruption is like a weed. The roots spread throughout the province.
BEH-THE-ROOTS.text: This cavern is evidence that corruption is like a weed. The roots spread throughout the province.

DEAD-ISLAND.name: 死亡岛
DEAD-ISLAND.lore: A wealthy family claimed the entire island to settle on when the waves first settled, but a mysterious event has brought dark influence to the island, robbing it of its vibrancy.
DEAD-ISLAND.text: A wealthy family claimed the entire island to settle on when the waves first settled, but a mysterious event has brought dark influence to the island, robbing it of its vibrancy.

THE-GUILD-HALL.name: 工会大厦
THE-GUILD-HALL.lore: The Guild Hall is where the most prestigous guilds gather, and where you can create your own. You caso get to Letvus Airbase through here.
THE-GUILD-HALL.text: The Guild Hall is where the most prestigous guilds gather, and where you can create your own. You caso get to Letvus Airbase through here.

BREMMINGLAR.name: Bremminglar
BREMMINGLAR.lore: Not many travel to this little tribal village in the sava, but it is said to be the home of a powerful sorcerer.
BREMMINGLAR.text: 少数人曾历经过的Sava里的小村庄，但是传闻说这里住着一位魔力强大的法师。

DURUM-ISLES.name: Durum岛
DURUM-ISLES.lore: Despite the odd formation of land, every inch is covered in farmland, and acts as a proverbial breadbasket for the ocean capital of Selchar.
DURUM-ISLES.text: 即使该岛的地层十分奇怪，但每一亩地都被农田覆盖，作为海域的中心城市Selcher的粮仓。

FALLEN-FACTORY.name: 堕落工厂
FALLEN-FACTORY.lore: This massive factory, built by the engineer Cerid, was once hailed as the national monument of Corkus. Ever since it was closed down, it has fallen into disrepair.
FALLEN-FACTORY.text: This massive factory, built by the engineer Cerid, was once hailed as the national monument of Corkus. Ever since it was closed down, it has fallen into disrepair.

BOVINE-BARN.name: Bovine Barn
BOVINE-BARN.lore: A lush cavern hidden under the bar Durum Isles. It is bursting with life and natural energies, and is fiercely protected...
BOVINE-BARN.text: A lush cavern hidden under the bar Durum Isles. It is bursting with life and natural energies, and is fiercely protected...

MINING-OPERATION.name: Mining Operation
MINING-OPERATION.lore: The mysteries uncovered from this excavation were quickly abandoned as a new dark force, one far more mysterious than corruption, was the last thing this province needed.
MINING-OPERATION.text: The mysteries uncovered from this excavation were quickly abandoned as a new dark force, one far more mysterious than corruption, was the last thing this province needed.

WATER-OF-THE-PAST.name: Water of the Past
WATER-OF-THE-PAST.lore: The proud farmers surrounding Ragni were often left to fend for themselves. They have proven to be resourceful and hardened. They created their own infrastructure, but when they were totally abandoned  by the army, there was nothing but slaughter.
