WATER-OF-THE-PAST.text: The proud farmers surrounding Ragni were often left to fend for themselves. They have proven to be resourceful and hardened. They created their own infrastructure, but when they were totally abandoned  by the army, there was nothing but slaughter.

EMERALD-TRAIL.name: 绿宝石小径
EMERALD-TRAIL.lore: The trail through Nivla Forest to Detlas, the central city of the Wynn Province.
EMERALD-TRAIL.text: 途经Nivla森林，通向Wynn省中心城市Detlas的小路。

MAGE-ISLAND.name: 法师岛
MAGE-ISLAND.lore: Home to the reclusive mages responsible for calming the waves, the people on this island continue to study magic and advance their capabilities beyond any other.
MAGE-ISLAND.text: 许多隐居的大法师的家。他们随时准备着平息战乱，并在这里继续探寻魔法的奥妙。

SKIENS-ISLAND.name: Skiens岛
SKIENS-ISLAND.lore: Held down by a fanatical military leader, their efforts prevented the colonization of Selchar for years. Somehow, the symptoms of corruption have begun, despite its position in the sea.
SKIENS-ISLAND.text: Held down by a fanatical military leader, their efforts prevented the colonization of Selchar for years. Somehow, the symptoms of corruption have begun, despite its position in the sea.

SWAMP-DARK-FOREST-TRANSITION-MID.name: 沼泽与暗之森林交界处中层

RAGNI.name: Ragni
RAGNI.lore: One of two great fortresses in Wynn. Ragni has survived over 1000 years of war - sometimes barely. It is the hometown of the 146 year old hero Bob, who hasn’t been seen in 16 years.
RAGNI.text: Wynn省内两座最宏伟的要塞之一。它成功地在上千年的战乱中存活了下来——尽管有时十分勉强。同时它也是英雄Bob的故乡。加上他迄今为止失踪的16年，他已经146岁了。

NEMRACT.name: Nemract
NEMRACT.lore: Nemract is an under-defended, rough, seafaring city. The people here have endured a lot of suffering - and that has made them hardy.
NEMRACT.text: Nemract is an under-defended, rough, seafaring city. The people here have endured a lot of suffering - and that has made them hardy.

KAROC-QUARRY.name: Karoc Quarry
KAROC-QUARRY.lore: Karoc Quarry mines out massive amounts of quartz each day, mostly used for construction purposes. But lately, shipments have been going missing...
KAROC-QUARRY.text: Karoc Quarry mines out massive amounts of quartz each day, mostly used for construction purposes. But lately, shipments have been going missing...

TEMPLE-OF-LEGENDS.name: 传说神殿
TEMPLE-OF-LEGENDS.lore: Only the most revered of scholars and adventurers are allowed inside of the Temple of Legends. Just entering this place is a testament to your victory against the Corrupter of Worlds.
TEMPLE-OF-LEGENDS.text: Only the most revered of scholars and adventurers are allowed inside of the Temple of Legends. Just entering this place is a testament to your victory against the Corrupter of Worlds.

THE-QIRA-HIVE.name: Qira的蜂巢
THE-QIRA-HIVE.lore: This towering nest is the Qira Hive, a challenge against the powerful creations of the enigmatic Qira.
THE-QIRA-HIVE.text: This towering nest is the Qira Hive, a challenge against the powerful creations of the enigmatic Qira.

MALTIC.name: Maltic
MALTIC.lore: The first town founded by Villagers in the Wynn province. Maltic’s beach is the site of a shipwreck that crashed upon its shores 100 years ago.
MALTIC.text: The first town founded by Villagers in the Wynn province. Maltic’s beach is the site of a shipwreck that crashed upon its shores 100 years ago.

INVADED-BARRACKS.name: Invaded Barracks
INVADED-BARRACKS.lore: Once the barracks of the Almuj Army, it has been taken over by the traitorous rebel, Commander Takan.
INVADED-BARRACKS.text: Once the barracks of the Almuj Army, it has been taken over by the traitorous rebel, Commander Takan.

KANDON-BEDA.name: Kandon-Beda
KANDON-BEDA.lore: A town built on the edge of a cliff, Kandon-Beda specializes in air travel. It also houses a library for those who wish to learn history.
KANDON-BEDA.text: A town built on the edge of a cliff, Kandon-Beda specializes in air travel. It also houses a library for those who wish to learn history.

SWAMP-DARK-FOREST-TRANSITION-UPPER.name: 沼泽与暗之森林交界处上层

BENEATH-THE-ROOTS.name: Beneath the Roots
BENEATH-THE-ROOTS.lore: This cavern is evidence that corruption is like a weed. The roots spread throughout the province.
BENEATH-THE-ROOTS.text: This cavern is evidence that corruption is like a weed. The roots spread throughout the province.

BAK\u0027AL\u0027S-DESTRUCTION-1.name: Bak'al's Destruction 1
BAK\u0027AL\u0027S-DESTRUCTION-1.lore: The corrupt entity known as Bak'al has appeared countless times since the portal was opened, decimating everything in his path.
BAK\u0027AL\u0027S-DESTRUCTION-1.text: The corrupt entity known as Bak'al has appeared countless times since the portal was opened, decimating everything in his path.

BAK\u0027AL\u0027S-DESTRUCTION-2.name: Bak'al's Destruction 2
BAK\u0027AL\u0027S-DESTRUCTION-2.lore: A once great city was reduced to rubble in 347 AP (After Portal) in one of the largest attacks by Bak'al ever documented. There was only one survivor.
BAK\u0027AL\u0027S-DESTRUCTION-2.text: A once great city was reduced to rubble in 347 AP (After Portal) in one of the largest attacks by Bak'al ever documented. There was only one survivor.

BAK\u0027AL\u0027S-DESTRUCTION-3.name: Bak'al's Destruction 3
BAK\u0027AL\u0027S-DESTRUCTION-3.lore: Just the name of Bak'al is enough to make many cower in fear. They say that wherever he appears, he will only leave death in his wake.
BAK\u0027AL\u0027S-DESTRUCTION-3.text: Just the name of Bak'al is enough to make many cower in fear. They say that wherever he appears, he will only leave death in his wake.

SANCTUARY-BRIDGE.name: 庇护之桥
SANCTUARY-BRIDGE.lore: This magnificent bridge connects the mysterious ruins of Time Valley to the frigid cold of the Nesaak Tundra. In the center lies a mysterious seal that no one has beele to open.
SANCTUARY-BRIDGE.text: 这座壮观的大桥连接着时间之谷和Nesaak苔原。桥中，神秘的地牢静静得等着第一位敢于挑战的人。

HALF-MOON-ISLAND.name: 半月岛
HALF-MOON-ISLAND.lore: This land is strangely infested by undead, despite the island showing no symptoms of corruption. Rumours fly, but most people simply avoid the island entirely.
HALF-MOON-ISLAND.text: This land is strangely infested by undead, despite the island showing no symptoms of corruption. Rumours fly, but most people simply avoid the island entirely.

SEAVALE-REEF.name: Seavale Reef
SEAVALE-REEF.lore: Ocean currents flow and intertwine to form these renowned reefs, bursting with life. Tourists frequently dive and discover lost treasure, dropped from merchant ships and carried by the currents.
SEAVALE-REEF.text: Ocean currents flow and intertwine to form these renowned reefs, bursting with life. Tourists frequently dive and discover lost treasure, dropped from merchant ships and carried by the currents.

TRIBAL-SANCTUARY.name: 部落圣地
TRIBAL-SANCTUARY.lore: This disused Iboju burial site seems to have been turned into a camp for the risen tribal zombies. Foreign chanting is a constant ambience here.
TRIBAL-SANCTUARY.text: This disused Iboju burial site seems to have been turned into a camp for the risen tribal zombies. Foreign chanting is a constant ambience here.

SWAMP-MOUN-TRANSITION-MID-UPPER.name: 沼泽与山脉交界处中上层

NIVLA-WOODS.name: Nivla树林
NIVLA-WOODS.lore: This forest has been infested with giant, mutant arachnids for countless years. They serve as the greatest obstacle for adventurers on their way to Detlas.
NIVLA-WOODS.text: 这片森林已经被大批巨大的突变蜘蛛占领了无数年了，它们成为了冒险者们前往Detlas旅途中最大的威胁。

BOB\u0027S-TOMB.name: Bob的坟墓
BOB\u0027S-TOMB.lore: A year after Bobs disappearance, a tomb pertaining to be the resting place of Bob was found in 985 AP.
BOB\u0027S-TOMB.text: A year after Bobs disappearance, a tomb pertaining to be the resting place of Bob was found in 985 AP.

THE-GREAT-BRIDGE.name: 地狱大桥
THE-GREAT-BRIDGE.text: 在这个时候读这段文字真的不适合。

DETLAS.name: Detlas
DETLAS.lore: The center of the Wynn Province. This city is a massive hub of trade for all adventurers, whether they have just started their journey or have bee it their whole lives.
DETLAS.text: Wynn省的中心。该城市为冒险者们的商贸中心，聚集了新生的冒险者们以及经验丰富的老冒险家们。

LOST-AVOS-CITY.name: Lost Avos City
LOST-AVOS-CITY.lore: The history of the Avos has remained largely unknown, but this monument of Avos ancestry might hold the ancient secrets that historians have been looking for.
LOST-AVOS-CITY.text: The history of the Avos has remained largely unknown, but this monument of Avos ancestry might hold the ancient secrets that historians have been looking for.

RAGNI\u0027S-SECRET-LIBRARY.name: Ragni的秘密图书馆
RAGNI\u0027S-SECRET-LIBRARY.lore: A twelve-volume story of Wynn's great hero can be found here. The origins of this library, and others like it, still remain unknown.
RAGNI\u0027S-SECRET-LIBRARY.text: 这里存放着十二部Wynn最伟大的英雄的史诗。该图书馆的起源，以及其它的，都不为人知。

SAVA.name: Sava
SAVA.lore: Wild ocelots iit this mostly-barren sava, which leads to the Almuj desert. There is a town on the edge of the mouns, though few visit it.
SAVA.text: Wild ocelots iit this mostly-barren sava, which leads to the Almuj desert. There is a town on the edge of the mouns, though few visit it.

CASTLE-DULLAHAN.name: Dullahan城堡
CASTLE-DULLAHAN.lore: Before the Decay, this was the home of Dullahan, a terrible man who enslaved and tortured the people of the forest. That is, until his execution.
CASTLE-DULLAHAN.text: 在腐化肆虐前，这里曾经是Dullahan，一个奴役并处刑森林中的居民的恶徒的家。这样的恶况一直持续着，直到他的头也被砍下来为止。

LAKE-GYLIA.name: Gylia湖
LAKE-GYLIA.lore: For which the Gylia Plains are named, Lake Gylia is the largest lake in the world. Immense magical energy surrounds this place.
LAKE-GYLIA.text: For which the Gylia Plains are named, Lake Gylia is the largest lake in the world. Immense magical energy surrounds this place.

MAEX.name: Maex
MAEX.lore: A dwarven town founded as a monument to the victory in Molten Heights. It was built by the power of the people. Dwarves are communal and riches are owned by all.
MAEX.text: A dwarven town founded as a monument to the victory in Molten Heights. It was built by the power of the people. Dwarves are communal and riches are owned by all.

OLUX.name: Olux
OLUX.lore: Olux is a poor town, one that has suffered the effects of the Decay, a force that has caused all of north-western Gavel to begin to wither.
OLUX.text: Olux是一个贫穷的小镇。腐化的力量已经侵蚀了整个Gavel的西北部，Olux也不例外，陷入了万物凋零的绝境中。

PIRATE-COVE.name: 海盗湾
PIRATE-COVE.lore: Founded by the first seafarer Redbeard, Pirate Cove is home to some of the most dangerous men in the ocean. They set up outposts all around the island to seek out merchant ships to plunder.
PIRATE-COVE.text: Founded by the first seafarer Redbeard, Pirate Cove is home to some of the most dangerous men in the ocean. They set up outposts all around the island to seek out merchant ships to plunder.

TIME-VALLEY.name: 时间之谷
TIME-VALLEY.lore: The ruins here have been present longer than the portal. Only one persoive today understands this strange place. Time acts strangely here and it's apparent that whoever made them were not human.
TIME-VALLEY.text: 这些遗迹在腐化传送门出现之前都存在了，可今天仅有一人知道其背后的故事。在这里，时间的流逝仿佛变得不可捉摸。很明显，能造出这些的不可能是人类。

CRATE-CRANE.name: 起吊机
CRATE-CRANE.lore: Nemract was one of the cities attacked most often. The people would hide in the gutters and sewers until it was over. However, corrupt enemies are not without intelligence, and they were quickly discovered by the enemy.
CRATE-CRANE.text: Nemract曾经是受到攻击最频繁的城市之一。市民们则藏身于下水道和排水沟中静待攻击结束。然而，腐化的敌人们可不是呆头呆脑的，于是市民们很快就被找到了。

RODOROC.name: Rodoroc
RODOROC.lore: The capital of the Dwarven dominated Molten Heights. Carved from the rocks by the power of the people, it stands as one of the strongest cities ever made.
RODOROC.text: The capital of the Dwarven dominated Molten Heights. Carved from the rocks by the power of the people, it stands as one of the strongest cities ever made.

THE-FORGERY.name: The Forgery
THE-FORGERY.lore: While this may look like a simple bridge on the way to Cinfras, above it floats The Forgery, the gateway to Corrupted Dungeons.
THE-FORGERY.text: 这可能看上去像是一座普通的通往Cinfras的桥，但它的上方漂浮着The Forgery，那里有着通往腐化地牢的大门。

A-HERO\u0027S-ORIGIN.name: 英雄之乡
A-HERO\u0027S-ORIGIN.lore: In the year 854 AP (After Portal), a massive horde of undead lead by Bak’al attacked Ragni. The people of the city sought refuge in the sewer, the only safe place left.
A-HERO\u0027S-ORIGIN.text: In the year 854 AP (After Portal), a massive horde of undead lead by Bak’al attacked Ragni. The people of the city sought refuge in the sewer, the only safe place left.

EIS-VILLAGE.name: Eis村
EIS-VILLAGE.lore: A native tribe of the Dernel Jungle resides here. Its people revere the tree in the village's center as their guardian.
EIS-VILLAGE.text: A native tribe of the Dernel Jungle resides here. Its people revere the tree in the village's center as their guardian.

WATCHMEN.name: 看门人
WATCHMEN.lore: From the watch towers set up across the province, scouts were able to spot an incoming horde from miles away, helping to prepare for countless battles.
WATCHMEN.text: 在全省各地你都可以看到这样的哨兵塔。在上面，哨兵们可以看到百里开外的敌人，并为接下来残酷的战斗做好准备。

PIRATE\u0027S-BAY.name: Pirate's Bay
PIRATE\u0027S-BAY.lore: A massive pirate ship crashed here with such severity, the hull was moulded into the cliffside. Some say that there is still treasure hidden inside.
PIRATE\u0027S-BAY.text: A massive pirate ship crashed here with such severity, the hull was moulded into the cliffside. Some say that there is still treasure hidden inside.

PIGMEN\u0027S-RAVINE.name: 猪人峡谷
PIGMEN\u0027S-RAVINE.lore: This massive, maze-like ravine is home to the Pigmen, a species of half-pig, half-humaominations that feast oy weak adventurer who happens to stumble inside.
PIGMEN\u0027S-RAVINE.text: This massive, maze-like ravine is home to the Pigmen, a species of half-pig, half-humaominations that feast oy weak adventurer who happens to stumble inside.

CINFRAS.name: Cinfras
CINFRAS.lore: The city of Cinfras is the central hub of the Gavel Province. It is also home of the massive Guild Hall, and a massive airship travel center.
CINFRAS.text: Cinfras城是Gavel省的中心。这里还是公会大厅和飞艇旅游中心的所在地。

DRAGON-SKELETON.name: 巨龙的骸骨
DRAGON-SKELETON.lore: Reminant of the Dogun genocide, the Dragons sided with the native residents. However, the dwarves proved to be the dominant force beh the lava.
DRAGON-SKELETON.text: Reminant of the Dogun genocide, the Dragons sided with the native residents. However, the dwarves proved to be the dominant force beh the lava.

THESEAD.name: Thesead
THESEAD.lore: Thesead is one of the smaller cities of Gavel, but its coal industry has kept it thriving. However, recently the coal mines have shut down.
THESEAD.text: Thesead是Gavel中较小的城市之一，但是蓬勃发展的煤炭产业使它的竞争力高居不下。然而，出于某种原因，最近煤矿井都处于关闭状态。

RIVER-SAGE.name: Sage河
RIVER-SAGE.lore: This is the widest river in Gavel, and stretches so long that it divides the plains in two.
RIVER-SAGE.text: 这是Gavel省内最宽的河流，它绵绵不断的河水将这座平原划分成为了两片区域。

LEADIN-ORC-FORT.name: Leadin Orc Fort
LEADIN-ORC-FORT.lore: The largest greenskin base in Gavel, the fortress has been overtaken by Orcs under their leader, Gorgu.
LEADIN-ORC-FORT.text: The largest greenskin base in Gavel, the fortress has been overtaken by Orcs under their leader, Gorgu.

BOULDER-BREAKER.name: Boulder Breaker
BOULDER-BREAKER.lore: Attacks from the portal were often so brutal, it forced people underground. Sometimes, they never made it back out.
BOULDER-BREAKER.text: Attacks from the portal were often so brutal, it forced people underground. Sometimes, they never made it back out.

OZOTH\u0027S-SPIRE.name: Ozoth's Spire
OZOTH\u0027S-SPIRE.lore: Tainted by the flames, this spire serves as the dramatic trail up to the nest of the dragon herself, Ozoth.
OZOTH\u0027S-SPIRE.text: Tainted by the flames, this spire serves as the dramatic trail up to the nest of the dragon herself, Ozoth.

KITRIOS-BARRACKS.name: Kitrios军营
KITRIOS-BARRACKS.lore: These barracks are where the Cinfras Army is positioned, though lately their General has beeting suspicious…
KITRIOS-BARRACKS.text: These barracks are where the Cinfras Army is positioned, though lately their General has beeting suspicious…

ABANDONED-LUMBER-YARD.name: 废弃的伐木场
ABANDONED-LUMBER-YARD.lore: Hundreds of years ago, the people working at this mill died in the war. Eveter the land was frozen over, their bodies still hunt those who draw .
ABANDONED-LUMBER-YARD.text: 数百年以前，这个工厂的工人们都在战争中不幸身亡了。甚至在冰冻席卷大地后，他们的尸体仍然会袭击过路的人们。

BEAR-ZOO.name: 狗熊动物园
BEAR-ZOO.lore: This strange island is home to the province's one and only zoo. The owner thought out in the ocean the creatures would be safe from the corruption, but the zoo doesn't get many visitors.
BEAR-ZOO.text: This strange island is home to the province's one and only zoo. The owner thought out in the ocean the creatures would be safe from the corruption, but the zoo doesn't get many visitors.

GELIBORD.name: Gelibord
GELIBORD.lore: Despite the Decay, Gelibord has gotten by. Due to its trade industry, it's become a good stop for adventurers on their quest through Gavel.
GELIBORD.text: Gelibord也没能逃脱被腐化的命运。由于它的商业实力，它成了许多冒险者们首选的停留之地。

NECKLACE-CHAMBER.name: Necklace Chamber
NECKLACE-CHAMBER.lore: Long ago, the Avos hid away a powerful necklace. Despite the many tales and legends of it, it has never been located until now.
NECKLACE-CHAMBER.text: Long ago, the Avos hid away a powerful necklace. Despite the many tales and legends of it, it has never been located until now.

LETVUS-AIRBASE.name: Letvus机场
LETVUS-AIRBASE.lore: Letvus Airbase is the best place to go for commercial airship travel, though only the wealthiest caford it.
LETVUS-AIRBASE.text: Letvus机场是商业性飞艇旅行的首选，虽然只有最有钱的大户人家才能承担得起空中旅行的费用。

LUSUCO.name: Lusuco
LUSUCO.lore: In even the harshest of cold, the people of Lusuco have stayed put and continued living here.
LUSUCO.text: In even the harshest of cold, the people of Lusuco have stayed put and continued living here.

TERNAVES.name: Ternaves
TERNAVES.lore: This small town has laid quietly  Detlas for decades. by lies a massive prison that few draw .
TERNAVES.text: This small town has laid quietly  Detlas for decades. by lies a massive prison that few draw .

RELOS\u0027S-SECRET-LIBRARY.name: Relos's Secret Library
RELOS\u0027S-SECRET-LIBRARY.lore: This library tells a tale that the government of Corkus has kept secret. Rumors tell that more mysterious libraries like this one are hidden across the world.
RELOS\u0027S-SECRET-LIBRARY.text: This library tells a tale that the government of Corkus has kept secret. Rumors tell that more mysterious libraries like this one are hidden across the world.

TROMS-CASTLE.name: Troms城堡
TROMS-CASTLE.lore: The royal family of Troms has been the talk of the town lately. The king's son has gone missing, while the King himself remains reclusive and paranoid...
TROMS-CASTLE.text: The royal family of Troms has been the talk of the town lately. The king's son has gone missing, while the King himself remains reclusive and paranoid...

CORKUS-CITY.name: Corkus 城区
CORKUS-CITY.lore: The main city of the patriotic Corkians, refugees from Fruma who settled on the island. They've used the art of electromagic to build machines.
CORKUS-CITY.text: The main city of the patriotic Corkians, refugees from Fruma who settled on the island. They've used the art of electromagic to build machines.

TAPROOT.name: Taproot
TAPROOT.lore: In the midst of Decay, a massive amount of light is emanating from this root.
TAPROOT.text: In the midst of Decay, a massive amount of light is emanating from this root.

DETLAS-SUBURBS.name: Detlas郊区
DETLAS-SUBURBS.lore: This area is heavily defended by the armies of Detlas and Ragni to ensure food production continues.
DETLAS-SUBURBS.text: This area is heavily defended by the armies of Detlas and Ragni to ensure food production continues.

ALTAR-OF-SANCTIFICATION.name: 神圣祭坛
ALTAR-OF-SANCTIFICATION.lore: A heavy aura hangs in the air of this disused tribal exorcism site. The gibbering of a lingering spirit has begun to echo in your ears...
ALTAR-OF-SANCTIFICATION.text: 一个悬浮在空中的诡异的巨大光环，位于这个废弃的原始部落举行驱魔的地点正上方。你仿佛能听到回荡在周围的灵魂在轻声的耳语...

OWL-TRIBE.name: 猫头鹰族
OWL-TRIBE.lore: The Owl Tribe is one of the two native tribes of the Rymek Canyon. They have bee war with the Eagle Tribe for years.
OWL-TRIBE.text: 猫头鹰族是两个位于Rymek峡谷中的原始部落之一。他们已经陷于与鹰族的战争中长达数年。

ENTAMIS-VILLAGE.name: Entamis Village
ENTAMIS-VILLAGE.lore: A native tribe of the Dernel Jungle resides here. Its people revere the tree in the village's center as their guardian.
ENTAMIS-VILLAGE.text: A native tribe of the Dernel Jungle resides here. Its people revere the tree in the village's center as their guardian.

ALMUJ-GREAT-RIVER.name: Almuj大河
ALMUJ-GREAT-RIVER.lore: Despite its barren surroundings, this river has sprouted various plant life. It flows straight into the Rymek Canyon.
ALMUJ-GREAT-RIVER.text: 尽管周围一片荒芜，这条河流却支撑了许多种生物。它笔直流向Rymek峡谷。

SOMEWHERE-IN-BETWEEN.name: Somewhere In Between
SOMEWHERE-IN-BETWEEN.lore: The Pigmen are a mysterious creature, neither pig nor man, neither corrupt nor whole.
SOMEWHERE-IN-BETWEEN.text: The Pigmen are a mysterious creature, neither pig nor man, neither corrupt nor whole.

GYLIA-WATCH-TOWER.name: Gylia哨塔
GYLIA-WATCH-TOWER.lore: Founded after the Gerten War 200 years ago, the Gylia Watch have used this tower as their base, keeping an eye on the Gerts to prevent another attack.
GYLIA-WATCH-TOWER.text: 在200年前的Gerten战争后建成。Gylia哨塔上每天都有人按时换岗放哨，谨防Gerts的下一次进攻。
